types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The only negative thing I have to say os where the power button is located along the bottom, I keep hitting it and making screensaver come on. But other than that, its eink, and it's Waterproof. I can take it to the pool this summer and not worry about one of those cumbersome waterproof bags. I couldn't be happier!!!  The price too.... very happy!

author: Kim Jones
title: Confused layout
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My Kindle Gen2 died and I got a Paperwhite.  Nice on the size and clear reading.  My problem is I have been use to having my books in order so when a new book comes out, I can keep everyone in order and reread some to update myself if it has been awhile before the new book.  Now they are just random and if I don't have the titles written down, I might not reread the right book. There might be a way to list the titles without a cover picture but not found that yet. So still confused about what is offered or available to me.

author: Jean
title: Can read day
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 3rd kindle & I love it! Extremely lightweight, and great reading day or night. Transferred all my library very easily.  I read every day of the year.

author: Barbara E Golding
title: Give the language option on the first page when user first starts a new kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had to get help from google translate because the info on the first page was in dutch. Could not even figure out how to get into the kindle. When we first turn it on there should be access to a language bank to allow the new user to figure how to set it up.Appreciate the ability to read with reverse lighting, easier on my eyes.

author: jeangoat
title: Saved by y Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Dumped by former Paperwhite in the toilette and couldn't revive it.  So new waterproof Paperwhite to the rescue!  It's doing a good job and is waterproof so it might save me if I goof again.  It seems a little more sensitive to touch than the old one, but I'm getting use to it.  I like the way you can set up your page's appearance.

author: Amazon Customer
title: The Best PAPERWHITE EVER!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the new Kindle Paper white.  It is the third on I have had.  I love that it is small and easy to use.I highlight a lot when I read.  The new screen style makes it easier to use.I love the new version.

author: Z
title: Limited
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Absolutely hate the flickering from refreshing. The screen is not easy on the eyes and feels like you're looking through a distorting "film". I'm hoping to find the utility in sitting poolside but for now this has been a rare disappointment from Amazon.

author: Shan
title: Better than I expected!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love how small and compact this Kindle is. It being waterproof is definitely a plus for me because I can be a bit clumsy but also because I like to read while taking a bath some times. When they say a glare-free screen, they're not kidding! Even with the back light on, I was still able to read the screen with the sun shining directly on it. Very happy with my purchase!

author: Rylie Williams
title: prefer the white version
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: broke my white paperwhite so I wanted to replace it but to my surprise the newest version was cheaper than the older white version. The updates to the system don't make a big enough difference to me so overall I still prefer the white version but for 40 dollars in savings I will stick with this newer one and buy a decal

author: Mike M.
title: Not exactly all-new but definitely improved
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I traded in my 2015 Kindle. I take it everywhere so the water resistance is a plus. I like the flush screen. Not sure if I’ll have much use for the Audible ability but it’s an option. I chose the 8GB capacity because it gives me more than enough. I don’t use my Kindle for magazines and other periodicals. I do have several multi-vilume ‘collected works’ and I have more than enough space. Kindles aren’t flashy but they can’t be beat for reliability.

author: Nancy L. Walker
title: Ease in using it.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love the new feature of opening the cover and having the Kindle start up without having to turn it on or off. The ease of using the Kindle. Everything about the Kindle is wonderful.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love this Kindle Paperwhite--watch out for price drops!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love everything about this Kindle Paperwhite. I'm glad I ordered this version, have the screen backlit for night time reading is probably my favorite feature.  Super lightweight and easy to use! One thing I will say, is I purchased it a week ago, and the price is now $40 less as they have a 25% discount for prime members. I asked Amazon if the would honor the price drop since I had received it less than a week ago, and I was very surprised to hear they would not. They said they do not offer price protection policies. Again--Amazon has always had wonderful customer service, so I was just surprised this was their response. My next recommendation is get one now with the lower price!

author: REX LANYI
title: I prefer my Kindle Fire
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought the new Kindle because I believed that the type resolution was superior. What I found was that it was only marginally better than my Kindle Fire, which does a lot of other things. Most importantly, I am much more comfortable looking at an 8" screen for reading, as opposed to a 6" screen. It just didn't live up to the hype.

author: Amazon Customer
title: as described
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My newest edition.  I was very skeptical to purchase this black and white only paperwhite.  Previiously I had been using an Amazon Kindle Fire , color.  This is a smaller object,  probably much better on my eyes.  I am still getting used to it but overall  I am happy with it. Wish it was a bit easier to find a specific page in a book when necessary.

author: Clyde W. Hatley Jr.
title: easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: had the original kindle which worked good but no touch screen.  this one has the touch screen and the battery lasts a long long time.  I haven't even tried out all the features yet.  Really love it.

author: Joe D. Mayfield
title: Great Product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loved my Kindle and we take our Kindle Fire on trips to stream movies but I really love this Paperwhite. I can read anywhere and anytime of day or night plus the battery life is excellent

author: Chintan Gundarania
title: Worth the price
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am not an avid reader I just enjoy reading books. Ordering book after a vigorous search for the best book to read is kind of tiring and not so motivating. I was a bit skeptic about buying this product if it can provide a good reading experience and if it would justify the price.I am happy with this purchase because now I read more often than before and now I don't have to wait to read a book that I choose to read (just a click away).I have also tested this kindle in a shower for waterproofing test. It works fine underwater (until it is completely submerged the touch sensitivity seize). I didn't yet encounter any issues.Here above I have attached a few pictures showing how it looks in different environments.

author: Turtle Treehouse
title: Waterproof for real!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love love love! My first Kindle that isn't a hand me down. I love that I can read near or in water, I can read without strain in the dark or bright sunlight, I can hold soooooo many books!

author: Amazon Customer
title: A little glitchy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Pros- compact size makes it easy to hold.  The viewing is great and the built in lights make it easy to read.Cons- every so often you find yourself on a page, or chapter that is random. For example, you are on page 100 in chapter 10, you 'turn' the page and you are in chapter 16, or in one case at the surprise ending of the book.  Talk about a spoiler!this seems to be a common problem with this model and I hope a new FW release is soon coming as this is very frustrating.I would give it 5 stars, but the random page jumps makes this a 3 at best

author: Vanessa  J
title: Kindle vs Kobo
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I also have a kobo, and both have things I like and dislike. I love the ease in which you can borrow library books on kindle. However, the battery life on the kobo is much better. I find that I can go months before the kobo is down to 50%. On the other hand kindle reaches 50% every few days. Also, kobo gives reading stats, which kindle does not. (If there is the same feature on kindle, pls let me know where it is.) Kobo does not have “special offers”, which can be a distraction, and personally I don’t want to pay to have them removed.  The dictionary on kindle is much better. Unlike kobo, I can listen to audio books, which is a great advantage. All the other features are comparable. I gave it 3 stars due to its low battery life, lack of reading stats, and ads.

author: Born to Ride
title: Great but power button should have been place on top
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Paperwhite is great except for placement of power button. When holding Paperwhite my little finger which I use to hold up goes right to the power button which will inadvertently power down the Paperwhite. Very annoying. Amazon should have placed power button on top of unit not the bottom. Also, can not move screen 180 degrees (only will do landscape) which if it had this capability would address the power button issue. I got a cover to address this issue.

author: Dr.TE
title: Great e-reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I switched to a Kindle Whitepaper from another brand of ereader.  I use  it to borrow ebooks from our public library.  The Kindle process to accomplish this is simple and easy compared to my other ereader.  I am quite satisfied with my Kindle so far, it was easy to set and get running.  I will never go back to the other ereader.

author: Kathleen
title: Love It!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: We have been using a kindle to read since they came out. My husband broke his last paperwhite so I got him the latest version. It is great. The best innovation is the back light so he can read in bed without bothering me. This latest version is lightweight and can go anywhere! The pages look just like a paperback book. Love it!

author: Cat Lady
title: Love the night screen option
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have several kindles but got this new one for fun. I was thrilled to discover a black screen/white text option under the accessibility label. It will make night reading so much easier on my eyes.

author: Lori S. Johnson
title: Love my switch to the new Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had my old Paperwhite since 2013 and was apprehensive to buy a new one.  Best purchase I made this year and glad I upgraded.  Love it...... same paper white look with increase memory and waterproof!!

author: Leaette Lally
title: My paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I replaced my old kindle with a paperwhite.  Not happy at all with it. You can't download library books from it, so I have to go to my old kindle to download, which means if I plan on downloading I have to carry both kindles, kind of a pain. I can download from Amazon but not library I wish I had bought an ipad maybe more versatile

author: Gloria J.
title: Amazing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: After ordering I was a little skeptical, but after I got it I was amazed.  It was lighter, had more storage, although my old Kindle still had storage space, but I could now listen via Bluetooth as well as read!  Amazing!  Waterproofing was an added perk even though not for me.  So far I’m very pleased with everything and don’t regret trading in my old Kindle.

author: Brit bee
title: Long battery life and no glare reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Waterproof which will work great on my beach vacation or reading in the barh.  The Bluetooth for audible is nice, I don’t use it but for those who do it is a good feature.  I like the no glare screen and the amount of books I can take with me and the long battery life.

author: Barbara Poyneer
title: I liked it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I moved up from a Kindle so old it had a keyboard so the touch screen took some getting used to. The way it arranges books and collections also took some getting used to as it was a complete change. Not sure I like it yet. Accessing the footnotes is difficult. All too often touching the footnote gives you a page turn and you have to keep trying until it works. This is especially true along the edges of the screen. I also wish there was a way to enlarge maps and charts to make them easier to read. It'll take me time to master this new way of using a Kindle.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Kindle is not as bright a screen as IPad.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am 68yrs old and will be having eye problems soon.  I had heard great things about Kindle so I decided to go ahead and get one. I could not get the screen bright enough.  I made myself read a book on the Kindle, hoping to get used to it. It didn't work. I guess I'm just an Apple person.  I have the Mac Pro, I Pad, and I phone.

author: Laurie Zolas
title: Lightweight, easy to read, and better battery
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was using a Kindle Fire, which I liked, but this Kindle is much, much lighter, so I can lie down and read without my arms getting tired. The back light is good and the standard settings for the font make it easy to read. Also, the battery recharges quickly, and each charge lasts for a much longer time than on the Fire. I like the fact that it is waterproof, but I haven't tested that.

author: Mary Lyn
title: It's ok
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The extra storage and longer lasting charge are good.  But I can't get my favorite solitaire game on it.

author: Linda
title: Great improvment!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I know I am behind the times, but I just gave my original Kindle to my husband and bought a Kindle paper-white.Wow -- now I can read anywhere -- no extra light needed!

author: Brian Montgomery
title: Mostly good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've wanted a kindle paperwhite for awhile as reading on a clunky fire tablet is just too much of an inauthentic reading experience for me. I appreciate the fact that the paperwhite is lightweight and waterproof. I much prefer this at night in bed to my fire.Now I am frustrated that my cable does not fit well and my kindle inverts the colors briefly when flipping pages. That is incredibly bothersome and I'm wondering how to fix it or if anyone else experiences it.

author: Teresa
title: Not as easy to read as expected
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle Paperwhite is smaller and lighter than earlier versions. I liked the case I ordered for it and the easy off with the close of the cover. That being said, I found the Paperwhite very hard to read without eye strain. The glass is similar to what is on non-glare glass photo frames which slightly distorts the image. With my astigmatism, I tried resizing and also changing the font and brightness but this model was never easy to use. I originally bought it to be able to read outside in the sunlight but if I can't use it inside I'll try to read with the Kindle app on my iPad when outside. Disappointed with the product, but the Amazon return process was very simple and fast.

author: Jennifer Zamboni
title: It's great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great size! (probably pocket-sized, if you're a fella). Nice and lite. The reading experience is smooth, the backlight works great, fairly easy to navigate. I haven't tested the idea of being waterproof, but I’m getting the impression from the instructions that it it's actually water resistant. All in all, I’m a happy little book dragon!

author: Patrice Allen
title: Does not allow you to read along
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My primary reason for purchasing this device is so I could read and listen at the same time. Unfortunately, this is not possible. you can either listen with Audible or read the text, but you cannot do both. I hope Amazon gets an update to allow this feature soon.

author: TatooedGrma
title: Battery is a Dude
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I got this newest version of the Kindle paper white for 3 main reasons. I liked the fact the it was water proof, there was a smoother edge and the battery lasts weeks.The battery absolutely does NOT last weeks. I took it on trip out of town charged it fully before I left on a Wednesday. I was gone 5 days and when I got home it was dead.

author: Casandra
title: A BOOK LOVERS DREAM
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I LOVE this reader, it's perfect. Easy on your eyes, small enough to fit anywhere (even inside a clutch). I just wish you can lock it maybe with a code but other than this, its great. Makes reading easier and faster.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Slightly updated and improved version of an essential device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Still a great device, somewhat improved from prior version.  Best features - double the capacity for thousands of books, improved readability in bright sunlight, waterproof, and nightlight that still doesn't disrupt one's sleep cycle.  Only complaint is that it is just smaller enough than the previous version so that the earlier leather case no longer fits.

author: jvana15
title: Kindle paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased this December 2018, and it is April 25, 2019 and it completely froze up last night.  I purchased the warranty, but not sure who to contact or what to do to unfreeze the kindle.I would not purchase this again, since it is unusable at this time.  Fortunately I have another kindle e-reader that I purchased in 2017 and it is still working.

author: Terry K. Chapman
title: Love the Kindle Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's small enough to put in a jacket pocket, light enough to carry everywhere.  I enjoy the various light settings, bright when outside and during the day, dim to read at night without disturbing my husband's sleep.  I can read in a totally dark room.  It's so easy to change the page, I thought it would interrupt the reading process, but it only takes the slightest touch, hardly have to move my finger.  The font can be changed, with numerous options for bold and for size.  It's easy to charge on my pc...takes about four hours so when it's necessary I plug it in during evening when I'm not reading.  I can get ebooks from my local public library so many books are FREE!  LOVE IT.

author: TNTinker
title: Love my latest Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the clarity of the screen, even in sunlight..  Purchased it because it is waterproof and I am going to take it to the pool this summer.  This is my third Kindle purchase and they just keep getting better.  However, would like a model in the near future to encompass the whole screen, similar to the new iPhone.

author: justme
title: Loving it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had (still working on) quite a change and learning curve to my new Kindle.  I had my other one for almost 6 years so I am having to learn how to do things on the new one.  I am reading almost all my books on my new Kindle and love the compact size and ability to easily adjust font size and background lighting while reading.I have not figured out how to make the font larger when I am selecting a new book to read, probably operator error.  Other than that I love it and hardly ever watch TV any more!

author: kay
title: Can u change the page settings to black?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Umm still not sure how to feel about this😔 let me just say there are a few things I don’t like.1. There’s a delay when turning pages2. U can’t change the color pages from white to black🤦🏾‍♀️ And I prefer reading from the black pages, other reviews said it can be changed but u can’t, they must of confused it for the other kindles.Other than that I like my kindle

author: Tile Guy
title: Rip off
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This product is a total rip off and nothing more than an advertising vehicle for Amazon to sell you more books.  That would be ok if Amazon was giving this Kindle for free but not ok if you pay $99 for it, Constant ads and even a screen saver with books Amazon wants you to buy. Was given an older version of the Kindle 3-4 years ago that was larger and didn't have the constant ads/notices to buy books Amazon thought I would be interested in. I will be sending this one back.

author: Janet
title: LOVE this new Paperwhite!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is so lightweight comfortable to hold while reading. it is a great buy for the price.  Would recommend this to anyone looking to update or purchase a Kindle.

author: robert close
title: What battery life?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Compared to my two year old model,:Battery life disappointing, lasting half as long between charges, even with screen light turned way down. New one also takes longer to “wake up”. Old model was almost instantaneous where the new one can take a minute or so. Not a big deal but defiantly annoying. The battery is my big concern.

author: Delinda
title: It is smaller than the normal Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like it.  I like that you can read without an extra light.  I have not tried the "read to me" option and this is the reason I purchased it.  I like to listen to books while I drive.  If this works as good as my previous Kindle did, I will be extremely happy.  this is my 3rd Kindle.  I used my other 2 until they died so they are great products.

author: Timothy P. Monaghan
title: Small And Thus Flexible
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: OK, a bit iPad give the best reading experience, but this little ebook fits in your pocket (easily in an inner coat pocket) and that's it's advantages. No color, but way more brighter and easier to read than the non-paperwhite kindle.  (I think the original paperwhite was brighter, but, it's been awhile)

author: petunia
title: the whole  Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Like it very much.  Love the fact that it has a light so I can read in bed.I like too that it can be connected to WiFi and I don't have to runto my computer all the time.  Glad I bought it.

author: Neo Doc
title: Not reliable - keep your old Kindle!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Number one I hate transferring all my unread books to the active part of my library-always miss some and it takes forever .. but that problem happens when you buy any new Kindle. What I don’t like about my new Kindle is that it spontaneously turns itself off randomly!!! Usually when it’s at 70% charge .. a real pain!!

author: David l
title: Not even close to my old(Version 6) Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Unfortunately I lost my last Kindle . That was my 3rd one and I loved them all.  I replaced my lost one with this new  one Version(10) Kindle. It is just awful . I find it skips ahead for no reason, lacks some of the extras such as games and the size is too small. Iam constantly turning pages. I am very unbhappy with this version

author: Robynhasthree
title: Awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I gave this to my mother as a Christmas gift. She's an avid book reader. She eventually said this was so much easier than regular books and so much lighter. So glad I gave it to her.

author: jana hoyle
title: My 4th Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am an avid reader so I burn through Kindles. Oddly enough my first one still works but is not back lit. I love my new kindle. Very light weight but it does not seem to be holding a charge as long as the others. I am a little surprised by this but again, I am not your average reader so it is probably my reading style.

author: david Siebold
title: Just what I was looking for
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I wanted to able to read comfortably without holding a big book all the time - and this works for me.

author: Mbeth
title: I miss my old Kindle's Home page
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Kindle works fine.  I'm adjusting to the smaller size from my previous Kindle. (screen is the same size)  It will be easier to pack when traveling but seems less comfortable for me to hold.Also, I do not like the Home page. You have to scroll to Your Library to see the books you currently have downloaded as the Home page includes too much other "stuff" like: Your Reading Lists and Monthly Reading Summary and This Year in Books 2018....

author: Cyrus Bazeghi
title: Great upgrade from last generation
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This latest generation is very slick. I like the edge to edge screen and slimmer design. Being water proof is great as I like to read in the pool without worrying about getting it wet. Having more storage and the ability to pair a bluetooth headset is cool. Now you can use the Kindle to play your Audible books as well.

author: Jules R.
title: Great Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I LOVE this Kindle! I was recently in the Bahamas and saw several people around the pool reading on their Kindles. As soon as I got home, I ordered this Kindle. LOVE the size!!! It is so easy to use and I love reading on it! I used to carry my iPad around to read on but this is so much easier. I highly recommend it!!!

author: Janet L. Caputo
title: Kindle would not move from "waking up..." mode.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had to press and hold the kindle to get it to turn off.  Tried to turn it on again and it worked fine, but I am concerned the kindle will do the same thing again.  I'm going to charge it again and see how it acts.  Prior Kindles never  malfunctioned like this!  Plan to request an exchange if this continues.

author: Easy Rider
title: You’re going to have to buy a new cover if you’re upgrading from the old paperwhite.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Disappointed that the cover from my old paper white did not fit the new one. No need for that.

author: Brontoswife
title: Screen not very reactive
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the size, the long charge, and the non-glare features of this product. I love that I can read 15 books in one trip while only carrying this little bitty item. However, I feel like the response of the screen is unreliable sometimes and often slow to load the next page of the book or home screen.

author: Mikey
title: Love the Kindle, Hate the start up problems.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: We have 4 Kindles in our home.  I love my Kindle.  I got the new Kindle Paperwhite for my wife for Christmas.  It took HOURS TO GET IT SETUP!  I had problems getting it to communicate with our house WIFI/Bluetooth sys.  Very frustrating.  It's finally working fine and the wife really likes it a lot better than her old Kindle.

author: Walter B Turner
title: I Like It
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old Kindle started acting funny so I decided it was time for a replacement. This one works well, the screen is easy to read and once I figured out the new software it was a breeze to use. Good battery life. Images are a little better than the old one I had, but if you want image quality get a Fire.

author: Rlmgolfer
title: New and improved Kindle Paperwhite is worth the upgrade.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Same old terrific Kindle qualities with lighter device, better lighting and a flat reading surface. Haven't had the occasion to test the waterproof capabilities yet. Definitely glad I ordered the 2018 Paperwhite version. I also have the Oasis but now prefer to use the new Paperwhite more often. I do wish it had page turning buttons, however.

author: Faye
title: Worth the upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A little difficult getting familiar to the new style after upgrading from an original Kindle. The new screen seems very busy and I am still learning to navigate. Wonder what happened to all my previous books as few of them came forward. Still the new unit is an improvement and worth the effort of getting familiar with it.

author: Shawn
title: It Does What It is Supposed to Do
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Kindle is fine.  The only reason that I didn't give it a 5 is because the charger that Amazon sent with it did not fit.  The company subsequently sent one that fit, but there is no excuse for the bad manufacturing.  Had I tried to force the first charger, and I came close, I could have damaged the unit.

author: Ali
title: Great for those who like long baths.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have never really been on an e-reader train before, preferring actual books than a screen.  This changed that for me.  I love reading in the bath with a glass of wine, and I always worried about getting my books wet and ruined.  No more!  I pre-ordered this and haven’t looked back since.Battery life is great.  I’ve charged it twice since it came out on the 7th, and have already read like 8 books with it.Now all I need is a waterproof case for it, since I am prone to dropping things and I’ll be set!

author: Digital Dreamer
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been a Kindle fan ever since the first Kindle came out. While I don't get every version that comes out this one got my attention. It has more storage space, Bluetooth capabilities and the fact that it's waterproof made me want this. So far, I'm loving this version and I'm glad I waited to see what they would come out with.

author: Software Goddess
title: My favorite e-reader - even better than ever!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this kindle paper-white. It is my constant companion, fitting easily into my purse, and protecting me from countless hours of boredom in doctors/dentist/therapist offices! Tucked safely in a zip-loc bag she also accompanies me to the hot tub. I couldn't do without her! This is my fourth or fifth kindle, and each one is better than the previous one!!

author: Karen Moran
title: Too small and hard to navigate
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is very small and light so it is hard to hold and read but you can't lay it down to read. It was easy to set up but hard to find answers to questions I had when getting started reading. I still haven't found my book list all I see is a list of books that I do not own.  I want my old Kindle!!!!!!!

author: wolfman
title: Great for avid readers
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought this for my wife for Christmas as she was constantly making trips to the book stores and then standing there for a long time trying to find a good book. She absolutely LOVES it and it is so convenient to review books prior to buying and the Amazon specials that are constantly being offered are great !!! One of the better gift ideas I have ever come up with for her !! Wish I would have done this a long time ago.

author: Sarah H
title: Slow
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Slow to respond. Also has bright white spot that is super distracting when reading.  Hoping to contact Amazon and see if it can be replaced.  Was really hoping to love it but having it slow to process anything and having the screen defective makes it difficult to use.

author: Andy
title: It's a great e-reader for people that have visual impairments
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I enjoy the ease of reading the text on screen, I'm blind in on eye and have glaucoma in the other and it's still easy for me to read, I use the features to adjust the font size and make it bold. I love it very much.

author: Carlos A.
title: Compared against Kindle 8va Generation Basic
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgrade my 8th Generation Kindle , the basic model and I am very dissapointed because the new Kindle works slower from 8th generation. I supposed this generation worked faster and all around improve, but I was wrong. The water resistance and the paperwhite function works well, but navigate from the Kindle in Home Screen it's worst.

author: Sonji
title: BEAUTIFUL!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I needed a new kindle as my older model was having some issues - this newer version is wonderful!  It's smaller, light weight, holds more books and of course, it's waterproof!  I have some hand issues and this kindle is easy to handle.  The instructions are easier to follow on the screen also.  I'm in love!

author: Nuclear Girl
title: Fourth Kindle I've Owned & Best So Far
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've owned 4 Kindles, starting from the First Generation and I have loved every one.  I like the improvements that are made with each of the new release I've purchased.  I don't go anywhere without my Kindle.

author: Pleased reader
title: the advantages and freedom that Kindle provides.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The primary advantage of the Kindle is the instant library.  I have shelves full of books and no more room to provide for additional reading material.  The Kindle Library allows for that additional reading material without having to add more shelves and or get rid of books one wants to keep.  I have the tenth edition of the Kindle and the Leather cover that I recently purchased is not only practical, beautiful but when you open. its cover it automatically awakens the Kindle.  Battery life is also lengthy and that in itself is worthy of positive comment.  respectfully, John Mena

author: George K
title: Not a step forward, more backward!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This product shuts itself off too quicky and there is no control over this "feature". The closure process cannot be stopped when it begins to shut off instead of being able to be maintained open by touching the screen. The cover does not have a magnetic auto open feature making my old cover useless. The waterproof feature has no attraction whatsover if it is supposed to be a big deal. If/when I find my old Paperwhite which I misplaced I will go back to it immediately.

author: Kenn Brody
title: I can read in the hot tub or pool
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Long, long battery life, clear text, almost inexhaustible storage, and I don't have to worry about it getting wet.  This is my 4th Kindle, and the only Gen 10 issue.Good luck getting it to pair with Airphones for audiobooks, though.  The instructions don't cover getting the Airphones into pairing mode...

author: Varejao17
title: Best New Feature on the Paperwhite:  White text / Black background...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm surprised this isn't mentioned more prominently, as this is a huge deal for me (or more my SO).  Now you can invert the screen at night with the lights off.  Settings -> Accessibility

author: John M. Amberg
title: You can read in the bathtub again and not worry.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I took the plunge today and read my Kindle in a hot tub, the only thing better was to have a glass of wine( i did not).While I did not dunk it, it  worked great. I have few readers and this is becoming my favorite.  As with all things digital you can not  sell them at a book swap.  Maybe some day.

author: N T
title: Well worth a trade in if you're contemplating!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle. I have the Oasis, which is smaller and I love that too, however I like the fact that this is waterproof, no buttons, and it's lighter then my very first Kindle. I traded in my first Kindle and bought this. I plan on taking this on trips, in the case that I had purchased, that also fits its accessories.

author: J. Parks
title: Impressive
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Display quality very good. Text easy to read and easy to change text size. Found that the experimental browser works well and is a lot faster than my old Kindle. Although when displaying pictures the resolution is not optimal. I prefer to display pictures on my Galaxy Tab 4. All in all the new Kindle Paper White is well worth the upgrade.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good device for reading books.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Kindle Paperwhite is light and small, making it easy to handle and carry in a pocket.  I also bought the non leather cover to give the device some protection.  The screen is easy on the eyes no matter what the background lighting.  I have found that the battery for me doesn't last the weeks as advertised, but I also read a lot. The only other complaint I have is the power button is on the bottom edge of the device.  When I am reading long hours in a chair.  I rest the device on my thigh and have on several occasions inadvertently powered it down.  A window comes up asking if you really want to shut down, so you can stop the process.  It only seems to happen in the good parts of the story.

author: PaulaRaye
title: My Kindle is my Sanity
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old kindle had been dropped several times and after about 5 years of faithful service, simply bit the dust. I love my new one for the same reasons I loved my old one. I have wet AMD and am losing my eyesight so the ability to adjust the print size is a blessing. I am the type of person who panics if I don't have a book to read!

author: Cheryl Barron
title: Like it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Wow! The light feature is a relief on my eyes-day or night. My other kindle is now my spouses and still working. But without a light over shoulder was hard on eyes. Easy to learn too.

author: musikman79
title: Great storage capacity and battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery life for this kindle is great. I may need to place it on the charger once a week. Just getting started with downloading my library.

author: dona crouse
title: Still prefer the original kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I do like the new one I have gotten with light.  I will say that the new kindle readers in my opinion are so thin that you almost have to have a case!.  I definitely would love to be able to use my original kindle which I got in 2009/2010.  If I could get a battery I would have it fixed!  Anyone who knows how this might happen, I would appreciate any info you can give me.

author: Andrea
title: Great size and easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it, I bought it as a Christmas gift for my husband, it is so difficult to get him something and finally I nail it. He is so happy, already purchased books and started reading again. The size is perfect.

author: GAP
title: The best eInk reader on the market
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Best reader yet! Adding waterproof literally lets you read anywhere your heart desires. Nice size and weight so you can read for hours. Easy set up and with more storage space than you will probably ever need. The ability to listen to Audible books is a nice touch. The price is great especially considering all the features.

author: coppermaker
title: Backpacking waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Paperwhite gives me the added bonus of reading in the dark over my old kindle. Also being water proof is nice since I camp and hike and I like to read in the woods.

author: eblanck
title: It works but feels so outdated
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been reading books on my ipad for years now and thought a Kindle woud be better because it is lighter and not attached to a bunch of distracting games.  True enough it is those things, but the graphics feel really outdated and pixel-ly and it is hard to highlight and take notes because the screen is not quickly responsive to touch.

author: Pablo A. López
title: Slow, really sloow and not intuitive interface.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: An awful experience. It’s incredibly slow, it took me 20 minutes to sign in on my wifi network ( open woth security after joining the wifi, credentials are entered on browser)The interface is not well designed, if you have pdfs of your own, you're probably gonna be better with a chromebook. When you zoom in, moving through the page is painfully difficult. Hopefully I’ll hace time this week to return it. Worst mistake of this new year.

author: Sudonaut
title: Beats my phone or notebook for reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Readable under any lighting conditions. Much easier than holding a hard bound or even a paperback book. Probably operator error, but I find I accidentally move forward or back a page or two, and without page numbers I am lost. Otherwise, I like being able to read  anywhere, in any position, in comfort.

author: A Little Bit Of Everything
title: Okay
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The thing that appealed to me with this version was it says it's waterproof. Though the packaging says it cannot be immersed in water? I don't know why the description says it can be. I bought it to read in the pool and the bath, so this is a little disappointing. I do like the size of it though.

author: Ladyfair524
title: Performs as Advertised
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I decided to "trade in" my old Kindle for a newer version and though I don't plan to test whether or not it is waterproof, it's good to know that if the unexpected happens, it shouldn't be a problem. I haven't had it for very long, but so far it is performing as expected and I haven't had any problem with it.

author: Concerned dog lover
title: Sluggish response
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I do like the new Kindle Paperwhite compared to my Oasis; however, the software is so very sluggish!  I have only about 50 books downloaded yet every touch takes several seconds to process and it's very frustrating.

author: Joshua James Killian
title: Great improvement over the previous model!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far, I like everything about the new Kindle. It does have that pinhole bright spot, but the position of the spot doesn't interfere with reading. (At least, not on my Kindle. I don't know about anyone else's). It's much lighter than my old Kindle too.  I also like the fact that it supports Audible, though as of this writing I haven't downloaded any audiobooks yet. Definitely worth the five star rating!

author: saint4God
title: Light Weight, Long Battery Life, No Glare
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My wife has the Fire HD, but wanted something portable and for the poolside.  She now uses this one for reading everywhere because of its light weight, but the other for tv shows & movies.  Excellent addition to the Kindle line-up.  I'd recommend a protective cover if you're using it in a room without carpet or for traveling.

author: Kris B
title: Excellent Design
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Upgraded from previous gen Paperwhite just because of the screen being flush with edges and for the glossy smooth finish. I hated the paper like textured screen on previous gen and raised edges annoyed me. The new version solves these issues and is easily the best Paperwhite ever made by Amazon.

author: Patty
title: Size
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This size is much easier to handle when reading for extended periods and very light weight.  The only feature I find a problem is the on-off button.  It requires the slightest pressure and I find myself inadvertently turning off this newest Paperwhite, however, it starts up very quickly when that occurs.  This is my third Kindle ereader and the best of all.

author: Double Trouble
title: I can do Audible too!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is the best E Reader ever.  Its small but easy to read.  I love the fact I can listen to books as well.  I had 2 older Kindles but this is by far the best.  THANK YOU!

author: Banksiana
title: Power button designed by moron
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought this to replace a Voyage that was stolen. Miss the Voyage terribly. I've also owned previous version of Paperwhite which was a better reader. Was thrilled at the water resistance but in operation this model is super annoying. Power button is sensitive. If I use it on very smooth treadmill not only does it turn itself off but it goes into full reset mode (dialogue box offers a cancel option, but if you hit the cancel button it still goes through the reset). I guess its only made to use held in your hand. Or perhaps Bezos is trying to pay for his divorce settlement by forcing the purchase of covers. Someone should be fired.

author: Richard
title: Not that great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Paperwhite and I am not impressed.  The battery life is awful.  Maybe you get "weeks" of battery if you don't read but I am charging every few days.  I HATE the way Amazon has added all of the library and sticks Goodreads junk on my Kindle.  I prefer to add my books as I want to read them and not have to muddle through everything.  It feels like Amazon is bullying me by forcing me to do it their way.I love reading on a Kindle for lots of reasons but this latest version is most likely going to be returned.

author: Michael R. Larsen
title: All New Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle device, I cannot go without one, I carry it everywhere. I bought the new device for the new features. Waterproof and audio books. I read 50-60 books a year and place a high value on ease of use and portability. Great product, easy to move all my books from my Kindle Voyage to the Paperwhite. No issues

author: AZ Reader
title: Battery life is terrible. Not 3G like my last one even though it said it was.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle. It said the battery could last up to 8 weeks. The battery doesn’t even last 8 hours much less 8 weeks. I tried calling Amazon and I get foreigners that I can barely understand telling me to restart it. I have several times and the battery still won’t hold a charge. I have had this kindle less than a month!!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: GREAT LITTLE READER
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I LOVE THE EASE OF USING THIS READER - REMEMBERS AND OPENS TO THE LAST PAGE READ, AND LOVE THE TOUCH EITHER SIDE TO ADVANCE OR GO BACK A PAGE - AND DOWNLOADS BOOKS IN SECONDSI GAVE UP READING A LONG TIME AGO BEAUSE EVERY TIME I PUT A BOOK IN MY HAND I INSTANTLY FELL ASLEEP - THIS IS MY FIRST E-READER AND I HAVE ALREAY READ 6 BOOKS IN LESS THAN 2 WEEKS - IT IS JUST A DIFFERENT READING EXPERIENCE - I LOVE IT - EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE ONE!

author: Barb
title: Operating My Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 1.  I do not want to highlight words or passages, and I don’t want kindle to do it for me!2.  I do not want to change the font size when I’m reading, and I don’t want kindle to change it for me! If I want to change the font size, I will do so.3.  Why does kindle need updating every few minutes? In other words the device does not run smoothly. Surely by now you would - or should -  have fixed these problems.

author: Cynthia DiAmore
title: VERY IMPRESSED!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just received my new Kindle for Christmas, started using it in Jan. and now a few months later the battery will not hold a charge......NOT happy …* IMPORTANT UPDATE...I RECEIVED A CALL FROM AMAZON AS SOON AS I POSTED MY PROBLEM, THEY WERE WONDERFUL! THEY WALKED ME THROUGH THE FIX (WHICH TOOK 40 SECONDS) THEY CALLED ME THE NEXT DAY, MAKING SURE I WAS SATISFIED...MANY MANY THANK YOUS AMAZON

author: Lottie
title: Mostly great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: the only real problem I have is because this is a "swipe" product, it is easy to go somewhere you don't intend. Otherwise, easy to set up and use. My original Kindle lasted 8 years and was still going but since I was going on a trip, didn't want to find my luck ran out. Hope this one lasts that long too.

author: M. Gastineau
title: Glitchy and Slow
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I found this to be too glitchy and slow for me to enjoy reading on. I purchased it so that I could read in low light situations and not use my phone (trying to get away from the blue light effect at bedtime), but I found that the glitchiness of the display and slowness of turning pages made me not want to keep it. It may be great for someone who can overlook these flaws, but as someone who is used to smoothness in her e-reader, this just didn't work for me.

author: happy
title: Like the waterproof Paperwhite, detest being FORCED into purchasing the Amazon cover
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with a waterproof Paperwhite. It is smaller around the edges than my other Paperwhite. What I absolutely did not appreciate is being FORCED into purchasing the Amazon kindle $40 cover to get the th I wanted. Used to be you could select the gb. I find Amazon kindle covers to be too expensive and inferior to finite covers.

author: historybuff
title: It’s ok
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Screen should be bigger. It’s ok. But I guess I was spoiled. I did have a Kindle DX, which had a very big screen. The DX stopped working. Wish It still worked. The paper white will do. But I preferred a device with a little bigger screen.

author: AJEvyDar
title: No more text to speech capabilities
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I took advantage of a special offer to trade in my old Kindle Touch.  The new Paperwite is smaller, lighter, backlit and easier to hold. The one feature I really miss is “text to speech”. It allowed me to listen to books in the car without having to spend more to get an audible version and separate Bluetooth speaker. I hope future models bring back text to speech.

author: Frank Giglio
title: A great purchase
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the ability to read outdoors in the sunlight. The new Paperwhite is lightweight and with the cover I purchased easily placed for perfect reading. The price was the best I have seen. We had purchased one for our 9 year old grandson and he loves it. I used that review to purchase one for myself. I am thrilled with the purchase.

author: Marge W
title: Great E-reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I haven't had a Kindle E-reader for quite some time and I was happily surprised.  It works great and the page turns are very quick and responsive.  My only suggestion would be to change the position of the power button.  I read the reviews and decided to get it anyway.  Although I don't use my device at the gym, it still is bothersome and is easy to inadvertently hit the button.  Otherwise I love it.

author: Rick C.
title: No eye strain whenreading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really a great buy, only for reading, which is great, no distractions. It is much easier to read, no eyestrain than nook or reading from your your IPad or other device. I had a ton of books and I just quit reading unless I physically had the book. I would recommend this with no reservations. Font is easy to set. Very easy. Buy it

author: MovieLover
title: Battery issue
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery doesn't last nearly as long as the last generation paperwhite. If Amazon fixes this, I hope they give those of us who bought the new one a free trade-in for the fixed one.

author: Russ in Elk Grove
title: Original one had a defective charging socket
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Charge plug would not fully engage in the socket of the original, so we sent it in to the service center.  They immediately replaced it with a new one which works fine.  Our only complaint is that this is slightly smaller than the old PaperWhite so the cover does not fit.  Seems silly to change the size so slightly.

author: J. Roscovius
title: Great Kindle!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am really happy with this Kindle. The backlight is awesome and easily adjustable. I haven't read the manual yet, but it has a lot more features than my Kindle Touch, which I also loved. I decided I had it long enough, so I traded it in towards the Paperwhite. The thickness and the size are great!!

author: Gary C.
title: Anothet failed kindle paper white!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love to read with the kindle paper white.  However it does not work.  The pages  lockup and will not turn to the next page.  Sometimes I  can go back a couple pages and then go forward.  This the same problem I had with the first kindle paper white I bought and this is a replacement.  It seems to be an ongoing problem.  I will return this and go back my original kindle.  I am very disappointed!!

author: Pamela J. Veenstra
title: Cannot use for all audiobooks
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was disappointed that I cannot use for my audiobooks downloaded from my library. Apparently ONLY Audible brand bought audio will play! Also, you can only use with WIRELESS earphones. I liked the new continuous surface (my 2 old Paperwhites tended to catch fine hairs where the surface met the frame). Battery life NOT noticeably longer as claimed.

author: Brooke
title: Good device but let’s get the charger right Amazon
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The device is everything I expected. The battery last very long but I do not keep WiFi or Bluetooth on. The only issue is that the charger that came in the box does not fit; How did Amazon possibly get that wrong? Other chargers fit fine, including the one from my previous 2015 paperwhite, so I’m only marking down one star.

author: golfereen
title: Still trying to navigate.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This will probably be 5 stars in a short time, however, right now I am still trying to figure out how to navigate the new Kindle Paperwhite.  I am used to the older style and knowing how to move around in it.I love the smaller size, fits easily in my handbag and with the cover that I purchased for it, stays nice and safe.

author: rhonda mellons
title: Wonderful for sun
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am loving my Paperwhite.  It isn't completely glare proof; however, all you do is tilt it one way or the other!  Great for sun and reading at the beach or pool.  Taking mine on my cruise in May!  Can't wait.  It hold TONS of books.  I don't care for the ads, but they're not that obtrusive.

author: Victoria A. Wilson
title: Christmas present for Husband
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I got this as a Christmas present for my husband.  He has not stopped reading it yet.  The battery life is amazing, the size is great and the cover I got for it is perfect.  The only thing I would change is the on board charging porthole.  It was very difficult to get the charger fully in.

author: Kindle Customer
title: new paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I read; a lot.  The size is smaller than what I had and it is easier to hold for long periods of time.  It has a great battery life and I can read 3 books in a day and still have battery.  Easy to read in bed/dark.  No real eye strain except for when I read for hours.  Pretty sure that isn't the Kindle's fault.  Like the others easy to bump up the font when you have tired eyes but can't see anymore and simply can't leave the story unfinished.

author: Texacanuk
title: Great But Still Lacking
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Seamless startup. Settings are a bit complex. Should be one touch access to all settings, not multi level access. Disappointed no animated page turn.

author: Kerri Speakman
title: Very Good Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My husband purchased this kindle for me as a birthday gift to replace my 2012 kindle (that still works). I love that this kindle is waterproof, as I enjoy reading in the bath tub but worry that I'm going to ruin my books. It's very low glare and keeps a charge for a long time!

author: Mik Sak
title: It's a Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that the memory is larger than my past Kindle.  Being water resistant is a plus for vacation time.  It did surprise me that when opened after many hours or days the new Kindle must wake up before one can swipe it unlocked.  Perhaps this helps the batteery life?  I can't image going back to a non-PaperWhite version after two of these.  I'd buy again.

author: geri
title: Love my kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This kindle is perfect for taking with you when you have to wait somewhere. About 2 days after I got this my old kindle gave up the ghost so I was glad to have this. I love the flat screen so there is no edge to bump into when you are scrolling or turning the page. I love that I can see the screen in any lighting!

author: T Stricker
title: Nice upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I loved my previous generation Kindle but after wearing out the arm on my second external light I really appreciate the integral back lighting. Controls are pretty intuitive but like with any touch screen device I often find myself several pages away from where I started if I'm not careful picking it up.

author: thomas e. archer
title: Why does it  frequently turn off.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like it, but it turns off frequently and I have to wait to it to thru the process of turning back on.  Also, I like the reading process, amount of time left in book.  I click on it and then before long it disappears and I have to go back and hit it again.  Not really satisfied with it.

author: Sarah
title: Battery life is shorter
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Paperwhite. The shadows that used to line the bottom of the previous model are nonexistent. I love that the surface is flat, but would have liked the screen to be textured like my old Paperwhite. The battery does drain a bit faster, but hasn’t inhibited me yet. It’s just noticeable.

author: Alan Richardson
title: Easy Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Got this to take on several road trips planned instead of toting around paperbacks. Really compact and really, easy to read screen. Nice selection of books through Amazon as well.

author: Torrin-McFinn77
title: Useful and portable
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I liked everything about it. Lots of books that I downloaded and can read on my own time. I can take it with me on long trips or bus rides. Could use some color though.

author: Carolyn R. Pierson
title: Too small
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that it has more storage but was disappointed that it is so small. My other model is bigger and I still use it more. Waterproofing doesn’t matter to me. I don’t read in the tub or near water.

author: Stephanie Russell
title: LOVE IT!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my Kindle Paperwhite! I have three Kindle Fires (all varying sizes and generations) and this is definitely my favorite of them all. It is light, the battery lasts forever, and it doesn't slow down as you add more books to it. I feel like the Kindle Fires slow down bc of the extra apps that you can add to it.

author: Stressed Out Mom
title: Be careful what you order
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am not sure if I somehow missed it, but this is a Wi-Fi only Paperwhite!  I have always had Wi-Fi + Free Cellular Connectivity. The free cellular connectivity option is very important to me since I travel and am sometimes without wireless.  I even checked the comparison chart to make sure the new Paperwhite had the free cellular option. However, this version is Wi-Fi only.

author: Maureen McFarlane
title: Never thought a device would re-ignite my love of reading by its comfort of use.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this kindle!  Originally I thought this would be too small to use daily but in the last 10 days I have hardly put it down and as a result I am tearing through my kindle library.  Thank goodness for Amazon Prime Kindle Unlimited.  This is light weight and easy on the eyes in sunshine or low light.

author: Peanuts Norton
title: Adore My Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle, second Paperwhite Kindle, and I love using it.  I have arthritis in my hands which makes it difficult to hold books for long periods of time but the Kindle is so light and convenient, I can hold it for hours.  I also love the dictionary feature when I'm reading and run across an unfamiliar word.  I just cannot be without my Kindle anymore.  I utilized the trade-in program this year to get my new one.

author: L. Wood
title: Size is different
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very pleased.  It is slightly smaller than the previous one which is somewhat of a problem for the case I keep it in.  I will have to tape it in.

author: Susan W
title: Easy on the eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I traded in my 8 year old graphite Kindle (grey scale print and tabs on the side to turn the page). It served my faithfully, but this new Paperwhite is such a treat! The screen is very easy on the eyes and I love the back light for reading in dark situations. Touch screen is nice too and having it waterproof is an added bonus. Battery life seems great so far too which is important to me and why I like a reader vs. a fire or iPad. It is light weight and easy to hold.

author: Cindy Mulkey
title: Do not EVER bother with trading in a Kindle towards the purchase of a new one
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Amazon has a program whereby you can trade in your older Kindle to buy a new one; do not do it.  Nothing is worth the aggravation of dealing with representatives who are cannot speak English and have no desire to help.  After an hour and being transferred three times to three incompetent people, I just gave up and returned everything including the new Kindle.  Now, Amazon is taking its sweet time in refunding the $ 130 I am owed back to my credit card.  If you want a new Kindle, just buy it outright because nothing is worth dealing with their trade in division.

author: Raul Rodriguez Caceres
title: One of the Best Choices on the market
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The product offers almost everything you may find for a reader of its kind with an excellent build quality. As most readers is not as fast as a tablet if you plan to read only pdfs, but for ebook files (MOBI, EPUB,etc) it gives all the tools you need to read, annotate, highlight, translate and share your reading in any situation (unlike tablets that struggle on high light conditions and tire your eyes faster). It also offers the access to one the most complete ebook shops in the whole world with titles in many languages. You can also import books from other platforms and free ebook sources (Like Gutember Project)  including amazon itself with free "Calibre" software.

author: Britt
title: Love it after 2 weeks of use!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love that this Kindle fits in my coat pocket or purse so I can carry it everywhere! I love the battery life. I bought it 2 weeks ago and have only charged it that night and not again. I bought the fabric cover for it from Amazon and it puts the Kindle to sleep when you're not using it. it's perfect, really! No qualms or complaints about this little device.

author: Carolyn O
title: Useless
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is only an advertising gimmick from Amazon.  Cannot download files for reading, cannot access my audible library only stuff they are trying to sell.  Had to send it back, utterly useless.  Pages dont move unless swipped a dozen times, better off getting books printed off, cost less than this rubbish

author: R. Elizabeth Brooks
title: Great battery life and easy on the eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This slim reader along with the case I bought can easily be dropped into a handbag for portability. The battery life lasts long enough to read an entire book. The simple downloading of books through Amazon make it a real treasure

author: Amazon Customer
title: Can't use existing digital news subscriptions on my new paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Amazon support just informed me that I can NOT use my existing digital news subscription on my new paperwhite!  I MUST purchase an additional "AMAZON" subscription to be able to read the digital news that I have already paid for.AND, the battery life is not 'Days' of reading but rather days of shelf life.  Reading time is only about 10 hours.  ..........very disappointed with this product!!!

author: Heather
title: Just what I wanted
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is exactly what I wanted. I replaced my 2012 Kindle Fire, and decided I didn’t need to be able to browse the internet or play games, since I have my phone for that. So I went with the PaperWhite just for reading, and it’s great. Super light-weight, I love the backlit screen so I can finish reading after my husband turns out the light at night. Also, glare was a pet peave of mine with my old Kindle, and this one took care of that.

author: Mary Newell
title: Paperwork review
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Like size and battery life but, it keeps freezing up and it seems to have to set 24 hours and then you have to deregister and the register it over again . Have called Amazon and didn't get satisfactory results on it  I think they should replace but they just said call they back when it keeps happening. Warranty expires on Jan 30 so they keep putting off I think .

author: Nikky Trufin
title: I love that’s it’s waterproof. Makes sitting by the pool less nerve racking.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the size. The weight is light for holding up for long periods of time. The only think I need to get use to is the screen. I know it helps with being waterproof but it’s taking me a little to get use to. But it don’t bother me enough that it’s a huge deal. The battery life is awesome I can’t even remember the last time I have charged it.

author: El
title: Not as user friendly as the App on my phone
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I loved the color tones they used, much easier on the eyes.  Unfortunately the programming itself is clunky.  I get much more ease and functionality from the kindle app on my phone.  Rather disappointing.  The whole reason for getting this was to get off of my phone when reading, but I find myself going back to my phone because it's easier to maneuver.

author: Ann B.
title: New Kindle Paperwhite .... AMAZING!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought my first Kindle Paperwhite in 2010.  Loved it and used it until I got my new one in December.  The navigation is great, the size is wonderful.  I just can't say how much I love it!  I do most of my reading in bed before going to sleep.  The new paperwhite is small and light enough to handle … so much easier than my old one.  The screen is the same size so you are keeping the same page size.  I also bought a cover to protect it.  It is magnetic, looks great and again is so very light.  The entire unit fits in my purse so easily.  Thanks to Amazon Kindle for coming up with all the improvements from the old version.  Can you tell I really love the product?

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good item to buy if you read.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
