body: Dropped in water and still works. Holds charge for a long time. Lighting is good, easy on the eyes. Only dislike is that it takes a little bit to learn the settings. Not so easy for non-tech savvy humans. I think better wording would help, and a “home” button that is actually a button at the bottom.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Backlight and water resistant
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery life is nice but the backlight is nicer. Now I can read in a dark bedroom without disturbing spouse. I haven't felt the need to test the water resistant claim. But nice to know it's there. My Touch was full of books and I was deleting books to make room for new ones. This 8 Gig Paperwhite is half full now after transferring the documents from the earlier one.

author: KC2SF
title: Cannot charge.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Cannot charge because the cable microport does not fit into the device. Now chatting with CS.

author: JenRuss
title: LOVE
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My husband gifted this to me for xmas because I kept complaining about how my old one was draggin and glitching a bit.  I had that one for about 4 years and read on it nightly..... so it lasted and lasted.  My new one is SO much lighter and it is quicker.  Not much has changed.  I love it just the same

author: Lightening
title: Poor quality control of charging cable
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What I like this kindle most is the light weight and small size. It's so easy to carry around and doesn't feel much weight. The wake up response seems slower compared to my iPad. So is the overall processing speed.What's most disappointing is that the charging cable (came with the nice looking kindle package) does not fit in the port at all. It's hard to believe such a poor quality control is associated with Amazon's top brand product.

author: R. R. Peterson
title: Replaced Older Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought the new paper white to replace my previous older Kindle.  I liked the screen illumination and smaller size of the new unit.  Waterproofing is also a plus.  My experience so far has been very positive.  Once I got used to the operating changes, I found it to be a pleasant little reader.

author: BRANDI
title: Bookworms rejoice!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new/waterproof/larger capacity Paperwhite is a wonderful device. I use it nightly. It's a pleasant/user-friendly reader that holds a myriad of books/documents.  The features (brightness settings, font, letter size etc..) are delightfully customizable. I highly recommend this version of Paperwhite. 5 STARS! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

author: Jean N. du Treil
title: Easy to use.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just text no ads. Back lighting for reading at night. Loads books quickly, sorry Kindle Fire. You can choose font, print size and spacing. It is light weight so you can hold it for hours. Speaking of hours, the battery last for days. It is fun to use and makes reading so enjoyable.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really like how it reads more like a book. I have had the original Kindle (still have it), a Kindle Fire (let my husband have it because I did not like it) and now the Paperwhite (which my Mom stole from me because she liked it so much). It is very easy to use (my Mom does not like computers!), easy on the eyes, larger screen that original Kindle. It also has a lot of options (font size, background shades and the intensity of the brightness) that can be changed to make reading easier, especially for an older adult with vision issues. Hence, why my Mom hijacked it. I guess I have to just buy another. :)

author: Donald
title: Great reader.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I went on a trip with the Kindle in the middle of my carry on bag, returned home and found the screen cracked in multiple places and the battery dead and unresponsive. It was gate checked for one leg of my trip. Fortunately, Amazon examined and replaced it. Now it’s my favorite way to read.

author: theodene
title: Lightweight and easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love this all new kindle Paperwhite!! The screen is smoother, the words clearer, processor quicker, and I’m reading more now than with my previous Paperwhite. It’s lighter so it doesn’t hurt as much when I fall asleep reading and it falls on my face! So glad I got it!

author: DLS
title: Love my Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I just purchased the new Kindle Paperwhite.  This is my second paperwhite.  The first is being used by my 95 year old mother who has vision problems.  The new one is for me to use.  It is smaller than the first one and readily fits in a purse.  I also have only charged it once.  It will be great for our camping trips this summer!  DLS

author: meta
title: Awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Who knew having a back-lit Kindle would make all the difference in the world? I didn't. Received this as a gift and am in reading heaven - no more book light with batteries that don't last - and it is clear and easy to read. It has worked wonderfully well for a month now and I could not be happier.

author: Ginny Aybar-Flores
title: Not very happy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Though I love the smaller size I am not happy with the fact that I have to charge it every 3 days, unlike my old PaperWhite which I charged once a month. Not happy I did the trade-in with my old device, I wish I kept it so I could return this one and still have something to read.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Ups and downs
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love this product! It's waterproof, it has the ability to invert the colors for the user's preference and it really helps save space for people like me who don't have a lot of space left for physical books. The fact that there is no glare is the best since I'm prone to migraines. The downfall in this product is that for the price, I would hope it would have tablet capabilities, including a better response time when tapping the screen. Maybe I purchased the wrong product but I didn't see any other Paperwhite options. Otherwise, it's great and I still recommend it.

author: Jess
title: Great for those who love reading!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I received this as a gift because I was using the kindle app on my phone. So far I love it! The screen lighting is adjustable so I can read in low light and it still has the “paper” look to it so there’s no glare if you’re reading in direct sunlight. The direct access to goodreads and other features is a great plus for those who use that site. My only complaint is I needed access to WiFi to get all my previously purchased books and I did not have that while hunting. An easy fix. All in all a great addition to the home for avid readers!The features

author: The Rainbow Druid
title: It's Okay
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It technically works fine, but I find it is incredibly slow and difficult to use. I was excited for this, but I've simply gotten too frustrated to continue using it.

author: Dalin
title: I'd choose Kindle... Over any other e-readers!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Currently, I own the 4th Gen of basic Kindle, 1st Gen of Kindle Paperwhite, and the 2nd Gen of Kindle Oasis. And now.. this device. I don't complain. I don't even have any complaints when it comes to the Paperwhite. Unlike my Oasis, this one comes in with lighter weight with a lot of identical features. So, if you're looking for an e-reader that has similar features to the Oasis but with limited budget, this one is for you. :D

author: Loria Corder
title: Paperwhite Generation10
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Horrible, I just received the kindle in the mail today, Unwrapped to charge, the USB charging cord does not fit into the end of the kindle to charge.  I am so upset right now, I was so looking forward to this coming.  Also there is no connector for the end of the USB cord to plug into the wall, paying $159 it should at least have all charging accessories.  I am sending it back as I speak

author: Chuck AzEee!
title: Now this is more like it! Paperwhite done well.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A thinner and lighter Paperwhite Kindle just small enough to fit in your pocket and the battery life seems pretty good for now.

author: Glemon
title: battery drains faster
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this kindle even though my old one was only a year old because I wanted the water resistant feature.  My only complaint is that the battery drains way faster.

author: Doug Stender
title: As good as adverised
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I read a bunch of the reviews - especially the negative ones.  For me I can find no fault with this device.  The usb fits and it holds a charge a lot longer than my old one.  Access to the menus was easy enough to understand and the ability to adjust font size and back lighting is excellent.  Bravo Amazon...

author: nancyd
title: It  may be me, but...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I keep losing Kindles and I find it is very hard to get my books transferred to the new kindle. Amazon software is usually awesome but I find my kindle records hard to access and hard to use. So, I am not sure how the kindle works, since I have not had time to figure it out. Probably did not help that I was on a cruise and using ship internet. Good thing ship had a library!

author: Ozzie Alfonso
title: Worth the money.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm finding it hard to read the small print in many books, that's why I got the Kindle and it works perfectly. The ability to change fonts and font size is what I needed. On the down side - I wish I didn't have to see an ad for books when I turn off the Kindle. There used to be a way to get rid of ads for a small extra fee, but I can't find this in the new model.

author: Joseph C. Baldi
title: Nook to Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a Nook for years and it finally stopped working so when looking at a new e-reader, I decided to go with Kindle because there is more variety (and honestly I think longevity) in the product. I almost bought the Fire because it can be cheaper, but am so glad I spent the extra money for the Paperwhite version. The frontlit screen is so much easier on the eyes and there are so many options on the reader, like audible. Totally worth it.

author: Alyssa
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my paperwhite. I thought I wouldn’t like it as much as my physical books but I have discovered I love it and prefer it over physical books!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like how long the battery lasts.  I love the  6" size.  It is light and easy to hold.  I like hat it is lighted and I can read it in the dark. Once power is turned on, the kindle is ready to go in seconds. The only problem I have is that I often accidently press the power button and it goes off.

author: Leisa Cook
title: Lightweight and waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new paperwhite! No issues at all.  Finding a case was difficult but I suspect it won’t be long before there are a lot more choices but I did finally find one that I love!

author: Susan Wilczynski
title: Why I love Kindle Paperwhite with audible & Bluetooth
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Have always loved this product, which is why I upgraded to this version. It’s so much better for my eyes that a tablet and I can use it if I want to read in bed without bothering my spouse. On top of the great quality, I just want to thank Amazon for doing away with all of the bulky packaging. Streamlining means it’s a bit more sensitive to environmental concerns!

author: Susan Long
title: Not all bluetooth headphones will connect
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I ordered an inexpensive set of bluetooth headphones.  When I tried to connect with the Audible function, they wouldn't work.  I called support.  A very patient and helpful tech person. spent over an hour on the phone with me.  We went through many steps and much switching things on and off.  At last he suggested it might be the headphones themselves.  I returned them ordered another pair - for only a few dollars more- charged them and Hooray.  All is well.  It might be worthwhile to suggest a couple of headphone options.  It would have saved me and the technician a long frustrating process.  The good news was the headphones were delivered overnight.

author: Nana698
title: Love my Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Minus one star because the charging cable doesn’t fit. Although Amazon acknowledges it was a problem with some of the units who wanted one for a Christmas present and no new cable. Glad I had my old one as all new replacement cable were out of stock. Eventually Amazon just gave me a credit.

author: Lisette Ross
title: Extremely poor battery life or I have a lemon!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded to the newest kindle paperwhite. It included the subscription to Audible and over the ear POP headphones. I have been enjoying the headphones which I synced with my iPad for music and to listen to audible using my iPad. The few times that I have attempted to use my kindle i had to charge it because the battery was completely drained. There is no way that this battery stays charged for 6 weeks without use!

author: Jess
title: Never Leave Home Without IT
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love that the battery lasts a couple of weeks. It's small enough to fit in my purse so I can take it everywhere. And it's super easy to find books that I enjoy.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I don’t think it’s worth more than $50
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this for my daughter. It came in today and I’m not impressed. I turned it on to get it set up and it’s slow responding, when you click a button the screen freaks out and kinda pixelates for a second. I’ll give it a shot but I’m really counting on having to return it.

author: D. Driggers
title: Minor improvements to an already fine product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Slightly nicer than previous version.  I bought mine because the battery in my previous Paperwhite was failing.  If you already have a working Paperwhite, the improvement in the latest generation are no so great that it is worth replacing your current one until it wears out.

author: Kathleen T. Wheeler
title: Love it and didn't think I would!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm a "lover of actual books" - so I have been hesitant to buy a Kindle for fear that I wouldn't be able to get past the idea of having an actual book. I am now a Kindle owner and couldn't be happier with my purchase. It is so convenient to pack up to go anywhere - and I don't read small books - so when traveling this comes in very handy. I travel quite a bit for work, and am always drawn in by airport book sellers. Now, I can stop the impulse buying and start downloading. There will be room for any book that catches my eye on the Kindle, unlike the lack of room available in my backpack as I wander through the airports!

author: NAS
title: Watch the price
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very convenient and lightweight, easy to use. I was very unhappy with the fact that the day after I received it the price dropped $30 and the only choice I was given was to return it and reorder at the lower price. I happened to be on vacation so that was not an option. Took a lot of the enjoyment out of it!

author: Kay
title: I love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I traded in my Kindle Keyboard for this, after 7 years. The upgrade is amazing and I am using my Kindle even more than I was. Very happy with it.

author: ohioreader
title: Love love love
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the newest kindle. I upgraded from the original kindle, which still worked!!! Love that this one I can use at pool and worry less about splashing it. Lightweight. The backlit is excellent and glad I can read at night in bed without needing the light up case  from before.

author: Kindle Customer
title: smarter than I
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like it fine but there is so much that I don't know but if I did I might love it.  One of my big problems is when I get to the end of a book I end up having to completely shutting down in order to type in another book.  I am not able to browse to find another.  If I didn't still have my fire, this would be useless to me.

author: Tiffany
title: Love that it’s so lite weight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it so far ! I am a flight attendant and I love to read so it’s so much easier to have a kindle instead of carrying around multiple heavy books. The charge lasts what seems like an eternity . And I love that it’s waterproof because I leave to read while on the beach or by the pool.

author: Robin M Grossman
title: Not My Choice
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The device is no better or worse than my previous one which I was forced to replace when Amazon couldn’t or wouldn’t repair a loose connection in the charging receptacle.

author: Milkyway413
title: Just buy an iPad
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Didn’t like much about it at all.1. It’s tiny2. Difficult to use3. I could not figure out how to exit the book and return to the main screen4. Awful screen quality5. Extremely difficult to read6. No zoomLong story short, I attempted to understand how to use it once. And could never figure out how to exit the book or logout. The charge4 was shipped separately and it didn’t even fit. It was returned promptly and was still logged in.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Dissao
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: When I received my new kindle and started it up none of my unread books came across to my home page.  When I called kindle for help she actually told me I read to much and she couldn't help me find my unread books.I also forgot that the kindle I had, had buttons on each side to turn the pages (which I loved) this one doesn't.If I had to do over would have stayed with my old kindle.

author: Prairie Person
title: New Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was very excited to get this new Kindle.  I have glaucoma so the lighting and resolution are very important.  I find both to be somewhat improved over the old version.  The new one was advertised as significantly lighter than the old one, but I see not much different at all.  It is thinner, but not lighter.

author: Steven A. Ferber
title: Kindle Paperwhite fails to live up to expectations.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very disappointed with the kindle paperwhite. It is too small, smaller than I expected. I expected it to be at least as big as my amazon fire, which I had previously used to read books and which I may go back to using. Also, even at its brightest setting it's still dim. Also, the battery does not last as long as advertised. I'm unimpressed.

author: LaserLady
title: possibly defective???
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my fourth Paperwhite Kindle and I have some concerns.  I've only had it about a month, but it has refused to wake up several times now - only way I could get it to wake up was to do a hard reset.  I need to call customer support and see about getting this one replaced....

author: Amazon Customer
title: Overall Satisfied
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had dropped my former Kindle Paperwhite and chipped the screen....thus, my reason for buying the new one. Plus, I did not want to be without my Kindle while sending it back for a screen replacement.  Overall, I like the new one. It is slightly lighter than my previous one.....a marginal plus. Fortunately, I have not "tested" the waterproof feature !!However, I do find that it does not hold a charge as long as previous Kindle models I have owned. I read for about an hour each night and then turn it off. I get the low battery indicator after about a week. Same usage of previous models would last at least two weeks before requiring g a recharge......a bit disappointing.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Just over 100 days old and it won't take a charge,
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this for a Christmas gift.  Got the wrong one so reorder itand received in on Jan. 13.  Today is May 3.  The paperwhite is dead.It won't take a charge. Have tried various cords. No luck.Any suggestions?  I have had this problem with one of my ownkindles.  I am not a happy camper.

author: David Cohan
title: Great Reading Experience
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm enjoying the Kindle Paperwhite.  I'm new to reading on a mobile device.  This is my first device and the Kindle works well.  The software is a bit clunky and non-intuitive for operating the device. Anyone who is willing to figure it out though will be able to do it.  And maybe Amazon will keep improving the overall software and user experience so it is even easier to operate and use.  Overall, it a very good device and book reader.

author: Teramuse
title: New Kindle Appeal
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle does meet my expectations. Now I wish for more time to read!I like the new features.  Being waterproof water worries will go away.

author: Sara Born
title: Big Improvement over my Kindle Fire
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the new paper white.  It is so much easier to read, especially outside.  I haven't tried dropping it in the pool, so I can't verify the waterproof feature.  I don't see a way to turn it off and on.  I thought it was a bit of a ripoff that I had to buy a cover separately to make it go to sleep, but it works so well and battery lasts SO long that I'm over it.  Really great product!

author: Larry J. Wagner
title: Very easy to use!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Found the paperwhite very light and manageable. Love the ability to borrow books free from local libraries in my area. Also appreciate the instruction manual being part of library. Have only read 3 books so far but enjoy the easy handling of the unit. Much easier than having thick paperbacks to deal with.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Font gone wild
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: When I go to turn the page or just slide my finger down, if it's been idle, to be sure it doesn't time out and the font will just start changing. It will not stop until I turn it off. I did let Amazon know but no response. It just seems to have slow response compared to previous version. (See video)

author: California Resident
title: Best paperwhite yet
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my Kindles, now I have 4 for the household.  This one with being waterproof is perfect!  I'm going to have to keep this one for myself and hide it from everyone.

author: Dr. T
title: Lighter & more compact!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the compact redesign. As someone who’s had a kindle since they were introduced, I really like the smaller form factor and the new one feels a bit lighter than the previous generation as well. Looking forward to reading on my new kindle!

author: Lazytea
title: Perfect for travelling
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very lightweight, easy to use (so much easier than using the Kindle app on my ipad). Battery lasts forever and a day. Brightness is adjustable and it comes with cell service to Amazon so you can use the cloud services and other online features anywhere there is cell service anytime.

author: Shawn Kemp
title: May have had too high of expectations. Ended up returning.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really wanted to like this, but ultimately there were too many detractors to make this purchase worthwhile.- the backlighting is more even than previous iterations, but still uneven along the bottom, which was very distracting (to me at least) while reading in low light situations.- the page flickering isn’t something new. But for a device released in 2018, the color and text flickering while navigating the home page/settings/some pages in book is disappointing.

author: Ao
title: Very pleased
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Im usually a physical book kind of girl, but carrying so many books became heavy & strenuous. I did my research and found the paper white to be the closest option to an actual book & I am very impressed! Absolutely love it and would recommend. As you can see with the picture attached it really looks like a page from a book. It’s not strenuous on your eyes either no blue light but still perfect for reading in the dark.

author: Sara
title: Love my paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I put off purchasing a paperwhite due to cost and it seemed easier to just use a booklight. Was I ever wrong!! Best thing I have bought for myself in a long time. No problem reading any where, no worries about do I have enough batteries while on a trip for my booklight.

author: Tracey Atkinson
title: Seemingly minor upgrades make a big difference
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Upgraded from the 1st gen PaperWhite. Seemingly minor upgrades - the screen resolution, flush screen, etc. result in a much nicer feel.Construction is just ok - I would add a case particularly with the screen not being  recessed. After a few drops and the parts the exposed from my case are already a bit dented. Doesn't change the function, but its not the most durable.

author: Emory Stephens
title: Lots of bells and whistles
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the new size.  It is easier to carry and use.  But it is more complex than my earlier model.  It sometimes skips about and goes several pages at a time when I only want to turn one.  All in all, I think that it is a good product, but not as user friendly as my previous model.

author: Kate Overath-Speck
title: The USB Cable was faulty
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am unable to charge the Paperwhite due to a faulty USB cable. While Amazon is replacing the cable at no charge, I have to pay the associated shipping costs, which leaves me with the proverbial bad taste in my mouth, esp. as this problem is well-known by Amazon at this point. Requiring a customer to pay shipping for a replacement part because the original was faulty is cheesy on the part of Amazon.  Also, I would prefer the screen to be larger as I have macular degeneration and the small screen will have diminishing returns in the not-too-distant future. Maybe when I'm able to use it I will be more satisfied with the device. The shipping fee will continue to rankle.

author: Diane Pepe
title: I like the older model much better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been a Kindle user for many years.  I needed a new one because my second edition would no longer hold a charge.  Truth be told, I am not excited about the newer one.  Simply not as user friendly as the older models.  Getting to the home screen is a pain.  Nice to see the "book cover"of what you're currently reading, but there are times when I want to look at another book for a recipe and still haven't figured out how to get there.  The paper white is the nicest feature.  The cover that was bought for this one makes it noticibly heavier.  My daughters bought this as a gift, so I don't mention my issues, but I wish I had just replaced the battery on the old one.

author: Ponderunga
title: Best screen on a Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have bought quite a few Kindles over the years. This one has the best and most uniform backlight. Heartily recommended for any book you read sequentially and do not dip into at random. The battery and memory are good but what makes this great is the top notch screen.

author: S.
title: Battery life is awful and Not as Glare-Free as older paperwhite version.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What was wrong with the old glare-free screen? The newer version: unimpressed by the glare as depicted in previous reviews. You had it right with the old one. Not sure I will keep.More disappointment with the miniscule battery capacity. I have to charge it daily. My old kindle charge lasted for weeks.

author: lori
title: Easy on the eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have only charged it once! Very easy in the eyes while reading and I have access to every book I've ever purchased for my Kindle.

author: kassie
title: perfect replacement for old kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: heres the thing. i hate amazon and i hate jeff bezos (hi jeff!), but i LOVe my kindle. i got an original kindle for christmas roughly 13 years ago and i loved it for all 13 years. just recently it started acting out and i decided i should get a new one. i chose the kindle paperwhite and i am NOT DISAPPOINTED! i've already completed my goodreads goal for 2019 (20 books) and it's only Feb 19. honestly i feel shame for contributing to mr buttface's wealth but i'm suppressing it. all in all i'm satisfied with this stupid capitalist purchase

author: LP
title: KIndle Ebook
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: GREAT !!!!  Very light weight (ounces).  I can make the type so big I don't need my reading glasses (nice advantage).  Holding the Kindle is so easy I actually read more now than before.  Very convenient when I travel.  No more books to weigh me down and take up space.

author: Becky Gish
title: Beware of Trade-In Program.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Beware of Trade-In Program! Used their Trade-In program to purchase a new Kindle ereader. The devise I traded was sent in the original box and packed well. They dropped my trade value because they say the face was cracked. My Kindle was not cracked, it was in excellent condition except the battery would not hold a charge for very long anymore. If you use their Trade-In program make sure you take pictures or something of the condition. My opinion of Amazon and their Kindle has drastically changed!

author: vicky
title: New paperwork vs old
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old kindle paperwhite finally gave up the ghost!  I read a lot and it was a faithful pal.  My new paperwnite seems fine but I have noticed that the background light doesn't seem as bright even when adjusted to its brightest.  The bolding of the text isn't as dark as before, but I am sure I will get used to it.

author: Gail E. Pate
title: Not very waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Haven't used it for long enough to remark about performance. I was disappointed to see how little it is actually protected from water. I should have guessed when the description did not mention covering the power cord input that it would only be a little "waterproof".

author: yahoo me
title: Not there yet.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: First of all. I love the kindle.  It is awesome to have so many books at your fingertips.  The issue that I have with this model, is that it feels small.  I know that it isn't, but it just feels so.  The display is great.  Why the 3 stars then?  I gave this 3 stars due to the less then rugged feel.  It is like holding a frisbee.  It is slippery and shows every bit of finger smudges.  I am a long time Amazon supporter and it pains me to say that Amazon can and should do better.

author: Tornado1967
title: Nice Device. It's the first Kindle i bought and works fine.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was concerned about all the "included Special Offers" dilemma. It's stupid, the special offers only show up when the kindle is not used. Save you the 10 bucks.I was able to convert my old eBooks and load these in the kindle with the help of caliber. So, no actual dependencies with Amazon store. but is good to have the option.

author: stephen m harper
title: Buy one of these.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have always loved reading on the kindle paperwhite. I only replaced my original one because it was about seven years old and started to have to be charged more often. I love the new one even more and o am happy about the added blue tooth feature allowing me to hear auto books.

author: Claire Hopper
title: Hurts My Eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had this for one day, gave it my best, and then returned it. The white screen is lit in such a way that it hurts my eyes to read on it after only two minutes. I don't know what it is, but I kept getting headaches. I even adjusted the font size and brightness, but nothing was helping. Back to regular books!

author: Brittany
title: Addicted
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I swore i would never go the way of electronic books because I’m a book nerd and i love the feel and smell of them. But after becoming a mom i will say it’s a lot easier to pickup where i left off and store more books in one place. I actually love it. Not getting rid of my real books though!

author: JenJen
title: Love my paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my amazon Paperwhite. It’s easy to use, very light weight. I had previously been using a Nook glowlight. Having the amazon paperwhite has been more cost effective as I have hootenanny many free books using my prime membership. I also love that it’s waterproof!  This far the battery has been fairly long lasting. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because when I purchased it the wrong charging cord was in the box. Apparently this has been a issue with the paperwhite. When so called Amazon send me a new cord next day so they did resolve the issue

author: AY
title: Great but auto shut down
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall, the Paperwhite is awesome and works similar to my 2nd generation kindle so no re-learning necessary. The only downside I’ve come across so far is that when the bottom of the kindle rests on my lap or covered by my hand, the unit automatically shuts off. It must sense non use and maybe is trying to conserve power. Anyway, if you avoid covering the bottom then it seems to work just fine.  It’s light weight and the brightness is great.

author: Bookreader
title: LOVE
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I needed a new kindle and so glad I waited to purchase b/c I love the idea of a waterproof kindleNow I can read in the pool!! So lightweight!!

author: KS
title: Great for readers with poor vision
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very readable for me in spite of my poor vision.  I can brighten the screen and enlarge the text as needed.  Wonderful

author: Rebecca Lee
title: Battery Power Sucks
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I owned a 2nd generation Kindle from way back. The battery would easily last a month, with light to moderate usage. The Kindle Paperwhite does not last a week. I have to charge it once every 6 to 7 days. So, if I go on vacation (which would increase usage), I would have to charge it more often. It isn't a huge concern because I can charge it overnight, but the fact that the battery only lasts a week when an older model lasted a month is a huge difference. Also, for some reason I cannot purchase new Kindle books on my Paperwhite. I can do it on my phone.

author: Motor City Madman
title: Great product!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the Kindle and got this for my traveling.  I had another one, but wanted the waterproof feature.  This one is a LOT nicer than my first one.

author: A. Egolf
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Super happy! I’ve used while taking a bath👍🏻👍🏻 The battery seems to last longer than my old kindle. Worth it!

author: Tick or Two
title: I loved my original Kindle Paperwhite and I love my new Kindle Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My original Kindle Paperwhite still works, but is not holding a charge as long.  So, I invested in an updated version and have been very happy so far.  Depending on where I am during the day, I use both of my Kindle devices.  The beauty is that they go seamlessly back and forth and keep up with my last location.  Some times, I even throw my cell phone into the mix, and they can all keep up with my reading!  You've just got to love technology!!

author: Emily Rose
title: I recommend this so hard
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: this is my fourth kindle, and my first paperwhite. I can't say enough good things about this. It fits in my purse, the screen doesn't hurt my eyes, it's got battery life for dayyyss. plus the access to Goodreads is such an amazing touch. I can not recommend this enough.

author: Danhua Zhu
title: So far so good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is my first kindle, and I compared a lot with other generations before actually bought it. It's been almost one week, and it works very well and I like it, especially the built-in lights which make reading in night so enjoyable!

author: lovinflorida
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love my new paperwhite.  It is the perfect size and I can take it with me to the pool.  It combines two of my favorite things...the pool and reading!!!!  The photo shown was taken in total darkness.  Nice, clear reading any time of the day or night!

author: Bonnie Barlow
title: Light and easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Slim,compact and light weight. It makes reading a joy. I am older and need larger fonts and increased lighting.

author: angie hikes
title: I really don't like this
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I lost my kindle voyager and they don't seem to make it anymore.  This thing was the next best thing.  Its bulky and jumps chapters without being touched.  I am bummed and want my voyager back.

author: Bradn215
title: Didn't know I needed it until I got it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Had an older kindle for years... no frills but it always worked.  Got the new Paperwhite for a birthday gift and was not that thrilled... I already had a Kindle.  But I caved in and decided to give it a try to be nice to the family... I love it.  No longer am I looking for the right amount of light to read.  I can easily find and manage my collections and battery life is great.  Time to upgrade... just do it.

author: Steven Stack
title: New Paperwhite is 5 stars but Amazon reduced the price by $30 and cannot get price adjustment
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle Paperwhite is great, I have had it since January 16, 2019 but 22 days later (on 2/7/19) they reduce the price by $30 and Amazon customer service will not give me a price adjustment.  Amazon Customer service only has one solution: to return the Kindle and reorder another one.  This does not make sense.  By giving me a price adjustment saves Amazon the cost of shipping my Kindle I have back to them and the cost of shipping me a new one.  Further, I have spend hours downloading my library to the new Kindle and my time is worth a lot more than the $30 I would save my returning the devise and reordering.  Good job Amazon (not your finest day).

author: Deckersmom
title: MY KINDLE #7
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had kindles since Series 1.  This one is great; however, after the first week, it wouldn’t hold a charge.  I contacted customer support, and they did an entire reset.  Now it works perfectly.I do wish my library had a listed format rather than the book cover format though.

author: K. Bennett
title: No longer do you have to tote a suitcase full of books
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s a wonderful device, glad to upgrade. But it is still slow and a bit sloppy  to maneuver. I also miss having the Wi-Fi capability wherever I am. And I didn’t have an option to have this without the apps. It’s all good, again grateful to not have to take the suitcase full of books

author: Denise Winkleman
title: Waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love reading on the paperweight and knowing it is waterproof, although I hope I never find out just how waterproof it is!

author: Lucie
title: Yes and no
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the Kindle Paperwhite.  But:  Amazon advertise that the battery lasts weeks and the first weeks I used it, I had to recharge it after about 15-16 hours or reading. So, I sent it back and got a new one day before yesterday.  I charged it completely and yesterday, I read for 5 hours and the bettery is at 71% so it looks to me that the battery again won't last nearly as long as they advertise.  And I do not keep it connected to Wifi while I read.  And I don't have the ads on it either.  So........what is the problem with the batteries ?? My 7-8 years old one lasted longer than this new one!

author: amanda willems
title: Don’t buy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I don’t recommend this device latest version much better the lighting and battery are horrible don’t waste your money UCB you have the first paperwhite keep it don’t upgrade not worth it.

author: Kristen Finkbiner
title: Very Unimpressive
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: After reading on my iPhone & surface pro for a few years, I finally got sick of it & decided to buy the kindle paper white. All in all, I'm very unimpressed with the product. The kindle isn't any lighter in weight than my iPhone, the power button is HORRIBLY positioned (who puts a power button on the bottom of a reading device?!), battery life isn't great, and the screen hurts my eyes on bright & is basically unreadable when dimmed. I wish the kindle had a 'Sepia' option, like the Kindle app does on my iPhone. I will still likely use this Kindle in the summer when I'm outside - but honestly, i could have done without. Wish i wouldn't have bought it!

author: Maria Ines Uribe
title: No vale la pena!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Era mejor la versión previa.  La batería tiene muy baja duración (bajó a 40% con unas 6 horas de uso).  No conecta con todos los audífonos (ej: no funciona con mis Sony).  No sincroniza audible con el texto.

author: Anthia Fisher
title: Kindle Review
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The kindle keep restarting, also it did not come with a plugin just the chord.  I think everything should come in the packet that you don't have to go find a plug to connect it to.I think Amazon has become greedy by separating the peaces. My first kindle came with it's own plugin.  I lost it when I was traveling and my friend decided to get me another one as a gift.

author: sacbaker
title: Battery charge doesnt last a day
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My reading habits have not changed since I purchased my loopfirst paperwhite. I also bought the new 2018 Paperwhite when it was released but I am finding that info was wrong as it does not hold a charge, not even for a day. I am so unhappy with this new Paperwhite that I wish I hadnt bought it.Update: after contacting Amazon Support, i am happy with my Paperwhite. The tech support helped me to get my battery to working correctly again. Is now holding a charge for several days at a time. Yea.

author: Carol Alvey
title: Wonderful ❣️
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the lightweight compactness of the Kindle Paperwhite. It has some bells and whistles that I haven't had to see how they work such as being waterproof but that's also a nice upgrade that my other Paperwhite did not have.as far as I'm concerned The Price is Right!

author: J. Berg
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love my Paperwhite! It's my first Kindle, so I can't compare it to older versions. The battery seems to last pretty long for me. I have logged many hours of reading with the brightness consistently on 7 and I still have about 65% battery left. Not much else to say. Great product that is very portable and encourages me to read more!

author: Ronda Belka
title: All-new Kindle Paperwhite – Now Waterproof with 2x the Storage
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I haven't used it yet, I'm giving it 4 stars because it looks great...streamlined and lightweight.  And Amazon was awesome in helping me transfer everything over from my old Kindle.  Not to mention I got a great deal because of the trade-in and special discount that was offered at the time.

author: Nancy
title: Battery life is amazing!!!!!  Buy an Ayotu case for it!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was skeptical after reading some reviews.  I LOVE my new Paperwhite 10th Generation!It is so easy to use & the battery does last!  I’m on day 4 & still at 90%.  I had one of the early readers & this one is amazing!  You will not be disappointed!!!  Downloads in seconds.Love it!!!!  No problems!!!  I bought the Ayotu case for it & the Artwork on these cases is amazing!! Tons to choose from!  You wont be able to decide.  When you open the case your kindle wakes up & when you close the case it goes to sleep!!!

author: Dennis
title: Real Super Great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This reader is small and lightweight. It's perfect for reading in bed before I go to sleep. The adjustable backlight allows me to read with the room lights off so I don't disturb my partner yet it doesn't keep me from falling asleep. I'm very pleased with this device.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Easy to read and very comfortable to hold.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Outstanding product. It can be read in any lighting conditions. It is very light and comfortable to read for long periods of time.

author: Jeanne
title: Almost perfect
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love having my Audible books on my Kindle. But, the Audible app on the device needs work. It doesn't have all the same features of the phone and tablet app. There are fewer sub-categories for searching for new books and fewer options for sorting books. Still, it's a good start.

author: Lauri James
title: I LOVE IT
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What a fun way to read/listen to a books.  I absolutely love it.  I am a huge reader, home most the time due to a disability.  So happy

author: Walker
title: Love my Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loving my new Kindle - first time I went with paper white and I love that I can reverse the font and background color for no eye strain while reading in the dark. It’s super thin and light and easy to hold on one hand and travels great!

author: dennis riley
title: Excellent product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is as advertised.  Went from the first Kindle which was still working to the Paperwhite. Have used it everyday si ce Christmas and it is still at 50% charged. Backlight is great for reading at night. Also used it outside with no glare issues. I strongly recommend this product!

author: Lunchladydoris
title: I love my new Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My son gifted me with this new Kindle for Christmas. He uploaded 250 books on it as well. I never knew what I was missing... I am ecstatic.

author: Sam Fuller
title: Power button on bottom is incomprehensible design flaw
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The placement of the power/sleep button on the bottom ruins an otherwise near-perfect device.  I’ve owned the new Kindle for a few weeks now and thought I would get used to navigating my way around the power button.  I like to cradle the Kindle with my pinky underneath and there’s no way to enjoy reading when you’re always thinking about that darned button.  I cannot fathom how this passed through R&D.  I love the Audible compatibility and water resistance but this is likely going back and I’ll revert back to my Kindle Voyage, which has a depressed power button on the back of the device.

author: Slick-heyoka
title: Waterproof is nice for hot springs
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Actually, a nice step up from my last kindle paper white. Just enough lighter weight that I can hold it in one hand with the case.A little brighter than the last one and love the water proof, works great at the hot springs.Read so many weird reviews, but glad I got it.

author: Joseph A. Wagnon
title: Simplicity at it’s best. Now has capability for you to read in your bathtub.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really love this new Paperwhite. It’s waterproof and that’s the main reason why I bought this. I could’ve bought the Oasis model but the price was overkill. This Paperwhite is super light, easy to use, easy to read, easy to customize. It’s also easy to carry anywhere.

author: shakira julia
title: Love this kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this product ... the best part is the new audible feature which allows you to listen to audio books ... second best thing is as a resident of Florida with beach and pool weather all year round ... I now get to read a book while in my pool without the constant worry of water damage ...

author: Janice Georg
title: Disappointing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Traded in my 7th gen paperwhite for the the latest, 10th gen.  What a step backwards.  No change in weight, backlight is not as bright and it's more gray than white.  Decided to trade because my 7gen needed charging more than once a week, SO DOES THIS ONE!  Not happy.

author: Eliezer
title: Better than paperwhite 3
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Is more of the same but better. Let me explain, it literally does the same things as the old paperwhite 3. The only few differences is that now it has audible support, more storage, waterproof capabilities and you can invert colors (not my favorite but it’s new and some people might like that). Some people gave this device bad reviews but come on this is a ebook reader not a tablet. In my honest opinion, there’s nothing both cheaper or better out there.

author: Gary E. Parnes
title: Love It
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery on my old Kindle wasn't holding a charge like it used to, so I took advantage of the trade-in program and got this one. The lighting on this new Kindle seems even better than the old one; the light just seems to come out of nowhere with no spots brighter than any others.

author: Khan Hannan
title: Good product, easy to setup.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great product. Purchased this as a gift for my father. Hope he will like it as much as I do. One thing that kind of bothered me - the touch actions are slow. So if I am trying to turn a page, sometime I may need to touch twice or 3 times to make it work. This is not always the case but certainly happened enough time for me to take notice and put that in this review. Setup on the other hand was a breeze. I definitely recommend this as a personal or gift device.

author: jason
title: Amazing E-Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The All-new Kindle Paperwhite is exactly what I hoped it would be. My wife loved one of the original Kindles because it had built in 4G and she could download a book wherever or whenever she wanted, and best of all the 4G was free. Since then she never wanted to replace her Kindle. Then I found this one AND it is waterproof. She LOVES it! She reads it constantly and even loves her waterproof case that I purchased along side it. She likes it so much that she got me one. I'm not much of a reader but since she got it for me two weeks ago I've been reading non stop! Great product with great features and it is completely worth it. Thanks, Amazon!

author: Ron
title: Nice!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm old school, liking the feel of a book, newspaper, magazine, etc.  Buddy loaned me his Paperwhite for an e-book he knew I was interested in.  Loved the functionality and ease of use.  Wife saw my liking of this and bought it for my birthday.  Have been pleased ever since.  Only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is my questions surrounding authors getting appropriate compensation for e-books.

author: Chris T
title: Great upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The best thing is the long battery life.  I decided to use this Paperwhite solely for reading books as I already have a Kindle Fire for everything else.

author: Rumour24
title: Works great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded from the 6th generation.  Love love love the paperwhite! The screen is the best. Much more comfortable for me than a backlit screen.  I read A LOT and this makes it so easy. Lightweight and comfortable to hold. The storage space is amazing and the menus are easy to navigate. Highly recommended!

author: Pseudonym
title: Careful with the power button
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is the best kindle so far, but the power button protrudes enough that I have accidentally powered it off when holding it with one hand.

author: Rich Gautier
title: Used to the original Kindle? Mixed blessings when upgrading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Likes: the screen light, the size and feel, the faster processingDislikes: Falling asleep reading and waking up 30 pages ahead...and the new Library screen...bring back hard page turn buttons please

author: E. Hartranft
title: It's OK!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This new Kindle is small and I will be glad to read it in the sun or if I should drop it in my pool, it will survive.  I have an older version, 5 years or so that I really like.  It is much easier to see my new books, get on the internet, listen to Pandora and a few other things.  I will be switching between the two of them I guess.

author: Angela R
title: Love It!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Long battery life, the light is perfect and my eyes never get tired. Perfect size that is comfortable to hold and easy to navigate.

author: Erin N. Schave
title: Too many full restarts.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had kindles for years. Super disappointed with this new model I purchased. About once a month I have to do a full restart just so I can use it. Frustrating doesn’t really even describe it.

author: Lennie Gentner
title: Kindle with Wireless only still allows downloading anywhere using ones cell phone Hotspot feature
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Replaced my old kindle. Did the trade-in and got a $5.00 credit for my kindle plus a $25 credit for trading. Which was great! Was able to stay within my budget by getting the paperwhite with Ads and wireless access only. Found out I could use my iPhone hotspot for the wireless connection so I actually have all the benefits of downloading anywhere. No need for cellular.  Also was glad to see the Ads are only for kindle books.  I had thought Ads would be for all kind of products and wasn't really keen on that, But willing to do to save $$$

author: cwilliams
title: I love my Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been a Kindle fan for several years. I started with a Kindle reader. Then I got my first Fire. Then when that one wore out, I got a bigger Fire. Finally, the one I got in 2013 finally died. Now I am back to the Kindle paper white again. I love it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Battery
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great product but the battery doesn't last as long as the older models.

author: Diana Svendsen
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle Paperwhite.  I bought this to replace my old Paper white.  The only complaint I have in comparing the two is the new one doesn't have as many choices of font size.  I could use it a wee bit bigger.  The layout and menu are different and will take some getting use to.

author: Heather
title: Thinner, lighter, battery life not good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am really liking the new paperwhite, it is thinner and lighter than the previous model.  My oberon case still fits it is just moves a bit more in the case but it will not fall out.  I got it for the extra capacity and waterproof feature.  It seems to be a little bit faster than the previous model. The battery life seems to drop much faster, that is why I am rating it 4 stars otherwise I love it.

author: Hillel D. Silverman
title: Very easy to use and navigate.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's nice to open up a book right where you left off. Very comfortable and easy to use. You won't be disappointed. 5 stars

author: Amazon Customer
title: Ease of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easy to use from the very beginning. I also purchased kindle unlimited so I can read whatever I want whenever I want. Works great and holds a charge a long time.

author: Sandy R
title: Waterproof is everything that was missing!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've always loved my original Paperwhite but my kids upgraded me to the waterproof model because it gets so much "reading floating in the pool" use and I either use a bulky, heavy waterproof case ( which leaked once and ruined my Kindle) or a plastic quart baggie! This is half the weight of the Kindle plus case and I don't panic if it gets splashed. It's terrific.

author: KRaw
title: Screen is an ugly gray/green not white.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I couldn't stand the color of the screen and sent it back.  I'm not sure if it was something wrong with the one I received or if they're all that color.  I bought one of the previous generation and it is white.

author: Billy R. Emery
title: Not as Impressed as I thought I Would Be
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I miss the buttons for turning pages. I don’t think the pages are bright enough for comfortable reading. I’m comparing this to my I-Phone.There are not enough options for me to select type of font I desire, or font size.  Also, I want more options to specify format of page itself.I’m beginning to think I prefer a color type of e-book reader.

author: margaret weedman
title: Lightweight, non glare
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Took this on a cruise. Read 5 books on it while gone. Love it! No glare in full sun. Think it’s waterp- didn’t get any on it. Only thing I would change is - you have to type in the name of the book you want to read in the search bar instead of having all of them listed.

author: White Raven
title: This display is a bit clearer and easier to read... than my much older Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am comfortable reading a smaller font with this new Paperwhite, and I really like that.  The slimmer lighter weight is nice too.  I bought this because the battery life on my older Kindle PaperWhite had become a bit annoying, and the battery on the new one does last longer.  Very satisfactory!

author: jyranchers101
title: Not my favorite kindle but good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased this kindle for the waterproof feature because I’ll be on the lake a lot. It is definitely not my favorite kindle. Smudge marks everywhere, I try to clean it and seems to still be there. It is a little slow. Battery life does seem to be better.  I have a 32 GB device. Haven’t tried audio books yet.

author: Sam
title: Took Some Getting Used To
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: At first I was really disappointed. It is small and not really a tablet. But once I started using it, I fell in love with it! I use it in the bathtub, I can easily put it in my purse, and more! I love it! And it's easy for me to borrow library books and to get all sorts of books! I truly do love it!

author: mrzzp
title: Don’t buy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery drains too fast. Even when the device is completely off, it still drains. Customer service is very unhelpful. Promised will email the return label and never did, maybe waiting for the return date to lapse? You would think that buying a new device you wouldn’t get a defective one. Had to put one star or else wouldn’t go through but I definitely give it 0 star.

author: bg
title: Convenience
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've never used a Kindle before and always enjoyed holding a book.  I couldn't be happier using the Kindle.  Having the Kindle and availability of books to select from at a moments notice is a great asset for someone living in the country.

author: Eva Arevalo-Laureys
title: Charging Port Issues
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I received a new Kindle White as a gift.  Unfortunately, the charging port did not work properly.  This caused many malfunctions including not charging fully and not turning on at all after charging.  I was able to return the Kindle and purchase a new one.  The charging port on the new one works great and I have not had any issues so far.  If you have any issues with charging port, I suggest you return it immediately and get a new one.

author: Patricia Letarte
title: Perfect replacement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This item was the perfect replacement for the older black and white reader that I had.  The extra storage, back light and the amount of extra time on the charged battery are what sold me to trade the other one in.  I am very pleased with my new Kindle Paper White.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Dictionary
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall, I love it. . I miss the old access to a dictionary for unfamiliar, ofte n archangel, words.

author: DG PHOTO VIDEO
title: I like real buttons
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really don’t like that the only interface is touch screen. It’s really unresponsive so I spend twenty minutes just trying to turn a page.

author: tootie
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first kindle - I waited for it to come out because I wanted the audible feature. I really love it and use it every day. I didn't realize how much I would like the audible books. They are very relaxing to listen to. I am very happy that I purchased it!

author: UMESH
title: Display not smooth, it’s slow
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Display not smooth, it’s slow. when you click to turn page .. you can see page go black and then next page comes. It does not work like kindle App would on iPad. This is my first kindle, I may not be used it ...reading experience is great on kindle, no distractions

author: penname
title: Disappointed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Paperwhite I traded in worked a lot better than the ‘new’ one.  I’m just disappointed.  It’s slow to react to commands.  It’s fidgety and doesn’t turn pages from the corner any more in that cool way it used to.  Too sensitive.  Just rugged not smooth technology.

author: Татьяна
title: Read my offer and free idea
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Please, Amazon service, listen  to me. I have all generations of kindle. But the most convenient - kindle 5. You need to create the kindle paperwhite, but with side soft buttons, like the kindle 5. Then you will have the perfect reader and you will be out of competition. But the backlight should not be in any case bluish, as in the third generation KPW3. White-yellow (as in PW2, PW4). Or adjustable.

author: Joan Smith
title: My first kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is great! I've run out of room in my bedroom for physical books and this is a good way to continue to grow my book collection. (over 800 titles so far) It's compact and lightweight, which will be great when I travel. I highly recommend this Kindle!

author: Erica
title: Love, love, love
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Perfect, compact size. Seemingly no frills, but has all the features I want in an e-reader. I take it with me everywhere! I love traditional books, but this makes reading easier (and faster!) having an entire library of books available in one place at all times.

author: Roupen Tavitian
title: Reads like an actual book!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was always skeptical and hesitant about trying any form of e-books and e-readers. I have always preferred an actual paper edition as it helped me comprehend the content better. I decided to give the Kindle a try considering how well known it is. I made the right choice! It truly gives the impression of reading an actual book with the adjustable white color settings for the screen.

author: KB
title: excellent for avid readers
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love mine. It's simple, and I love reading on it. I can read in the dark, but the light never bothers me like the one on my kindle fire used to. The battery life may not last weeks if you read a lot, but the battery life is far superior to my kindle fire. I can focus on reading, easily carry it with me, and immerse myself in stories without being concerned about the battery dying or my latest email. Literally my traveling library.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Lowest light setting is too bright
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I loved my previous generation paperwhite but updated because I damaged my old one in the washing machine (don’t ask). My main grievance with the new version is that the dimmest light setting is very bright compared with the old paperwhite model. I’m disappointed with this because I like to read in bed without the light disturbing anyone else or keeping my brain too alert. The old model had much lower brightness levels that were easier on the eyes in the dark and looked less like a phone screen.I’m keeping this one because it’s waterproof, which is important to me for aforementioned reasons.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Little smaller than other Kindles, usually good for reading anywhere, and very handy to carry with you. I read twice as much as I did with regular books. I swore I would never give up reading a "book" instead of a pad, but I now have read over 500 books in the last few years, and would never give up my Kindle.

author: Bannister's
title: Just as stated and fast delivery
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my second kindle and I love both but I really love this one to read by the ocean or pool. It took me a little bit to get use to the touch screen but I love it . It remembers right where I left off. The battery last forever. It is very lightweight and thin.

author: Tyler Dalious
title: Quite an improvement over my old Kindle 4
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the screen tech, per usual. Easy on the eyes, simple to navigate. My only wish is that the scrolling movement (drag to scroll) was a little more responsive, but there's not much to say with e-ink response time, so I'm leaving that out of my grading.

author: MEW
title: Best Kindle yet
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle.  I have not tested the waterproof claim but all of the other advertised improvements are accurate.  My favorite improvement is the sharpness of the print.  One other small surprise was that it is slightly smaller so my old cover was too big

author: R. Adams
title: Mixed Review
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I give it a three signifying average.  While I like the water resistance, the 32 GB capacity and the size, they haven't improved the touch and feel from the old days.  It still feels clunky and old to the touch.  I think it will be good on vacation, but I'm not sure of it's usefulness day to day.

author: MoniCat81
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
