body: I've loved every Kindle I've owned.  This is my 3rd Kindle.  Each one I like just a little bit better than the last one.

author: JMagColorado
title: Great contrast
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just got back from a vacation in Cabo and read three books on my new Kindle Paperwhite. Fearlessly took it out on floats to read while staying cool on the water. No issues at all reading in bright sunlight. Glad I traded in my old Kindle for this one.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Great product!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’ve had two kindle fires, which I loved, but I thought I would give the paperwhite a try this time. I’m so glad I did! It’s awesome! It’s so much lighter, easy to use, you can read outside in the sun and the battery life is crazy good. No buyer’s remorse for this gal.

author: Pamela Gray
title: Slower than an iPad and iPhone when turning pages.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I wanted this for reading books outside in bright light, and for use at the beach. It is good for both. The downside is that it seems very slow when turning pages, and the user interface is rather "klunky", with the library difficult to access.

author: F P Andersen
title: Double The Storage
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's a very good reader.

author: Jesse G
title: Great Product, better than before!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is an amazing product. Really like the new look with the screen almost flat with the rest of the device. My only complaint would be the sleep button should be on the top. Most people rest the device on it's bottom when reading, which can cause some accidental sleep command if bumped when reading. Other than that, still a great product.

author: Vitalina
title: Don’t waist your money.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Not worth it in my opinion. When we bought it we didn’t realized you have to pay $10+ for any book you read. We bought this for my little sister and she can read a book in just 2 days and thag adds up quick! I’m sorry but in my opinion that’s a little much and I’d rather go to the library and get free books.

author: Simone
title: Light adjusts automatically
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle Paperwhite is wonderful!  The support is also superb (usually get an answer very quickly) so I feel more than satisfied purchasing this e-reader.  The fonts are easy to change, holds many many books and it is easy to navigate once you take the tutorial.

author: Debbie Line
title: Latest Paperwhite - eh...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was really disappointed that I spent the money.  I really wanted it to be glare proof and it's not that great.  I should have saved the money and kept using the old one.  Very disappointing, not to mention that I had to buy another case since the old one doesn't fit.  Kind of scammy of Amazon.

author: Linda-Rocky Mountains
title: Keep you old Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle. Obviously I like the product, until now. The battery life on this new, improved version is horrible. I have actually had to stop reading in order to charge the battery. Save you money and a lot of disappointment and use your old Kindle. Amazon you have failed on this so called upgraded product.

author: P. Troutman
title: Great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really like this updated version. The smoother sides on the front are nice. The only downside is that I can't leave it off airplane mode like I did my previous one. Eats through the battery life too fast if I leave it connected to WIFI all the time.

author: Onyxfire
title: Love, love, love this!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I know a lot of people prefer hardcopy books, but I really prefer this. It is small enough to hold comfortably, but not too small to read comfortably. I can read it in dark as I am falling asleep as it has a dim, adjustable glow.  I have the cover that goes with it so that, when you close cover, it goes into sleep mode.

author: Richard Deal
title: Just a bit slow.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far so good. I upgraded from an old Nook.  I have been using nothing but apple iPads for a long time so I do compare everything to them. This is not an iPad. Didn’t want it to be. My only complaint so far would be the speed of the screen refresh rate.

author: Normfll
title: Okay but awkward
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the clarity of the screen. Text is clear. Font size change easy.I am finding paging back is awkward; the device seems to lose its way and cycles between the current and next page rather than actually paging back. I have to use 'Go to' to go back, which is very awkward. Is this usual, am I not 'getting it', or is there something amiss with my device?

author: Good Cooker
title: great purchase
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: O had am original Kindle and loved it for many years.  I upgraded when they put Audible back and I really lo e tha one.  So easy to read , bright and clear and very easy to navigate.  And the battery lasts a long time.  Very happy with this purchase

author: Donna B.
title: Disappointed with this new generation
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have issues with this new version of the paperwhite - battery life is not as good - not bright enough for older eyes - pin hole bright spots are annoying and the touch is not as responsive when going forward or back.  Sadly my 2014 version is dying so no choice but to keep this as I use my Kindle everyday.

author: Axesever
title: Love
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love love love. I wish it was a little faster in processing, but honestly, I love this thing. I'm glad the price has gradually came down on these readers. I'll have to eat cheap noodles for months due to all the money I'm spending on ebooks!

author: Dana Rogers
title: Need alternate page turning option. Esp while paging thru 200 pages in library. Can’t be done
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have purchased every style of kindle since they’ve been out. This kindle with no page buttons have proven almost impossible to page thru my library.

author: Dachsie Lady
title: Love the size of the new Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle is very light and the paper white is easy on the eyes. So far I am loving it. The jury is still out on the battery. It seems to me it is running down pretty fast. I only have this Kindle for a few weeks. Know more in about 6 months.

author: Kristi E. Jalics
title: I am having a lot of trouble downloading books I have bought.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like having the light available which I did not have with my gen 7 kindle. I like that I am said to have more storage. I do not like all the trouble downloading books I have already bought. It should work better than this. I hope you will improve the situation.

author: Tallon Canaris
title: Don’t be fooled with negative reviews!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: First of all this is my first e reader and that being said this product is amazing! It’s lightweight and slim and very easy to hold. The screen is crystal clear without being straining on the eyes. I was a little concerned with some of the negative reviews but I haven’t noticed any downsides of this Kindle. I highly recommend this product!

author: Yeni
title: Overall awesome....
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it overall.Just wish amazon let you create Folders under your downloaded section, this way you can organize your books, group them.I love paper books.... this is first time getting electronic reader, it is actually much better than a paper book in most scenarios. For example, school book, I want paper so I can write in it directly.... all else... this rocks.

author: M.A.
title: Battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery life advertised for this device is vastly overstated. The advertisements leads you to believe the battery will not have to be recharged for up to two weeks. Obviously the charge is dependent on how much the device is used. It may be better than the older Kindle Paper White but the life of the charge the way it is advertised is grossly over-exaggerated.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Favorite e reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the functionality of this device. Ive owned other e readers and this one is my fave. Only thing that bugs me is the lag on page turns at times and sometimes if i hit it just right qhen tuening the page it skips a ton of pages and i have a hard time getting back to where i was

author: Another Amazonian
title: Buttons buttons buttons
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: No light on/off buttonNo page advance buttonNo page back buttonThe power button is on the bottom? Where you hold the device, and have to avoid pressing it?And a micro USB port? On the “updated” model?The good bit- send to kindle integration with libraries is the reason to get a kindle.  Other than that, it’s a step down from my old kobo.

author: MM
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle Paperwhite - especially being backlit; has more choices for customizing the display, compared to my ancient one that was traded in;  the trade-in process worked well and made it very affordable to upgrade.  I'm very satisfied with this purchase.

author: paulagator
title: so light and compact!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: so far, nothing to dislike about it.  I owned one of the original kindles and wore it out. so much easier to read books on a kindle than an ipad. don't mind the little "ads" - they are not distracting at all

author: Big John
title: Minimal improvement over previous models
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Upgraded to this unit from a first generation Paperwhite.  This model is very slow to "wake up" compared to the first generation model.  There is no appreciable difference in resolution or battery life.  Frankly expected more for the price.

author: jarrell clemmons
title: Small and light weight.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the size and lightweight. You can hold and flip page with one hand if you place a pop-socket on the back. Without the pop-socket it’s too wide to hold with one hand and flip page with same hand

author: Brian Erberich
title: Pretty good, almost awesome.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall, I love my new Kindle.One thing that I think needs changing in the next version: move the on/off button to the side or top.  With the switch on the bottom, it turns off whenever I try to prop the device up while reading (like when I am eating and am using both hands).Of course, it will be nice once it comes with a screen that can show color pictures.

author: Janet EC
title: My Favorite Way to Read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like my Kindle Paperwhite because I don't need a light to read.  It's compact and easily stores in my purse for reading anywhere.It's great for travel; you don't have to carry several books to read - they're all in one place.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Easy read-inside and outside
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The ability to read for hours without experiencing the traditional blue-light strain coupled with the ability to read in the sun in or near my pool is fantastic.  I purchased this device solely for reading without interruption from emails, pop-up notifications or phone calls that routinely occurred when I was on my iPhone or iPad.  Recommend to anyone looking for a very efficient e-reader.

author: JMcCoy
title: Too bright for nighttime reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The lowest setting brightness on this Kindle is much too bright. Previous Kindles were perfect for reading before bed but this one is not. I have been a daily Kindle reader since the first generation and this is the first one with which I am disappointed.

author: Robert Bednar
title: Fairly long battery life.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 1st one was defective & had to be returned. This one okay by (a) doesn’t have as bright a screen as my previous Nook Glowlight, and (b) has the ON/OFF switch that protrudes on the bottom so that when I rest the device on my stomach to read, it activates the switch.  The switch shoud’ve been placed elsewhere.

author: shop girl
title: Love this my paper white.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like the size of this, it is so easy to carry everywhere.  Have resisted a reader for years as I truly love a book book in my hands.  This was a gift, so decided to use.  Now I am sold. It saves me trips to the library, I can read at night without a light so do not disturb anyone else. I am sold.

author: MMG
title: Glad I updated to the new Paperwhute
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the size and lightness in weight, along with the ease to open and close it.  Page movement seems easier as well.  Really glad I updated to it!

author: StephenK
title: Not an improvement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A bit disappointing. The device responds slower than the last generation (not sure if it’s software or hardware related). The touch controls are clumsier. Unless you have a huge need for waterproof, I would stick to refurbished last gen paper white.

author: pstiff48
title: on/off switch is awkward
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The on/off switch is on the bottom of the unit right where you hang on.  This is most awkward and I hit it all the time when I am reading.  Why couldn't they put it on the top out of the way? OR Why isn't it recessed like the Kindle Fire?

author: Politzania
title: not much of an upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased this to replace an older paperwhite that the screen had cracked. Very similar overall with more memory and water resistant but nearly twice the price which brings it down a star in my eyes as it is not a great value compared to my older one. If you are not replacing an old paperwhite then it is 5 star

author: Dr. BJS
title: Just like my old paperwhite, but better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new model is familiar and operates almost exactly the same as the paperwhite it is replacing.  The option to listen to audiobooks and make use of reading/listening syncing is fantastic for someone like me who listens to audiobooks almost exclusively in my vehicles.

author: mrg
title: Waterproof Paperwhite Rocks!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 2nd kindle paper white and I love it!  Waterproof feature is reason I bought the new one and am thrilled with this!!!

author: Jeff Forman
title: I like my Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: After using the basic Kindle for about four years, I took advantage of Amazon's trade in program. I applied the discount and credit to a Paperwhite. The improvements are significant: better resolution and back lighting. It certainly makes it easier for me to read under less than ideal lighting conditions.

author: Gerlinde Page
title: That its small enough to fit in handbag
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Received as a gift..  love it, although finding it a little difficult to set up.  Working on it now...

author: Ella Zaguskin
title: Easy to use and navigate
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new kindle, easy to use and I powered it before going on vacation and used it every day for 8 days and it was still enough power. The kindle itself thin and doesn’t take a lot of space. Learn how to navigate in no time. Very happy with my purchase!

author: Mindee
title: I love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My eyes hurt less than when using my tablet and it is small and compact enough to carry in my purse.

author: TrustedReviews
title: Waterproof Yes, But Blurry Text and Smudgy screen
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The all new kindle (10th generation) may be waterproof and 2x the storage, BUT the screen is shinier and more blurry compared to my previous generation Kindle Paperwhite.Unless you read by the pool / in the shower, save yourself some money and get the superior generation.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Would give 5 stars if this one issue didnt bug me.....
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: first off let me say I love the waterproof and the light weight of this new paperwhite. That said I do not like the way the page turning isn't as effortless as the old version.

author: Travis H.
title: Better than a Book
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easier to carry on travel than a bookBetter for reading at the gym (on elliptical or treadmill) than a bookTakes up substantially less space on a shelf than a slew of books

author: Amazon Customer
title: Batterie Life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So overall happy with my kindle but I do remember the description saying the battery life was better on this unit, not true. Actually the battery life on my old unit was better than this one, I'm always having to charge this one, I'm glad I have a portable charger cause I use it daily on this unit. Other than  that I love it.

author: Bruce Olsen
title: Very nice but for the location of the power off button
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The power off button is on the bottom of the reader and when I set it down on the exercise equipment it turns off and sometimes resets completely.  I bought it for m work outs and now I am trying to figure out a work around for this problem

author: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have a gen 3 kindle, this is an amazing upgrade for me.  Like the old and love the new.My eyesight is not good and the white background is a great help to reading.

author: R. Carr
title: Love my new paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Upgraded from a kindle fire for book reading. Totally in love! The matte screen makes a huge difference, and the lighting function is perfect. Battery life is excellent. The size and weight of the device is also a plus - it's easy to carry around in my purse or read while walking on the treadmill.

author: Oleh
title: Love it. An Awesome reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Can't really compare it with previous generations (it's my first kindle), but I think that waterproof is a thing. And this one is enough for reading, no need to buy voyage or oasis that are not much different from this one.

author: Breezy
title: Short and stalky.  Still does the job.  Eliminated my headaches.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far, so good.  Easy set up.  (My 3rd Kindle) Reads nicely, and love the screen clarity.

author: Joss1685
title: Perfect for reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it, it's perfect and smooth with the touchscreen.the illumination is perfect without been too flashy and it's super comfortable.Love the audio feature  it let me hear my audible audiobooks too and that helps me a lot with my reading goals.

author: r.d. begley
title: It is easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It was light. Easy to use.

author: BrittanyCollins
title: I absolutely LOVE my Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Kindle is the perfect size for handheld reading. I love the fact that the battery life is extremely long. I barely ever have to charge it and I read on it a LOT. I started with Wuthering Heights which is a bit difficult in terms of vocabulary and dialogue due to the time in which the book was written. I love how the word wise feature allows you to see what words mean. You can turn it on and off and turn the difficulty level up or down which really helps. Or if you don’t want to use word wise you can long press the word and the dictionary will show the definition of it. It’s a great device!! Five stars

author: Henrique S. G. Costa
title: Great tablet for reading!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was returning to reading printed books as my experience with e-books in Kindle Fire 8.9" was poor (my eyes got tired with LCD display).Then I decided to give Kindle Paperwhite a chance!What a difference! Reading e-books became a pleasure again!Highly recommend!

author: Kaye
title: The gift that keeps giving......
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use my new Kindle Paperwhite daily.  It was a 45 year anniversary gift, an upgrade to my old Kindle.  My husband bought both Kindles for me, he knows me so well.  A passionate reader, I enjoy the storage capacity, dictionaries.  My Kindle is truly one of the best things I have ever been given.

author: Lynn
title: Love my new Kindle Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I traded in my current Paperwhite (nearly 3 years old) for the new generation. Working great and I love it!

author: Cindy Hall
title: It was so easy to register and set up
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: i love to read. I had one of the first original Kindle readers. I still have it. But i wanted one with the light and a bit more storage. So another Kindle I have. They are the best.

author: Online connoisseur
title: Great upgrade from the original Kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Wife loves it. Finally upgraded to this and now she’s able to read in bed without turning a light on.

author: Amr Miqdadi
title: Great device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: if you are looking for carying a book library with you anywhere, anytime, and under any situation this is the device you must have.

author: B.D
title: Great upgrade from previous version
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new screen is a great improvement. With my older Kindle, debris used to get caught between the bezel and the screen. That's not a problem with this version  Overall it's a bit faster, slightly thinner and lighter. Another plus is that the backlighting is more uniform across the screen with no noticeable dark spots like on my previous Paperwhite.

author: Ella T. Lancaster
title: New Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle Paperwhite.  It is smaller than my old one, easier to carry in my purse, and so, so much easier to read.  you can adjust the font size, which is awesome, and, turning the page is as easy as touching the sides of the screen.  Very happy.

author: Cook Escoffier
title: For me, a life changer
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The only possible things I could dislike about the Kindle Paperwhite are the lack of a headphone jack and that the screen does actually glare at certain angles.But for such an affordable price I can't complain.Overall I would recommend to anyone looking to made reading easier.I haven't read this much in years! The easy to navigate design and convenient lightweight body have given me back what depression took from me years ago; the simple joy of reading.

author: MM
title: Don't get the one with ads
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I opted to save the $20 and got the software with ads. I expected it to be like my older kindle with ads when first opened and then nothing. But this new one has ads all over the first page. It was confusing to figure out how to navigate to my library and I kept getting taken to ads for other books if I touched the wrong part of the page.Otherwise the kindle is fine and 5 stars.

author: Alinita
title: Not always the most responsive, but good overall.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My biggest complaint is that foot-notes are touch and go, I often have to tap four or five times to read one, because it keeps turning the page instead. Otherwise, the font size choices, backlight option and battery life are all great.

author: plan17b
title: Screen a tiny bit fuzzy.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Screen a tiny bit fuzzy. If had to choose again, would go for the higher end model.

author: PGP
title: Great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's faster and lighter than my original Paperwhite.  The charger fits perfectly and while I don't think it holds a charge as long as the description said, it's pretty good.  After having it for about 2 weeks, I am glad I upgraded.

author: Alison
title: It's time for an upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I finally upgraded from my Kindle keyboard, mostly due to the waterproof feature. The ads aren't nearly as distracting as I thought they would be and I've actually been interested in a few of the books. Love the connectivity to Goodreads, just be sure to turn off the auto-update if you're reading something you don't want everyone to know about.

author: John Rico
title: Much improved display, worth the upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Much easier to read and lighter than first generation paperwhite. The backlight on the first generation had bright and dim spots, but this model looks even. Definitely worth the trade in deal! Waterproof is very nice since now I can take it to the pool.

author: Luis Saborio Martinez
title: Articulo defectuoso
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Compre la kindle al recibirla estaba empacada al parecer de fabrica la misma estaba sellada pero al encenderla note que tenia un punto muy pequeño pero el cual resalta es un pixel dañado, me coumunico con servicio al cliente y se me informa debo hacer un procedimiento un poco engorroso a mi parecer para reintegrarme el dinero les manifiesto que no quiero el dinero quiero un producto en un estado integro no en mal estado al parecer las politicas no son las mas adecuadas para una conformidad a mi persona que soy el cliente el cual adquiere un articulo nuevo y el cual viene con defecto de fabrica.

author: Breughel
title: Great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had an ancient Kindle and loved the size and the real leather case with the pull out light. It died and I wept. I have the new Kindle and after reading a few books my muscle memory no longer tries to push the button to turn the page. I've gotten used to the smaller, lighter size and it is more convenient for travel. I suppose we must let go of the old technology but I do wish my old Kindle had lasted forever.

author: Doggie dog
title: Good product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this for my wife so she can read at night without having to have the light on. She loves it! The battery life is not whats claimed even with the wifi and bluetooth turned off but, i just keep it charged for her every day and she's happy.

author: Chuck Allen
title: New paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like this kindle but wish it were a little larger. I would also like it if the pages scrolled instead of tapping at the finish of every page. I read fast and with the small page I am tapping a lot.

author: Michael Borachok
title: Not a great upgrade.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Iwould not have gotten except that my previous one sort of died.I like the increased storage and it being water resistant.I replaced one that would restart every few minutes. Really think that they should last longer.The most disappointing thing is that the categories didn't transfer and can't be used but still say they exist. I can see them only in my android app.

author: Theodore J Commons
title: Good and Bad
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Like the non-glare screen.  I don't like the way the books in your library are listed.  It is hard to tell if you use the list method what books have been read.  It is not always easy once book is completed to return to reading list.  I would prefer rather than a notation 100% books which have been read are moved into a separate section.  It would be nice to have a reader which reads everyone's books and not have to jump through steps to convert books so they can be read by other readers.  I would use my I-Pad more for reading if they had an ability to have ability to switch to non-glare mode.

author: Zen dancer
title: Kindles just keep getting better and better yay
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my second Kindle and I love them both. No more trips to the library for me except to socialize. I have noticed my new Kindle is lighter which is a bonus I like that when I put in purse so this was very good bye for me. Love my Kindles

author: Amazon Customer
title: Battery = worthless
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery life is completely false advertising. I've had it for a month. Read about 45 minutes a night and the battery is dead in under 2 days. I spoke to customer service and it suggested leaving it in airplane mode. What??? So much for syncing. So I guess every night before I pass out I’ll turn it on, sync it so my other devises know where I am, then turn it back off. Yeah.... no. This of course is in none of the literature that came with  or advertising on the device. Hey my car gets 100 miles per gallon if I turn it off and coast most of the way.... pretty sure this is deceptive advertising!

author: Rny
title: Not as good as the older versions
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It works, but I’m not really into the touch screen page turning. It’s too sensitive, I accidentally skip pages all the time. Also the library is hard to use on this. It shows ads for new books mixed in with your library so you don’t see all your books on one or two pages. I miss my old kindle, this one is not as good.

author: Jakovljevic Vladimir
title: Please add sensor for light to new model
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: New Paperwhite is fast, light to fit in one hand, has a few new features comparing the first models like better handling of highlights, easier control over thumbnails etc... I would like you to include a sensor for light intensity - "adaptive light sensor", to make reading under variable light conditions more pleasant. I guess you keep that feature for most expensive models Kindle Voyage and Kindle Oasis. Anyway, I doubt that "adaptive light sensor" is that important that should force me to seek exclusively for Kindle models that have "adaptive light sensor", though.

author: Darrell Godfredson
title: undependable page turn
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: When turning to t he next page it will sometimes skip ahead several pages.  While trying to get back to desired page it will sometimes refuse to go back and will only alternately switch between advanced pages back and forth.Very bad product.  I assumed it was my learning curve and waited too long to report problems and got out beyond the return date.  Very disappointing.

author: Taylor C. Martin
title: Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. It will now be easier for me to buy it my kindle so i don't have to wait. Love it

author: Alfie
title: Looks good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Smaller, lighter and thinner than older model.  You will need to order a new case for this if you have an older model Kindle.

author: Snazzy
title: First book reader, so handy!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very nice, can read in any light, easy to get new books, eliminates stacks of read books. Highly recommended.

author: william wright
title: Excellent Upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very slim and has more light than last model. I also liked the fact that it fit into my case I already had, saving me money.

author: Mark C
title: Wife Loves her Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: She has all her books with her wherever she goes. She cannot stop saying how great and wonderful this Kindle is

author: anchorskid
title: Pre-registered?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My new paperwhite just came today.  I asked that it be pre-registered.  It is not.  My passwords are working and it doesn't want me to create a new account since I already have one.  BLAST!  DARN IT!  I'm thoroughly aggravated!

author: Carlene
title: I love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Even better than the old kindle (that I wore out). The light behind the text is perfect, not too bright, just enough to allowe me to read in the dark.  There are still some issues with the off/on button, but it's somewhat improved over older models.

author: Taylor James
title: Best Kindle Paperwhite so far
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Second kindle paper white I’ve purchased. First one was the 1st edition and this one is such a step up. Such fast button reactions, beautiful screen, perfect size and long battery life. Very much recommend

author: IronMac
title: It’s light and easy to hold with just one hand.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s called paper white so I expected the back ground to be white. With the back light off it’s gray just like older models. With the backlight cranked up it does get white but battery life suffers. I do, however, love the backlight for night time reading.

author: vasili4
title: finally waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: now reading under the rain is a pure fun. I stopped worrying that it might die any second and can just enjoy reading a book in the shower, pool and throw it to my bag with wet towels as my phone and all the stuff. What a great time to live

author: Shari S
title: Like my old one better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Disappointed in this Kindle. Have a Paperwhite from a few years ago that is much better.The lack of a physical frame around this makes it hard to hold, at least for me. It takes much longer to "wake up" than my older version, which I is instant-on. The screen seems more mottled, with less consistent background light.

author: Bob Lozier
title: I use the Kindle for all my reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new paperweight is very light which makes it very easy to read along with the ability to change the degree of light you need.

author: F. Katsos
title: Heavy reading made light!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Purchased the first generation Kindle way back when and fell in love with the technology. This new paperwhite version is so lightweight and easy to read. As I’ve aged I really appreciate the font size options as well. Reading made fun and convenient

author: Amazon Customer
title: lacking in a lot of  key areas
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: i bought this product thinking i could use my textbook app; the paper white is advertised as the best reader for your eyes,  while you can use the bookshelf app with other kindle readers, apparently its not compatible with the kindle paperwhite.  In an attempt to bypass this, I have upload pdfs but the kindle paperwhite is not great viewer when it comes to pdfs.  good for reading books, but at the price id rather buy paper back going forward.  In my opinion, i feel like i was mislead by claims made by amazon, the ipad is a better overall product given the price of the kindle paper white.

author: G. Michael Gougler
title: Better than expected
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use this Kindle for reading books only, no audio, etc.  It is an essential travelling companion because of how long it operates without being recharged.  The interface can be confusing but I am gradually getting better at navigating the device.

author: samantha lance
title: I’m not happy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased and set up my new Kindle in November 2018.  It’s now December 18th, I charged it and when to read my books and the dang think will not work.  It’s frozen in the screen saver page 😩😩😩.  I will be calling C.A. in the am.  😩😩😩

author: br
title: New Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is a second Paperwhite I've owned.  Had the first one for over 5 years with no problems, but wanted to upgrade.  I've only had this new Gen 10 one week, but so far it's working great.  The Kindle trade in process was pretty smooth as well.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great size! Fabric cover cleans easily!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the size and that it has a light. I should have read Discription better and ordered a Bluetooth earphone with it, as it has no jack and my plan was to use it for audible books. My old kindle worked without wireless Bluetooth. I was concerned that fabric cover (cheaper) would be a dirt collector, but it’s way to wipe off. Nice!

author: Benchwarmer
title: Kindle - Still the best way to read on the go.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My third Kindle- plus iPhone, computer, etc connections.  Still a great way to read. Apple could spice up its sync feature as it often misses by several pages. Small enough for the pocket and the extended battery is a plus.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect for downloading and reading e-books!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I finally upgraded to this newer version: Kindle paper white ( from a Kindle Keyboard 3G), and it is perfect! Very user friendly, small and compact with a good battery life.Really had no reason to upgrade except that the previous Kindle did not light up (needed a light from the cover which was becoming unreliable- and a new cover was obsolete). The new Kindle is backlit (with varying degrees of light) and eliminates this problem! screen size is the same, but the devise is smaller since the keypad is integrated with the screen. Expect to get many years of reading with this new device!

author: Julius Wilson
title: Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Everything about it works very well I am reading more books faster. Lots of sources for free books too!

author: Paul F. Rodney
title: The new Amazon paper white is at least as good as the original
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Likes:  It is light weight, has a large capacity and is fairly easy to useDislikes:  Can't get rid of ads in some modes.  Perhaps its too easy to operate (e.g. it is highly desirable to organize my library to a greater depth than just one level)  The kindle and the accessories arrived at very different times; I'm still waiting for the screen protector after many weeks.

author: jeannie campbell
title: Easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is easy to use and learn to use. I can take my favorite books with me without taking pounds of books.

author: Allan Edwards
title: Waay worth upgrading from Keyboard Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had an old keyboard Kindle previously. This is so much lighter and the touch screen is, well not terrible, vs the keyboard. I was worried about readability with the whiteness being an eyestrain, but it is a pleasure to look at.

author: Dalesky
title: Better in every way
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is definitely an improved product, and I had no complaints about the last one. It is easier to read, touch is softer and quicker, the battery charges quickly, and basic storage is doubled. Nothing to dislike, and improvements are noticeable. Well done Amazon.

author: Pat
title: New Kindle Paperwhite***Now Water*proof👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 3rd Kindle E-Reader.. best one yet! It is very light and easily fits into your handbag! Stores all your favorite books and can be readily available to use when waiting for a scheduled appointment, traveling, or a great day at the beach! Great buy!

author: William Kirk
title: I love this
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I can use this indoors or out and not have an issue with the ambient light. I just wish I'd bought one sooner.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Page turning issue
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm mostly writing this review to see if anyone is having the same page turning issues I am. Paging forward works just fine but paging back has a glitch on my current one and the replacement they sent me. Most of the time, but not all, when I try and go back to reread something, the page goes forward no matter what I do. Sometimes if will eventually start going back but mostly I have to click on the "Go to" option to click on the chapter to actually get it to go back.I had a Kindle Keyboard for about 9 years before the battery died so I'm happy with Kindles in general.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Relocate the power button
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the new design, the seemless screen and it’s is waterproof, but I DO NOT like the power button location on the bottom. Especially while on the treadmill, the button is sensitive and wants to restart the device several times. UGH.

author: sandra
title: The size is very compact. It fits nicely in my handbag, as well as my jacket pocket.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased the Kindle Paperwhite, and I am extremely happy with it. The set up was easy as 1 2 3. Loading my books from my previous Kindle was also very easy. The paperwhite makes reading very easy. This is one purchase that I am extremely glad I made.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Over sensitive power switch!!!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third paperwhite. I like the flat screen but I still hate the power switch at the bottom. This one is much more sensitive than the others. Every time I use it on a treadmill or elliptical it shuts off several times. This morning it even rebooted twice. Even setting it upright on a table to read, it shuts off. I'm going too have to put something along the bottom to protect the switch. I like the old one better. PLEASE PUT THE FREAKING SWITCH ON TOP OR SIDE!!

author: Duane Sparks
title: Great for reading at night
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I can read in bed at night without disturbing my spouse.  The light from my Kindle is subtle enough to not brighten the bedroom.

author: Princess Peaches
title: It's lighter than I expected.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm enjoying my new Kindle so much! It's little, lightweight, and I can read it at night or in the bathtub.

author: Amazon Customer
title: My dog ate my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My dog ate my older Paperwhite. This is my 6th Kindle over the years. They get better and better, this is the best. I like the the built capability for Audible, the on/off button on the bottom. Great product.

author: Erica
title: Beyond disappointing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So disappointed with this product. The first one I received was very glitchy, so Kindle sent me a new one. Turns out, the first one wasn’t glitchy, the product is just really bad. Think 1992 gameboy. Slow to move pages, and when you do it flashes from white on black to black on white. Not worth spending a penny on, so this one is going back as well.

author: Kym
title: The book is fine but customer service leaves alot to be desired
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: We bought this to replace a lost Kindle. Had to call customer service to have it set up and it has been 3 days since they said they would call back to get it set up. Not a product issue, a customer service issue for sure.

author: NG
title: Won’t turn on all the time
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Twice in a week  I have had to reset the device because it would not turn on; it didn’t espond to opening the cover and it didn’t respond to a button push.

author: BLT
title: Great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: You cannot go wrong with a Kindle. In my house, we have had just about each iteration. This one is perfect. In future builds, I hope to see smaller bezels. Other than that, it is exactly what you can expect in a Kindle.

author: HarleyII
title: Constant page turner
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It goes forward and backward at it's own will, making me constantly search for where I am reading. It is a struggle to get to Home ans make settings, font size comes up and changes it's size without  my asking for it. Page, location etc comes and goes as it pleases.

author: DZ
title: Love my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I chose to replace my water damaged Kindle with this one. I was on the Viking Sky when we had a little incident off the coast of Norway. During the excitement my Kindle got submerged and died. No more, next time I'm prepared.

author: Elizabeth
title: Does not support games
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was so excited to receive this new kindle paperwhite for my birthday!  I have had a Kindle since 2010.  I read constantly, but I also play Sudoku and Every Word daily.  Customer service told me that the new version does not support any games or "active content" from previous versions.  I returned this and hope nothing ever happens to my older Kindle.  VERY disappointed.

author: Lori Ann
title: Hard to adjust.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third paperwhite and my least favorite. It seems like the black is not black enough, more like a dark grey. This makes it harder to read.  I keep trying to adjust font, backlight, size, but never seems right.

author: Carolyn O. Chapuis
title: Great reader.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first Kindle. I wish I had bought one sooner. It is easy to read and I like that you can look up words you don’t know with the dictionary. It even connects to Audible.

author: JS Walsh
title: Hate it.  I $129 down the drain.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Hate it....I’ve been a kindle user for over 10 years.  Loved my first one with the manual page turn buttons.  Thought since this is new you could scroll down as the app does.  NO.  It is hard to turn a page and the service is so sensitive when you were trying to turn the page it turns on the dictionary, etc. is very irritating to my carpal tunnel problem. Guess I’ll go back to eBay and try to buy an old one. $129 down the drain.

author: Austin Kim
title: Slower processing speeds
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is something like my 4th or 5th Kindle Paperwhite. Something that I've always appreciated with the Kindle Paperwhite was that it was fast - you could go from having the kindle in your pocket to reading in under 2 seconds. For some reason, this new generation of Kindle is slower - it takes ~5 seconds to boot up, more prone to freezing, more prone to loading the next page slower, etc. Not sure what changed - maybe Amazon added bloatware or put in a weaker processor, but there's a very noticeable and annoying lag with this new generation of Kindle.

author: megbubbster
title: Boyfriend is Happy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he is super happy with it. He was not sure he would like a Kindle as well as holding a book, but he is happy to use it. This Paperwhite is way faster than my first generation one I got in like, 2011.

author: J. King
title: No Battery Life. Very disappointing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Horrible. This is my 4th Kindle. Very disappointing. The battery life is no more than 2 or 3 days. Haven’t used it that much either. Didn’t want one with ads but it has them.Tried turning off the backlight but still lousy battery life. Infuriating

author: Rox
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I wasn't sure if I'd like a kindle since I'm not a fan of reading on my phone, but the kindle is a whole different experience and I love it so much.  It's so matte looking and doesn't hurt my eyes. The size is perfect, like the size of a chapter book. The "special offers" are I guess the recommended books but I honestly don't even notice them. I like that goodreads and amazon are linked. Overall, I'm really happy with it but this is my first kindle so I didn't have many expectations.

author: Thomas Wayne Wood
title: Best so far
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Awesome! I’ve had select models since first kindle, and in my book (PUN INTENDED) this one is best! Great value in an awesome device!

author: DEEFO
title: paper white Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle is very disappointing to me. It is much smaller then I thought, and I feel it is hard to use. As a elderly person it is much too sensitive I am constantly looking for my page , I think it is much more complicated to use. Very disappointed. I have started using my first Kindle, miss the light, but much less frustation for me. I would like to return, but do  not have original packaging.

author: Stephany Pichardo
title: Love the design, but slower than my older kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I took advantage of the trade-in offer that Amazon has, trading in my previous kindle for a discount on the new one. I love the design - the full face of the Kindle is flat, rather than having the screen inlaid in the device. Saves me a ton of time from trying to get out dust and crumbs from the crevice. I'm looking forward to utilizing the bluetooth to listen to audiobooks. My only con would be that it takes a longer amount of time to upload the 'swipe' screen, and sometimes it takes longer to turn the page than my previous kindle. Pros definitely outweigh the cons for me!

author: Guy fanelli
title: Dont listen to haters....
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first ever kindle. I noticed a lot of people complain about the battery life. Yes, the kindle will not last for eternity while connected to wifi or other things, BUT GUESS WHAT, you can put the kindle in airplane mode to make the battery last as advertised. And then when you want to download another book, YOU CAN TURN THE AIRPLANE MODE OFF. *mind blowing*I love this product though. Have not tested the waterproof feature (and dont intend to), but the backlight addition to kindles is awesome. I have no problems reading anywhere.

author: 55sgrandma
title: Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that it has a light but it’s not user friendly like my old kindle. I could see my library and could see what I already read and find my new books easily.I really wished I had just gone back and bought one like I had. I

author: Angel McCulloch
title: NOT IMPRESSED
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Not really impressed with this Kindle version.Slow loads, locking screens, touch screens not responding, not user friendly with large amounts of books. Will be going back to old version and carrying a light. 😞

author: Brandon Smith
title: Perfect reading companion
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love how little this Kindle weighs. It is super easy to carry around with me everywhere. The light is easy on the eyes and makes reading at night easy without disturbing others. The battery lasts for days without the need to charge.

author: Aaron.Ward
title: Versatility
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I liked my new kindle for the most part, it’s perfect for hand grip for easy to slip out of hand, A on that!  I downloaded books on internet transferred them with the usb cord attached to the computer, not bad! Built in dictionary to learn new word, nice!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Very slow to wake up :-(
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love how the screen is all flat now. But I hate how slow it is to wake up. My old paper white woke up as soon as I opened the case, no delay. This one take about 30 seconds. I was excited because of the new features but I’m not impressed with the quickness

author: mamabear
title: You get this squared  away
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: You have hzve charged  me agai for this kindle when it was returned  back in  February  so please  credit  my checking  account. i am tired. of this it is not the first  time  you have did this to me over this item.

author: Jasmine Glasheen
title: The Actual Worst
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is the worst Kindle I’ve ever owned and usually I buy them for $35 when they’re on sale. It’s always on and advertisements are always on your home screen... there’s no shutting them down. Buying a book? Good luck getting it downloaded the same night. Want to watch movies or scroll the web on your paperwhite? It’s not built to do that. Also? Superslow. Takes longer to do things than any other model. Really just 💯 sucks.

author: K. Flanigan
title: Nothing better than a Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Like this so much better than the Oasis I have. Easier to hold, too.

author: Bev
title: A splendid device!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I own many Kindles, and now I can read while I soak in the bathtub since this lovely device is waterproof!

author: Larry Pigeon
title: best design yet
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: love the flush front. wish it came with a silicon port protector. its advertised as waterproof but something about submerging and open port makes me nervous.still love this thing. take it out kayaking all the time. great for reading by the pool or the beach or in the bathtub

author: Madeline
title: Great device with one complaint
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first e-reader but I had looked at the previous Paperwhite and this one is a great improvement. It is much lighter and easier to hold in one hand which was the main selling point for me.  However, I subscribe to the NY Times and  and can therefore read it for free on other digital devices. Although you can read the NYT on the Paperwhite, you have to pay for it.  I called the NYT and was told there is no way to connect to the Paperwhite and I assume to any Kindle. If it were not for that, I would have given it 5 Stars.

author: Traci
title: Okay, not an upgrade though
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery life sucks, it feels flimsier than the old paperwhite. It's not a terrible device, I read with it out in the rain once, but it is not as good as the older version that it's supposed to be an upgrade from.

author: Rita J. Spratlen
title: A great way to read to go!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my kindle. I like that it is so compact. I like that I can put it in my purse and take it with me everywhere. No more wasting time in the waiting room. I love that I can see it very well and it lights up great. I am a happy buyer!

author: KR1120
title: Good basic e-reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A good basic e-reader for anyone who blasts through books! I previously had a Kindle Fire, but lost it while on vacation. I bought the Kindle Paperwhite as a replacement and love the fact that there is no glare and I have certainly made use of the Audible trial. I gave four stars instead of five because there is a bit of delay when scrolling.

author: new fire owner
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have two Kindle Fires that I like, but I think the All New Paperwhite is my favorite. I don’t like that I can’t read the Kindle Fire outside or in the car due to the glare. I have no problem reading the Paperwhite in the car, it is great. I am looking forward to using it this summer when floating in the pool. I wasn’t sure about the size, but I like the size. So far I have had no trouble with the Paperwhite and really enjoy reading on it!

author: Avid Reader
title: Not What I Wanted After All
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: If you're looking for just a reading device, this will certainly serve the purpose. However, I had been spoiled by a Fire and found this just didn't meet my expectations so I returned it and ordered the Fire 8 instead.

author: R2-Reese2
title: Love it so far!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’m partial to physical books.  I have a kindle fire and I never got much use out of it.  After a deep tidy up of my place and the donation of a lot of my books I decided to limit my purchases of physical books to two a month to save room.  I love this paper white and love that it’s waterproof!  It’s small and sleek so it saves room in my small backpack. So far it’s exceeded my expectations.  I haven’t used it in the pool or tub yet though.

author: denise schenk
title: Working great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I replaced my 4 year old paper-white with the new one.  I really enjoy the improvements in the kindle.  I have been using it for around 11 days with no problems.  I can really tell a difference in it being lighter that my previous paper-white.

author: DeeDee
title: Wonderful!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle!! this is my third one.  Now I can relax when in tub or pool reading. Feels lighter than last one I had and has a few more features. I take it everywhere. I would rather read than play a game on phone when sitting in waiting room.

author: Charles t.
title: Very poor battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery only holds up for between 3 and five hours. Hard to even finish a story.  Tech Support told me to upgrade the software but the instructions were completely confusing as i was to download the update to my computer and then transfer it to the Kindle.  I have no idea  how to do  this.

author: Plamen
title: DEFECTIVE CABLE! DOESN’T COME WITH CHARGER!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Recieved on time. The device is nice and work properly. Came with no adapter and the support told me it doesn’t come with one! So, it’s my mistake I didn’t read the description, but it’s still non sence to recieve a device with no charging adapter!!! So I have to buy one for extra 20$! I recieved a cable, which is defective! From the support explained they will credit my account so I can buy another one. COMPLITELY UNACEPTABLE for that money! And it was a gift, so the Christmas magic didn’t work!

author: D. Kirkpatrick
title: Waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far I really like. The most exciting feature I have been unable to use to date. I live in Ohio and like to read in the swimming pool. Of course it’s winter now so will have to wait. This was the main reason for my purchase.

author: Investor
title: Perfect if you want to focus on reading.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the fact that I can focus on reading and not be distracted by apps.  I enjoy reading anywhere at anytime.  I mostly read at night right before going to bed.  I don't have to worry about plugging the device to an electrical outlet on a daily basis.  Being water proof will definitely encourage me to take my kindle when I go to the pool to relax.

author: Dean
title: Wifi connecting an issue
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Problems connecting to wifi. Every few weeks it makes me reconnect. But its not as easy as just reconnecting. I have to try several times. Turn it off and on again several times. Then magically 20 minutes later it connects?Otherwise I like it. But the wifi thing makes me wish I had just purchased the I Pad mini.

author: Ddog
title: Excellent device except for paging
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall I like the Kindle Paperwhite.  What I don't like is the on-screen paging mechanism.  Its not terribly accurate and sometimes you end up paging the other direction!  I like the former method of using buttons, whatever happened to them?!

author: Scott Schwandt
title: poor operating instructions
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very "tech savy" I have and use serveral "tablets" and Cell Phones. I network my own house for years. I baught this for my wife who is not "Tech Savy", but a Co-Worker had one, and my wife is sick of reading "paper" and having all these books laying around..….WE ARE BOTH CONFUSED and FRUSTRATED.

author: Coleman
title: Nice experience, but laggy UI
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall a good reading experience. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because navigating the device is pretty laggy and clunky, which can get annoying. Also not a huge fan of seeing ads on the lock screen. But I will read books on it!

author: bookgirl
title: Good product for the cost
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have the 2nd generation paper white kindle and wanted to up grade to the waterproof.  This works much the same but there are a couple of things liked better about my previous one.  I cant say if it works after being immersed in water .

author: T. A. Walters
title: Comments, not complaints
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's a little smaller than I had expected, but therefore more convenient to carry.  I do have to turn the page a bit more often, but it's very easy to do -- one quick touch.  Easy to read, and easy to adjust the font if needed.  Really, no complaints.

author: Nanny
title: Perfect size
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love that you don’t need a reading light to read at night. The size is nice - easy to hold.  I replaced my first generation Kindle with this one so it’s been a learning curve since it’s touch & doesn’t have  buttons or a keyboard.

author: pjknCO
title: Needs Improvement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am going to keep the Kindle PaperWhite as a backup for my older Kindle.  I would like to see the page turning improved.The sweeping motion sometimes goes several pages.  I think the plastic around the screen could have been slightly larger.  I have pretty small hands, so I would guess people with larger hands or fingers would like more room.

author: Hazel
title: I love my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is perfect for me. I have to adjust the font size and lighting because of limited vision. Better than books, even large print books. Spend a lot of time on my Kindle and forget I have to turn pages in books.

author: lffannin
title: Won't hold charge
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I should have kept my old Paperwhite since this one is less than 4 months old and already will not hold a charge. It went from 100% to 17% in less than 2 hours and I have NO recourse because Amazon is impossible to contact.

author: mike b
title: It’s waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle. This is my 5th Kindle, so I am familiar with the features. I particularly like being able to see the covers when books are downloaded. My old Kindle only listed the title. Also reading previews of the book is easier on the new Kindle. I bought it specifically because it is waterproof. I had a glass of water spill on Kindle #3. That was the reason for #4. Thankfully, I haven’t had to test that feature yet.

author: Deborah B. Kyle
title: Love the Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is lighter and water resistant.  Perfect for the beach.  I bought the leather cover (very expensive) for it, but you can get other covers for much cheaper. Just make sure you have the right cover because the new Kindles are thinner.

author: dckdarby
title: user friendly?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I enjoy my Paperwhite, except getting back to my library after finishing a book, it is NOT intuitive for this senior!!My defunct Kindle Fire was much easier, plus, the color was cool, and, library items easier to read the titles.

author: Judith C.
title: Easy and fun to use-small size convenient.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really like the size, the touch features ( I own the original Kindle model, so this feature was new to me), the lighter weight, and , my favorite feature is the back lit screen with brightness adjustment. Long battery life and love that losing the cover puts it to sleep mode.The home screen is a bit busy. I haven’t found out how to make the text larger, but I am sure it is in the instruction manual which I will get to soon.

author: Barbara Bach
title: Great product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my second paperwhite. Love the size and the fact that I can use it outside.  The ease of downloading books is a big plus too.

author: Honor A. McGaw
title: Nice and lightweight and easy to operate.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I liked it, as I love to read!  However, I was disappointed that I can no longer access the Every Word game on this edition.  Also, I can't see that the battery lasts any longer without a charge than my older Paperwhite did.

author: Tina Weenig
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first kindle and I love it. I can’t believe I waited this long to get one. I only have to charge it once every week and a half.

author: Jean Maier
title: Great way to read!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall, I am happy with my new Kindle Whitepaper.It recharges quickly. It downloads very fast. It is easy to adjust font size. I did think that the battery would run much longer before recharging, though.

author: BW in Texas
title: The All-new Kindle Paperwhite-Now Waterproof w/2x the Storage
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am enjoying the new Paperwhite Kindle reader I just got.  It has 2x more storage which is great.  Also, it is very light weight and has a built in light which helps my tired eyes.  I also thought it was a good buy.

author: Stephanie Liew
title: Love it !
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really great and no problems :) Note that when you start a new good read account, I suggest browsing through as many books as possible and really picking what you like because you do get 5 books free upon registration ! Thank you for the quick shipping and I'm excited to finally have a kindle. Super lightweight and easy storage. Love that its waterproof.

author: Thomas Morrow
title: Yes Worth the Upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded  from An 8th generation to this. It's much better with the back lighting making it much more readable..True it is not faster but speed is not needed for reading

author: EA
title: Would be 5 stars but OFF button is at the bottom
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Would’ve given five stars, however whoever decided to put the off button at the bottom is insane.

author: Ryan Werner
title: Charging port is wacky... Other than that it's great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This e-reader does what I need it to do. The charger for the unit doesn't fit for some reason... That's a bummer, but I have several other cables that happened to work for it so I'm good.
