I upgraded from the first generation Nook simple touch and couldn't be more pleased... I'm unsure about Goodreads, so I simply didn't join...

author: Clark Hildum
title: Easy to use Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased the paper white Kindle to use only as a reader. I often use my Mac book air and my I pad for reading but neither of these work well outdoors in the sun.  I also like the compact size and minimum weight.  I am looking forward to reading my books outdoors this summer. I think the Kindle Paper White will work fine.

author: Cassidy
title: Battery Life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’m in love with my kindle! The battery has lasted me 4 days so far. It’s lightweight, convenient to travel with, and I am extremely happy with this purchase. There is some glare if you angle it a certain way towards light, however, it’s not enough to complain about to return it. If you notice that your battery life is draining quickly, switch the WiFi to airplane mode. I do notice that it does leave finger prints on it, but it doesn’t bother me to wipe it off with a microfiber cloth after I use it. Don’t be lazy lol Overall, I highly recommend this product!

author: George Fletcher
title: Connectivity issues
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: By now you know what this is and what to expect. As a reader it's flawless. My problem is that I get all my internet using a phone as a hotspot and the kindle has problems with that. Using either an iPhone or a LG G5 it has problems connecting.

author: jdbear
title: not sure
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: was working fine then one evening the screen went haywire and would not respond. I could not read anything or shut it off. had to go back to my kindle fire to read my book. next morning it was back to normal

author: Roger M. Goodson
title: It's ok, but I prefer 'color', rather than 'white'.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had to purchase this to find our my own preference.  However, that said, I find it easy to use, very 'pack-able', light, and effective for reading at night

author: Michel Fiset
title: Easy on the eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Thought the 6 inches would be small but it is the perfect size. Battery longevity is incredible as specified

author: John A.
title: MY KINDLE
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I LIKE MY NEW KINDLE. MY FIRST EXPERIENCE AT OWNING AND USING ONE. THE SCREEN IS NOT AS PAPER WHITE AS ADVERTISED, BUT IT WORKS. THE COVER IS NICE, BUT DOSN'T HAVE A BUILT-IN STAND FOR THE KINDLE. OTHERWISE, I'M PRETTY HAPPY WITH IT.

author: Ian Lovelette
title: Trade in your old for the new!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I very happy with my upgrade! The new paperwhite is amazing! The back lighting and it being waterproof are top notch.

author: IrishBruce
title: Love the new Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just upgraded to the new Paperwhite.  I really like the look and feel of the new device.  This is my third Kindle and I've been delighted with the new screen.  The readability in all light levels has been great.  I can turn pages using one hand and found a font that allows me to read with no eye strain.

author: WSC
title: Short battery life and poor customer service
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle loses it battery charge after just a few days--even in the screen off mode (which I use when I'm not treading).  Technically this device is under warranty until November--but how do you obtain warranty service  ?  The link on the original order tells me the device can't be returned but maybe replaced--but I can't link to a page that would allow me to request warranty service. Amazon seems to have a million links for recommendations and buying--but nothing obvious for service.

author: LEONARD
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s lightweight,compact and easy to use. What is not to like

author: Sandra tufo
title: No games on this kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the way it automatically wakes up.  I miss being able to play scrabble like I can on my old one. Probably wouldn’t have bought it had I known.

author: Kathleen Wilkie
title: Still Slow, but Water Resistant
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A few new cool features. Water resistant and more storage. Software is still just as slow as my old one. And I still dislike the old homepage. I never like the recommendations. And sometime I don’t have WiFi so I only want to see what books are on the device. Not in my cloud. The setup is still a little confusing to me, even after a few years. It’s not very intuitive.

author: Michael_CW
title: Bravo!!!! New Kindle!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very happy to get this new Kindle Paperwhite during last Christmas.I ordered it to replace my old ones, the 5th edition, as its back cover is degraded now.Also, I like this new model as it provides Bluetooth audio feature. So, I can listen my audio books.Recommend this new model to every Kindle owners if you like.Happy reading!!!

author: L. Revall
title: Terrific updates—best Kindle ever
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this as an update to my old kindle and I love it! Perfect size, can read at night, easy on my eyes and even beach and tub friendly since it is water resistant. Told my sister and she bought one too.

author: antoinette panico
title: even better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: the paper white just got tweeted--great gift or just get it yourself

author: Nick
title: Easier on your eyes!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Much improved over earlier model.  Improved lighting and more comprehensive reading controls provide an excellent reading experience.  An increase in storage capacity is a significant enhancement as well.

author: John S. David
title: I love this kindle product.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use it for reading.  It is a good product and works just fine however just fine isn’t great. The screen antiglare doesn’t seem to be quite as good as the promotion said. However this is a good product for stars is all a year but yes  In my situation I would buy it again.  No regrets!

author: Cynthia Cisco
title: Love my new Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It was so easy to download the books I had purchased with the Kindle app for my tablet.  I love the lightweight feel.  It doesn't both my hands holding as I read.  After reading several books since I got it,  I find I really like it.

author: Margaret C. Crowder
title: Easy on the eyes and lightweight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I liked the book as it was simple to use and understand.  I dislike the fact that it doesn't respond immediately to touch for turning page.  I sometimes have to touch two or three times to get next page.

author: lecteur
title: Avid Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle Paperwhite! So lightweight & compact. I had a 3rd. Geration Kindle and liked it very much but this is even better. I especially like the backlight which I did not have before and the Audible feature as well. This Kindle has so many more features. Many of these features I’m still learning. I highly recommend it!

author: Johnny B
title: Good oroduct
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The only thing I don’t like about this product is that it doesn’t turn off completely. Screen will black out but that’s all. It wastes a lot of my battery. On the good side, it’s very light weight and small. Great for trips!

author: ShinobiChris
title: Absolutely loving my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The backlight is so subtle that it seems to provide just enough not to distract the reader. Lots of great features.  I love getting to stream Audible over this Kindle with the use of bluetooth headsets or portable speakers.

author: Anonymous
title: Excellent!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My new Kindle Paperwhite arrived prior to the stated delivery date.  Setup was very easy.  I am thoroughly enjoying this reader.  I appreciate the waterproof feature.  I definitely recommend this Kindle!

author: Heather H.
title: Need to exchange
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just received in the mail today. May have to return the screen is glitched. Assuming this isn't normal.Update. Got the replacement. This has turned into such a joke, although the screen works with this one the power cord does not fit in the Kindle. Beyond mad.

author: Elizabeth Tsuzaki
title: Didn’t last very long
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I received my kindle and immediately charged it as the instructions suggested. It worked well the first couple of times I used it. After having the kindle for not more than three weeks, the screen froze and then the battery quickly died. I charged it again and the screen worked for maybe a minute.  Then it froze again. I have returned it and am awaiting a full refund.

author: Seymar
title: Can't do without it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a very old Kindle which I loved but needed to update. My son gave me his Kindle Fire which is not at all like a Kindle eReader. It caused me much frustration. I love this new Kindle. It's my constant companion.

author: Kindle Customer
title: I love the Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old paperwhite was stolen while on vacation. Fortunately the new one had just been released. The paperwhite is great for reading at the pool and on the beach. The small size allows me to carry it in my purse. It is by far my favorite reader!

author: Bill
title: Like the look of the screen
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Wanted something that looked like I was reading a book and the screen was nice in that regard but its just so small it feels like I'm reading on my phone.  Also quite slow and unresponsive.  Hoping it grows on me but for now I wouldn't recommend.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Works in bright sun and dark of night
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a Kindle Keyboard that gave up the ghost.  I replaced it with this and it works wonderfully well and the battery lasts a couple of days (I read about 6 hours a day minimum).  Well worth the price.

author: Nancy R. Kuehl
title: Loved my Kindle Paper white until it decided not to work It locked up.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: When I ordered my Kindle paper white  back in . 2018 I somehow ordered 2. One was returned & I kept the other one. In Dec. an error box came up on the screen & then the box turned white. I have not been able to use it since then. I would like to return it & have a new sent to me. How can I solve this problem. I loved reading from my Kindle white.

author: Linda K. Riffe
title: Highly recommended!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love me new Paperwhite!  It’s perfect for all my reading and so thin and light.

author: amymonique
title: Black and white flashing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 1 very bad thing, us the constant black to white flashing I get whenever I touch the screen. I love the weight. It is extremely easy to hold without my hands shaking.

author: Kendras Coffeebreak
title: Nice
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Its smaller than I expected but in a good way.  Easy to fit in my purse. Would be nice is the book covers were atleast in color.  Overall great buy.  I live in Country with no Barnes and Noble or book stores that sell fun books...only school books.

author: PublicName(lols)
title: Does exactly as stated!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Waterproof! I use it in the bath. Its lightweight and is exactly what I needed.

author: Theresa
title: So far so good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's a little different then my first paperwhite kindle that I got in 2014 but works the same and I am enjoying it.  Just miss the free 3G that I got with my first one in case I was where there was no Wifi.

author: Barbara1955
title: Arrived Broke!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Amazon sent me a e-mail saying the USB cords don't all fit in the port.  Well mine fits but has a Lot of Wiggle room :(Cable fits But the Whole usb wiggles left to right...  USB is BROKE!!!

author: Scott Milner
title: Outstanding ease of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was old school, just had to have a paper book in my hand. But, now I am totally sold on the Kindle. In seconds I can find and own great books.  I am hooked. it is so easy to use and it reminds me of where I left off when I suddenly snooze

author: Elizabeth Terrio
title: Valentine gift!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle! I can read at night without the lights on. Delightful. I’ve read three books on it & am enjoying it immensely. Easy, lightweight. Great for doctors appointments, hairdresser, any appointment one has to wait on. My hubby gave me a wonderful Valentine gift, instead of my roses. Great choice! As a retired school librarian it was a terrific gift!

author: David R. Krumboltz
title: Reading made easy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Too early to say the pluses and minuses , but so far I like the size, weight and readability.

author: M.—
title: Best yet.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love'd my other Kindle's but this one is the best yet.

author: NanB
title: Easy to set up and make wise choices using parental control options.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought two Kindle Paperwhites for each of my granddaughters for Christmas.  They love them!!

author: Angela e. Terry
title: I love it but…
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this to free up some space on my iPad. Overall I am happy with the purchase, I just wished the OS had some features that are with the OS Kindle app for the iPad. I am also disappointed that the screen is not in color; I know I am just reading text but I would like to see the book covers in color.

author: Carol Z
title: Great Reading Tool!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle Paperwhite! I had one of the original Kindles with a separate book light. This new one is really easy to read and l love the font choices. The only thing l miss is being able to move with a swipe to different chapters. It does need charging alot because l read 3-4 hours a day, but l was also having to recharge batteries just as often for my portable book light. I would definitely recommend this product!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Bad Placement of Power Switch
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Kindle is, overall, a nice product - conveniently containing numerous reading choices in a small package.There is, however, a design flaw I believe.  The very sensitive power button is located on the bottom edge of the reader.  Thus, gravity ensures that often when holding it and always when propping it there is pressure on the power button, and your reading is interrupted.  The screen does not rotate.  Put the power button on the top out of harm's way.

author: Billy Wilkins
title: Highly recommend this e-reader above others .
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is such a light weight device and I love it. No need to get 3G when you can tether to your phone so I went just WiFi 32gb. I'm so very happy with this purchase! I've had other ereaders but this is the best!

author: Rochelle Ellis
title: Subpar product all around
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I used to have a kindle paperwhite years and years ago and though it had its flaws, I decided to get it again. I wanted the look of a book but the convenience of a table. Honestly the tech is just old and completely not worth the money. I found myself getting super frustrated with the highlight function among other things. The home page was cramped and weird as well. I have decided to just buy an iPad mini. Much more functionality and bang for my buck. Claiming to be anti-glare and cheaper doesn't justify this product. Get with the times Amazon!

author: Abel Torres
title: Don't expect help if the headphones don't work.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: No control. I can't see menus when I've opened a book.Won't connect to bluetooth headphones and no help for that.So I've been stuck with an unusable reader. Totally useless.

author: ED Jenks
title: Kindle's are just good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've only had this Kindle for a week, but it exceeds expectations.  This is the 5 Kindle my wife and I have had in over 6 years. Her PaperWhite is over 3 years old.  They are just great devices, I can't imagine going back to a books.

author: Diane GP
title: It's always with me
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded my 2012 Kindle to this one for the new features. I've always been a fan of the eReader! It allows you to read to your mood w/multiple books at your fingertips. It fits perfect in any handbag too.

author: Ruth L. Thomas
title: Can you have white letters on black background????
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I actually bought this new kindle because I was told that the option was available for white letters on a black background.  I have tried and tried to change the screen to this, but cannot find the option available.  Is it???  My previous Kindle worked just fine and. Am not sure the upgrade was worth it.

author: WistfulDreamer
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was on the fence about purchasing this as a die-hard Fire owner. I have to say that I'm very happy with this! I still use my Fire, but when I just want to sit and read, this is the perfect device!

author: MaryJane Zabinski
title: Does not hold it's place while reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My only problem is that, while I am reading a chapter, it loses it place and drops back or forwardto a new location. So I have to leave my reading to find where I am again. Other than that it workswell.

author: S. Lofrano
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 2nd paperwhite. I love them and are really the only way I read any more.

author: lcosemento
title: Great in the Sun!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new kindle paper White! This is my third kindle! I read a lot outside and it is perfect! Now it is waterproof! I can read in the pool. I live in Arizona and spend a lot of time near or in the pool!

author: David Pfeifer
title: Better than lower end models
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 32 Gb version can actually hold all of the books and comics I have purchased. It also works much better than the previous version. I don't get the delay on searching through my library or sometimes on page turns.

author: T. Sanborn
title: Compact and easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Its a great unit as you would expect from Amazon. It does not provide color images for things like Kindle magazines.

author: Texas Transplant
title: Great Case
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great case for the 10th Generation Kindle Paperwhite, including the weight, fit and sleep function.

author: Shara0675
title: Little Disappointed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Slightly disappointed. I didnt realize you couldn't use this with a black background and white text. Drives me crazy because when you turn pages it flashes to the negative. So I know the capability is there. Page turn is clunky and some times takes me tapping several times to get it to switch.  Love the size, weight and battery life.

author: Michael. Crichton fan
title: Easy to read more if that’s your goal
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this! Easy and I can read in the bath without getting wet finger prints on another book.

author: Xavier
title: Love my paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Excellent product.  Love the water proof aspect of it. I took my previous paperwh9te to the beach and I was always worried about getting wet. The extra space is cool but not very necessary unless you listen to any audio books.

author: Customer
title: Great product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have no complaints with the Kindle Paperwhite.  I couldn't believe how much better it is to read for long periods of time on the Paperwhite vs. phone or tablet.  The battery life is as advertised.  I am well pleased with the product.

author: sharon murray
title: Kindle paper white
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the back lighting feature.  Don't need to have the bedroom light on when reading at night.  I find some things much harder to use than on my 8 year old kindle - for instance going to a specific collection and alphabetized collections.  Directions not really clear.

author: Jesse G.
title: Extremely Disappointed!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am having extreme difficulty syncing the kindle with the recommended headphones.  Also, my audible books just don’t work.  I looked forward to these Xmas presents but have only experienced non functioning merchandise.  But as I’m an optimist, I’ll give it some more time.  Believe me I wanted this to work.

author: K. Woods
title: I prefer the app on the phone, works better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I don't like the features as well as I do on the app. There are fewer options and the narration from audiobil didn't sync up or work. Plus I have to be on wifi for it to sync with my phone,  obviously, which isn't convenient during travel.

author: Stan the Man
title: Solid, slight design inconvenience
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Intuitive device, convenient size, and the optional lighted screen is 100% worth it.  Does everything I expected, perhaps a little spendy though.My only real gripe is the placement of the bloody screen on/off button.  They stuck it on the bottom of the device and I oftentimes find myself accidentally pressing it in the middle of reading, which is annoying.  It happens less often with a case on, but I would far prefer if the button was on the top or the upper part of one of the sides.

author: Marvw
title: Very nice, but
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm glad they fixed the lighting issue from previous versions. Much better now. My only gripe is that it's such ever so much smaller than the older one and does not fit snugly into my existing case.  Oh, well.

author: CK Rogers
title: Now I can see
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Found it necessary to upgrade from regular Kindle to Paperwhite.  Used trade-in program, which turned out to be a learning experience.  All in all I am happy with the product.  Process on trade in program needs work.

author: Mobileliving
title: Great product and upgrade to past versions
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So much quicker to respond to input than my old one. Refreshes faster, easy to read, the waterproofness is a great mind easer

author: Morgoth
title: Amazing for my reading passion
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been reading in my ipad air pro 2 and also in my kindle fire 7 hd since a while BUT it is a lot better to read in a kindle paperwhite than in a tablet as fire or an ipad, really if you love books and you love reading, and you are searching for knowledge I recommend you get one of those immediately, what are you awaiting ?. Very satisfied

author: leo j
title: kindle fire
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the size of the item, making it very easy to transport in a small bag or even a pocket. I like the print, the background and the speed with which it turns on.This is my third Kindle dating back to first gen.

author: jim
title: Save the planet my guy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Paperless is the way to go! Books take up a surprisingly small amount of memory. It’s easy to read and the backlight is great for late night reading. In short, it’s lightweight, easy to read, and is better for the environment than buying a ton of books. I dig.

author: Barry B. Skinner
title: Fair
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am a lover of real books and like seeing color for covers and this is only black and white. Direct sun or bright light makes it tough to read so ad a bit misleading. Bought fire HD 10 and read on that more.

author: Nicholas Cox
title: Great gift
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Nice product needs Amazon to stop auto registering these. I didn’t see that they did this. It can be deregisteted and reregistered but it would be better if it didn’t happen. Would have given five stars otherwise.

author: Dan Stone
title: Easy reading.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Excellent item much easier to read than my previous Kindle. Transfer of my library was fast and easy I'm happy.

author: Mari Hinton
title: Great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far I'm satisfied with my new paperwhite. Love how long the battery life last.

author: Melanie J King
title: Addicted
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely love this Kindle! I am a prime member, so some books are included with that membership, but I may sign up for Kindle unlimited. This device is great! Great size, and I can see the words with no problems at all.

author: Rebecca
title: Horrible battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery life in this is atrocious... even when it's kept in airplane mode with WiFi off. This is the first e-reader I've tried, and I'm regretting it a bit since part of the reason I was hesitant to start using one was that I didn't want to be unable to continue reading a book because I ran out of charge... But I've left this at a charge above 80% for a few days and come back to a drained battery, and then I have to wait at least 15-20 minutes with it plugged in before I can pick up where I left off in my book.

author: Emily R.
title: Great for any setting!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: We travel a lot throughout the year to escape the real world. This purchase has helped me relax and enjoy those little escapes on a completely different level. Just this past month, I found myself reading an entire book on the beach in Jamaica without concern for getting my pages wet or sandy, without worrying about glare that I would get on my phone and without lugging around the second book in the series for when I was ready to start it. What a great investment. Tub, bed, beach, hammock, recliner.. it’s a great purchase for any setting!

author: Mim 8
title: Battery runs low quicker than older models.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old kindle just ran out of juice so had to replace with this version. Like many other reviewers the battery life is shorter for me and need to recharge daily. Older model didn’t require that.

author: CJ
title: I love the built in light on the Kindle Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: As I mentioned above, I love the built in light on the Paperwhite, but I also love that I can make it dimmer or brighter.  It is such a convenience!  I haven't spilled any liquid on the Paperwhite (and I hope I don't) but I'm sure the waterproof case with protect it.

author: David C. McHugh
title: New Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The main reason for purchasing this Kindle was the extra storage space. The page turning seems a little more sensitive to the touch, and sometimes turns 2 or 3 pages at a time, but I can live with that. The screen and fonts are sharp and easy to read. I probably won't be reading it anywhere near water, but it is nice to know it is waterproof.

author: fafhrd
title: Great gift!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Got it for Christmas and love it. Don't have to worry about keeping a light on when the wife is sleeping. It does take a bit to get use to all the features.  Just wish they could put page numbers. But it's still nice to have.

author: Gary
title: First Time Kindle Owner
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm very pleased with the 10th Generation Kindle Paperwhite.  I hate ads but I got the Special Offers version because of the reduced price. The ads are only on the lock screen and the Library page not in the books themselves.

author: elizabeth
title: Wonderful
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This kindle replaces my old kindle. I loved that kindle, this is even better! I use it to download books from the library. It is great!

author: Laurie B. Schwartz
title: Prefer Voyager to Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the battery length much better than the Voyager which is what I had last but broke. However, everything else I prefer the Voyager over paperwhite. The button on the bottom is very inconvenient - one light touch to hold the device from the  bottom and it turns off.  It also doesn't respond as quickly to start up, turn off or any movements. I also preferred the feel of Voyager. It was a little  more sculpted and more comfortable to hold. Sorry I went back to the paperwhite  altho the battery is  much better.

author: Melinda Lamprey
title: So convenient!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I admit to being a snob where books are concerned, wanting to read only physical hands-on books, but as my library has finally begun to dwindle, I have turned to digital. Having my little Kindle is perfect! It weighs nothing, fits in my bag, the battery lasts forever between charges. and I can take it anywhere.The ONLY drawback is there's no strap or anything on either the Kindle or the cover I purchased, which for my arthritic hands can be clumsy and painful. Other than that, I love my Kindle and would highly recommend it.

author: CR
title: Charging cable did not fit.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Overall I've enjoyed the new Kindle and would recommend it. Also worth noting that the charging cable included in the box did not fit my device. Apparently this is a known issue and Amazon did provide a code to get a new one for free, however the code did not work. If you're interested in the Kindle, don't think twice. Indulge yourself.

author: S. Jungling
title: Movin' On Up
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: After having my original Kindle for 8 years it was time to upgrade to the Paperwhite. I like it but am having to adjust on how to hold it so that it doesn't back up or advance too many pages. I like the lit background and am sure in time will adjust to new page advancement.

author: Drew
title: Wise Choice
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.. Amazon has truly improved the product and would advise anyone else to obtain whatever they are able to. Every dollar spent returns a much larger reward.

author: Celeste
title: Excelente
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Lo compre para leer en las noches sin molestar a mi esposo y sin distraerme en otras cosas.  CUMPLE SU PROPÓSITO.  No es como una tableta electrónica.  Es un libro electrónico. Comodo para leer y a la vista.Recomendación:  deberia traer al menos un pouch para guardarlo

author: Rebecca D. Sharrah
title: I LOVE IT!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My husband got me this for Christmas and I'm already reading more often than I was before!  I was using a very old Nook prior to this and while I loved it, it was definitely time for an upgrade!

author: David
title: Simple and useful
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a previous (original) kindle along with built in reading light and was skiddish about whatever paper white meant.  My fears were  unnecessary as the unit is just as easy to read and even easier to forward pages.  A wise and inexpensive investment.

author: David  Markman
title: Easy to use and does exactly what it says it does
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Why can't all electronic devices be like this.  I want to read without a bunch of set-up.  This product does one thing and it does it well.  A great example of "don't offer me flexibility which always comes with a learning curve- just give me a product that's easy to use and works."

author: Amazon Customer
title: Will it fit your new kindle 10? Yes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is a perfect fit for the new paper white. Reasonably priced and I chose a girlie one with sparkles, great choice easy to find at the bottom of my purse and it is light weight.  There is a pocket on front for a house key or money and I’d.

author: Jordan Mutolo
title: Solid upgrade!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded from a kindle paperwhite that was about 4-5 years old. It’s much thinner, and lighter. I also love that the front screen is now flush. Other upgrades include, waterproof and audible support. Glad I made the purchase. The new fabric cases are really nice

author: Clayton Margeson
title: Good Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great battery life, definitely gets the job done.

author: Carolyn Long
title: New Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Although I liked my prior paperwhite, I just felt an update with more storage would be preferable since I read so much.  And being waterproof is always a good thibg.  The new Kindle met my expectations and was worth the cost.

author: Dale W Hudson
title: The one I was waiting for
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I got a reader for my wife a couple of years ago, and we found it to be so cumbersome that it was unusable. I bought this one for myself at Christmas, and I'm about to finish my twelfth book! So handy and easy to use!

author: Julie Reed
title: The"New" paper white
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I absolutely hate the power button placement, I am constantly turning it off while holding it. It needs to be in the top. Otherwise it's a great E-book

author: zigzag
title: It's inexpensive and a must have w/expanded space.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very light weight and easy to holdwithout any difficulty.  The lightingis perfect. Makes reading a pleasure.

author: Kaleb
title: Great product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s a fantastic reading device. It is much easier on the eyes than a iPad or computer screen. The only issue I have found so far with it is that it’s a little slow compared to the tech I’m used to now. Also the “lock”/power button is on the bottom right side of the device.  Being right handed my pinky finger normal accidentally hits it, I wish they would of put the button on top of the device.

author: Rainbow2
title: It is small, grey with grey lettering.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I needed a machine that provided accommodations for my reading needs: more light, larger print and larger machine.  I had to return it and I ordered a new Fire tablet which met all my needs.

author: Renee McCullough
title: Love the kindle paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is quick and easy to download books. Nice size screen. Adjustable font size.

author: Traveling Man
title: Great Upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old one finally died. Ordered the updated version using the trade in. Had it one week and love the size and weight. Transferring my library was pretty easy. The protective case for it is also very well made. Fits real easy in the back pocket of my jeans.

author: Louis
title: Plus And Minuses
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's very convenient being able to carry several books with you in one device and overall the reading experience is fine but the main downside, for me, is that you experience glare off the glass surface unless the device is held at a certain angle. That's a problem you don't have with regular books.

author: Austinhorn
title: Great improvement!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the new model. Adding waterproofing & Audible support is great. I’d give it the 5th star if it supported text to speech like the Kindle keyboard did. Still a great value for the price!

author: Corey W.
title: Just received - first impression
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Feels light and packed with features. My first Kindle and I’m glad I waited. Excited to start reading for enjoyment again. Only feature not use to is the monochrome feel but it’s a book reader not a tablet.

author: Molly Kresl
title: Perfect for bathtub reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this! I traded in my old paper white and love that this one is both water proof and has backlighting. Got me into reading again! Love using it with my library card for free book rentals from the online library system “Libby”

author: enjoying life
title: not as good as old series 7
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: there is a delay when you swipe screen. Often when you swipe to turn page it turns back instead of forwards .should have improved the kindle this is not as good just has more storage

author: Esther E. Caldwell
title: Trade-In Offer
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What a deal. Traded in my old Kindle for the Kindle paperwhite. It was on sale $99.99 down from $129.99...received an instant $25.00 trade-in allowance.  Returned my old Kindle to Amazon with paper work they provided .  So easy...

author: Dorothy Leonard
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Had to order this new one because my husband lost his last one at airport security. This one has audio on it so I ordered headphones with blue tooth so we could hear audio books. Works great.

author: Barbara J Slacum
title: Glare free reading and waterproof, also compact.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Paperwhite!!  Have a 2011 Kindle still working like brand new and another Paperwhite that is about 3-4 years old.  Love all three.  We have a second home at the ocean so I purchased the new one to leave there.  It is great that it is waterproof and you can sit in the sun and read.  I have no complaints!  Love the Kindles!

author: Shopper2369
title: Small and light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my Kindle Paperwhite. I had an Kindle Oasis but it was stolen.  Didn’t want to spend that kind of money again so I got the Paperwhite. LOVE it. So light and easy to slip in my purse.

author: Gal who loves to read
title: Love my Kindles
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle is slightly smaller than my previous versions so it took a little time to get used to it.  I love the built in light a lot.  I am truly a Kindle fan; this is my 3rd replacement for the original.

author: JamieJo
title: Light, easy on eyes, and WATERPROOF!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The best part about this new kindle is the waterproof part. I love reading in the tub so this is an awesome addition. Backlight, text and everything worked out great! I'm really liking it!

author: Diane Aleman
title: Love my new Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is lightweight and water proof. It is just what I need. I want a kindle that is easy to use and gives me just the features I want. Don’t need or use some of the fancy features on the more expensive Kindles.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Faulty kindle sent on offer price
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was happy to purchase All new kindle paperwhite on offer price of $100 a week ago. But looks like the screen refresh is faulty in this piece. check where I have marked red dots in the image. You will see print from previous page not properly refreshed. And now I cannot get another at the same price. Can amazon help me with this?

author: LMG
title: Always great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my fourth kindle...my second kindle paper white. This one is so light and easy to handle. I am looking forward to taking it outside during the summer and adjusting the background so I can read outside.

author: Kathy Randol
title: Highly Recommend 📚📚📚
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I highly recommend this for anyone who enjoys reading. For me, it’s the perfect size. You can adjust the text size, books 📚 download quickly. I’m quite pleased and happy I bought this for myself.....😋😋

author: Amazon Customer
title: Doesn’t hold a charge for long.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is a nice reader and easy to read, my biggest complaint is that it doesn’t hold a charge anywhere near the length of time my old one did. If I would take it on vacation, I would have to take the charger.  Not very happy with this one.

author: Seth McNew
title: The best way to catch up with an extensive reading list
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've long been an avid reader, but was always skeptical of e-books. It wasn't until I was forced into one through college that I saw their appeal, and now that I'm a graduate and have more time to read, I've been taking much more advantage of my Kindle. I upgraded recently from the first generation of Paperwhite and I couldn't be happier with my decision. The screen is quick and responsive, the letters are still as crisp, and the softer light makes reading at dark relaxing instead of headache inducing.

author: robert
title: Too Soon To Say
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm not very fond of the weight when compared to the older Voyage. I miss having page turn buttons. It takes longer to wake. For some strange reason, many of the Amazon books will display a book cover with graphics while other times it's just a generic book cover with the title. Let's hope it holds up better than the horrible $200 Kindle Voyage.

author: Nicole
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Doesn't hold a charge as long as my old Kindle Touch, even though I always turn the screen off, but I LOVE the Paperwhite screen. A wonderfully comfortable reading experience, with no need of external light.

author: Carolina B.
title: Recomendado
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: El diseño y funcionalidad de este Kindle es sencillamente genial, muy sencillo de usar y sencillo para navegar.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Replaced my old paper white. Was happy with the old one but wanted to update. Love the paper white kindle readers.

author: C
title: Always improving
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have owned several Paperwhites and I bought them because if I travel I do not want to take the Kindle Fire with me but I do take the Paperwhite.  Cannot complain they only get better.

author: K. L. Strong
title: Great compact reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the new Kindle Paperwhite.  It is lightweight and I can use it indoors and out. Only downside is that the book storage feature is a bit harder to navigate than my Kindle Fire. You have to scroll a lot if you have a lot of books on it. This Kindle will be much better for travel and for sitting by my pool.

author: Alan
title: Not a fan that they changed the front panel material
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I lost my last kindle, which is the previous version, so I got the newest version. the only thing I I don't like is they changed the front panel material. It is very light reflective and strange sense of touch.

author: Gaston Vidou
title: Size and perfect screen
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My 1st e-reader and extremely happy with the size and screen. I own a mini iPad and have read many books on it. This is perfect for your daily read carry around tech. So impressed how great it is when reading outside. "Paperwhite" is a perfect name to describe what it feels like reading on this. Add that it's water proof and you can listen to audio books...Big fan so far.

author: Irene Diaz
title: Wonderful device!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far so good. Just unboxed it so I haven’t really used it. Responsive, light weight. Love the backlighting! Default cable didn’t work but alternate cable charged it fine. Amazon is providing a new cable at no charge. So we’ll see if that works.

author: Ryder’s Leash
title: Great little reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Awesome battery life, very compact and has great adjustable font I love this new kindle

author: innerfish
title: Good reading device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I loved the weight of kindle. So light to hold in my hands. Battery last forever too. Only downside is the new update, now kindle takes longer to wake up and unlock. Before it used to be quick

author: Becky
title: A great gift.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My son loves this, he said it's really convenient. I don't know if he's using audible or not.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nice lightweight reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s a great portable, lightweight reader which works equally well in bright sunlight or a dark bedroom.  I only wish I could download Overdrive to it so I could borrow books from the library without using a secondary device such as my tablet. Otherwise, perfect.

author: Jeffrey G. Jenkins
title: Nice Redesign
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far so good. The setup of the new Kindle was effortless. My library synced without issue. The new Kindle is lighter and the screen is flush. I'm very pleased so far. Not sure if I will take it anywhere near water but it's nice to know I have that option.

author: Mary Overton
title: love my dedicated Kindle reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with my new Kindle. Faster and lighter. Highlighting and page turning are both easier. Plus, I had a problem and a lovely lady from Amazon called and resolved it for me. I never post reviews, but this made me so happy I had to share the joy. We highly introverted readers/writers don't get out much.

author: KKC
title: Great Upgrade!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very happy with my new Kindle Paperwhite. The clarity of the screen, brightness, and the ability to adjust font size, etc. and the ease of downloading Kindle books makes my reading experience simple and enjoyable.

author: Janet C. Kelly
title: I hate the fact that only Kindle books canbe checked out from the library. Restrictive.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This product almost ensures that one would have to buy content from Amazon. I prefer to use my library and get books for free. Also, it has almost no controls on it and I just did not like the small screen for reading. It would be more productive to buy a tablet for reading. They are also less expensive.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Awesome!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've had a Kindle for about 5 years. Although, I do still enjoy reading a paperback a Kindle is much more convenient to carry around hundreds of books. Now that they're waterproof, you can read it anywhere any time. The selection of authors and books is amazing.

author: fred J. Noe
title: Longer Charge
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was pleasantly surprised how long my new Paperwhite held its charge or, expressed more positively, how much time there is now between recharging......I don't care about "waterproof", which seems to be important to Amazon,  since I don't plan to use it in my shower or clean it in my hot tub..........it feels very comfortable.......fred j noe

author: cricket in Taos
title: Great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle.  I have eyesight issues and this is great.

author: rachel
title: LOVE IT!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My first kindle and I love it! just starting to in get to reading again and the kindle is amazing. I love the features with it and I've been reading it every day. The battery seems to last forever another bonus.

author: Valerie W.
title: It's so light weight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle Paperwhite. It is so light!  My only criticism and it is not major, is that the front screen is completely flat. This means that when you are holding it there isn't much of a grip. So I bought the waterproof cover and now I can hold it like a real paper book.

author: Loretta Poole
title: Loved it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loved it! Still has my personal library too!

author: Kindle Customer
title: Great for reading anytime anywhere!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Paperwhite is perfect! I can check digital books out from my public library and download them quickly to my Paperwhite so I always have plenty to read everyday. The size is perfect to carry everywhere I go!

author: Sbjulie
title: GREAT KINDLE AND OUTSTANDING SERVICE
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 4 THIS IS MY 4TH KINDLE. I WANTED TO CREATE COLLECTIONS BY AUTHOR'S NAME (I HAVE ALMOST 5,000 BOOKS ON IT AND WANTED A FAST WAY TO GET TO BOOKS)  THE SERVICE SUPPORT WAS OUTSTANDING.

author: Steve S. in La.
title: Happy wife!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought this for my wife and she is thrilled with it. Loves the size that can fit in almost any purse, and a full charge lady’s for days and days, and days!

author: Elizabeth R Skoglund
title: This device can make it easier to see the print in a book.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’m having some vision problems which make it almost impossible to read a book even though I write books. The special way of lighting in this device makes it possible for me to read.

author: Hopey
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Small and light easy to carry in my purse

author: Ms. Meinel
title: Gift
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The perfect update to an old kindle.  I gave it to a good friend for Xmas and she absolutely adores it and it's features (which I'm certain she hasn't discovered all of them).  Time to upgrade?  This is the one!

author: shannon v
title: Met expectations
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought this to replace a very old kindle. I have downloaded several new books already. Love the battery life. Ordered it on Friday evening and received it on Sunday afternoon. I have no complaints.

author: Mina Wender
title: Thank goodness I got a new Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I lost my Kindle on a trip and thought I could just use the app on my phone or ipad.  However, it wasn't the same.  It is so good to have the paper white reading experience.  It is so much easier on my eyes.

author: Sasa
title: Annoying special offer screen
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love kindle. New models are being better from old ones. For me, only problem still it has is screen glow.However, I regret I bought it while discount sale in December. Amazon emphasized the price of special offer model then. I knew I shouldn't buy special offer model, but I couldn't select non-special offer model at that time. I needed new kindle immediately then, so I orderd special offer model.I used it 4 months. I don't like sleep screen. I don't like the offers take space. It always annoys me.

author: Robert Menard
title: Long battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 3 weeks or so in I am very happy with this product. The screen is easy to see in all light conditions. The battery life is quite impressive. It is light and comfortable to use. It does exactly what I expected.

author: TheGreenCat
title: Good product, but the design could be better.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The only issue I have with this product is the location of the power button. I hold the kindle in my hand and usually keep a finger on the botton of it for stabilization. This can lead to the power button bjng pressed and turning the device off in the middle of reading.

author: William B. Scanlon
title: not working
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Not Happy with this product. When I try to remove read books from device it keeps recycling them and fails to remove.

author: Shirley Wilkins
title: Just one thing?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The only thing I don't like is if you turn it, it won't turn so you only have the one way to read. Other than that I really like it. It is nice and lite so easier for older hands to hold.

author: Sand & earth woman
title: A great way to read books
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My first e-reader & I already love it. So small and light weight that it’s a breeze to take with me wherever I go. Mine has the advertisements & I’m just fine with it. They are only on the front page & are all books. The whole reading experience is fantastic.

author: Amazon Customer
title: check the cord to be sure the end that goes into the reader will go in. Mine won't! :(
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The charging cord won't connect with the Kindle unit. It will barely touch inside. I have tried every way possible and the charging end of the cord will not go inside where it is supposed to to charge the unit. Very disappointed!

author: customer cj
title: Lasted 4 months
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle died after 4 months.  It will no longer take a charge.  Plug it in, light goes on for a short time and them goes off.  It never charges.  Tried 2 different chargers.  I've had so many problems with Kindles, I'm ready to give up and go back to paper books.

author: Donald Smith
title: Welldone
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Shipped on time.  Packing was very good.  Easy to turn on.  Using it now.  One thing, have a small dog and when display came on on older Kindles dog would leave room.  This unit dog will  remain right by me.  Does not seem to disturb her.  Display?  Unknown frequency sounds?  Am I crazy?  Let me know your theory!

author: Bob L.
title: Smaller, lighter, easy to read.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Product does not "feel" much lighter than the previous models. Only real disappointment is an easel type of case is not available. The charging cord was damaged out of the box. But customer service soon sent a replacement.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Worth every penny!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I haven’t had a kindle in years and what I can say about the new Paperwhite is that it is a phenomenal piece of equipment. My total time spent on social media has been reduced by atleast 50% and I have stopped listening to so many audiobooks. A must for any person with a love for reading.

author: Karyn Packard
title: not much is different
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am an avid reader and had 815 books on my previous Kindle.  I wanted one that held more.  This one is a little lighter and has a greater capacity.  Other than that, I really can't tell the difference.

author: Ken George
title: You need to set up the device options to be more reader friendly and less pushing books
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Device is an improvement with two exceptions.  You charge me to not get your "special Offers".  Not smart.You will not let me configer my home page with text rather than book covers.  Not helpful.

author: Sandra
title: Best kindle yet!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have owned 3 prior kindle's and this one is my favorite. Great size and ease of use.

author: Musical Baker
title: Absolutely love it! Exactly what I hoped for!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this! Lightweight, easy to hold. Much easier on my eyes than my Phone screen. I read a lot and I only have to charge it weekly, which is awesome compared to charging my phone multiple times a day.

author: Manddun
title: Great device!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new Kindle. I upgraded from the really old one to this Paperwhite and it reads awesome, the backlight is super helpful. I’m anticipating many cozy and convenient hours of reading!

author: Millie
title: Yellow light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third kindle paperwhite and I am not impressed.  The light looks yellow compared to my older versions.  If this is supposed to be an improvement, I don't like it.  Also, the words don't appear to be a sharp, they look a little blurry.

author: SunnyDays
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: We love our kindles!  I especially love that the kids each have a kindle and they read and read and I don't have to worry about them getting distracted by music or videos or anything else!  (I've blocked the web browser).  Another great feature is that it is waterproof!

author: Kindle Customer
title: Take anywhere
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have a Kindle fire but found it was hard to read outside.  I brought this one and have been very pleased with it.  It is small enough to carry in my purse and very lightweight.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Kindle Paperwhite--light weight Kindle solution
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love Kindles, and this one promises to be a winner. I use it primarily for reading, and it's light weight is a big plus. Since it's winter, I haven't had a chance to test it's readability in sunshine (a big reason, based on the product description, that I chose this over another Fire). My one gripe thus far is that the type in the dictionary is miniscule.

author: Eric R. Brown
title: The perfect Kindle for me...and waterproof too!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 5th Kindle, and it has all the features I want--a definite upgrade.  I love the Paperwhite format, and especially the battery life and ease of use.  And now it's waterproof.  I will take it with me to the beach, by the pool, and even while reading in the hot tub.  A clear winner for Kindle lovers.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Kindle vs. Tablet?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am used to reading off a tablet.  Getting the kindle has taken some adjustments.  One thing I notice is that it is more difficult to type on when searching for books.  You really have to push to select a letter.  Would I buy again?  Nope.  It was a gift.

author: Nancy G
title: Why did I wait so long?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it! I’ve had an original Kindle and used it for years. Even though it still works fine, I ordered this one. Wow! It’s so light, and no glare, and backlight, and so many features. I’m very happy.

author: Kimberly Montgomery Carver
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This was one of my Christmas presents from my parents. I absolutely love it and I am so happy that I can read in the bathtub again! It is perfect for the most part. The only thing I am not keen on is the advertisements, but I can live with it. Overall I am very happy with the product.

author: Sandy
title: Leather Cover doesn't turn the Kindle on when opened!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the fact that it is very much like the previous Kindle paper white.  I liked the previous leather cover better because it turned on when you opened it.

author: Papillon Lover
title: very touch sensitive
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I found that the display is unstable.  It will skip several pages @ a time.  The reading progress @ bottom of page keeps turning off.  Not sure if I have a defective one, but I much prefer my old kindle Paperwhite.

author: Linda
title: Great for travelers
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I fly a lot for my job and I like that it is easy to charge and is small enough to fit into my purse or my carry-on. The screen is very easy to read. Wish I would have ordered one earlier.

author: Bet S
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My first Kindle and I'm in love with it already. As an avid Audible user I'm a bit disappointed it doesn't support immersion reading and that's the only reason why I give it 4 stars instead of 5.

author: JanR
title: "Remove from device"
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I do not like that when I want to remove a book and press "remove from device," it just becomes undownloaded and remains on my screen.  My former paperwhite removed it from the screen to the cloud.  I do not want it on my screen as I do not want the book.

author: MEH
title: I want my Kindle Fire Back
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This kindle is just an advertisement for Amazon e-books.  Where is my home page?  It's smaller -- where is my screen size?  The cover sucks -- it's just a cover, not a book stand.  I'm returning it; I hate it.

author: YmR
title: Love the size and convenience of this new Kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This was a very kind and thoughtful gift I received and it is such an upgrade from the 2nd edition kindle i had.  The size and weight are terrific and the screen is also easier to read.  I like it a lot!

author: Kathleen M. Crane
title: Buyer beware
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This worked for less than one week.  The backlight is on, but the slide bar won't come on so there is no way to access your book.  Also, after pushing the button to turn on, it will not stay on.  I was going to turn in my old kindle for a $25 refund. Not anymore.  I'll be keeping the old kindle now.  It still works after 5+ years.  I feel like I may have been sent someone's old, malfunctioning kindle.  The wrapper looked new and nice, but the kindle looks no different than my other ones.

author: Tim G.
title: Use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Replaced my Kindle original which was no longer supported

author: joytothe
title: Great size.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bigger than trying to read on my phone, smaller than my tablet. Very light weight.

author: Unknown
title: Horrible!!! Don’t waste money!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first paper white and it will be my last! I’m so disappointed in the quality of this product. It’s cheaply made and getting books to load on it is awful. Kindle Fire is so much better!

author: PhoenixKing
title: Worth every penny
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great present; make sure you buy a case with it because it is delicate.

author: CHARLIE BAILEY
title: are paper whites better than just the e-reader??
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Disappointed when after the very first charge that the reader went blank and would not come back on.  just a battery icon with a exclamation point inside.  My first little reader that I had lasted 10 years!!

author: keystonegirl
title: Love this Kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this Kindle! This is the third Paperwhite that I've bought. I read alot and I have no eye strain while using this e-reader.  It's the perfect size to fit into my purse. I highly recommend this Kindle!

author: Larry A. Sullivan
title: working out ok for me at this time
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: my older kindles buttons were becoming non functional.  thought i'd try a touchscreen. my hands shake some, and i occasionally flip several pages with one touch of the screen.  a sensitivity control on the touchscreen would be helpful.overall, I am happy with the paperwhite.

author: carsong
title: Better battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Not a lot of apparent difference for the Kindle I had. I bought the new one because my battery was not staying charged as long as it had before. The waterproof version is a nice thing, I guess.

author: KP
title: Nice upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am really enjoying the upgrade from “6” so far. Perfect size to travel with you and hold to read in bed. Lightweight. Very clear screen. Charges quickly with USB on computer.

author: M. Richards
title: Miss my old kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: No light sensor. No bezel push to move forward or back. No imrovement to battery or weight or speed. Waterproof isn't worth it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Just right size
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It was a gift for my wife who had lost her original. She likes the smaller size, backlit screen and battery life. I do wish it had come with a charger but we have lots of chargers

author: Jeff
title: My wife loves it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is a truly great e-reader.  It is now able to function in most all environments. Inside, outside, daylight, night time. And now water resistant, my wife loves this reader

author: Shawn
title: Great E-Book Much better than the nook or KindleFire for reading.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The only thing i didnt like is that there is no colorblind mode. That being said it is for my wife anyway and not me. She loves everyhing about it. Her nook recently died due to childs play lol and i got this to replaceit for our road trip to visit family. The charge is still going from the first night i cherged it several days ago although it has been lightly read. i defintely suggest this  over the kindle fire to as i really didnt care or the fire in general.this is perfect and for the a much betteroption.

author: Book Lover
title: Not impressed
