types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased this but I’m disappointed. It lags, it says application not working and sends back to home page and had to restart to bring up the keyboard. Wish I had purchased the older regular paper white.

author: Bee
title: Good product, not without flaws
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really enjoy my Kindle. However, there have been several times since its purchase two weeks ago that it will flip ahead 10+ pages when I tap the screen to move to the next page. Definitely a few bugs to be worked out.

author: Seebs
title: Much more room
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: i love the new paperwhite there is about four times the amount of storage than my old one.  I don't have to keep deleting books anymore.  It is great and so easy to take with you.

author: philabos
title: Long lasting charge
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased this because my fire was needing a charge almost every day. Admittedly 5 years old.The paperwhite has a better quality display and I can go several weeks without charging.

author: Tom Arneson
title: New Kindle Paperwhite (waterproof)
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is a little lighter than my previous Paperwhite, which I still have.  I haven't tested the water resistant properties yet, but may take it to to a pool when I have a chance.

author: Quinbus
title: Works Very Well
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Not much difference from the previous Paperwhite, but I wanted more storage on the Kindle itself, which is why I moved up to this model.  Incremental changes are appreciated.

author: Dave, N8LU
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Works fine.  I was a little disappointed that some of my old apps on the Kindle I turned in did not transfer to my new Kindle.  Otherwise, all is okay and the backlight is super!!

author: Oscar
title: It is fast
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was amazed how fast it is for starting, changing book, etc. It also has a long lasting battery. The best part is that you could listen to audio books even in your car via bluetooth.

author: Keith Myers
title: Good but I wish it had Text to Speech Support
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really wish this device had Text To Speech Support. This device can already support Audible when connected to Bluetooth Headphones so it should not be too hard of an ask to see TTS support added for ebooks

author: JE
title: Endless Books!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: OMG - how did I survive without my Kindle?  Well, I went to the library a LOT and purchased books from my local book store.  However, the most wonderful thing about my Kindle, is the sheer volume of available books and they're the "latest and greatest" to select from.  It's a marvelous device and easy to use.  Love it!

author: Easy Reader
title: It's Baaaaaack!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My second Kindle went kaput, so I ordered this new one on line.  I didn't even have to wait more than three days to get it.  Everything's in this new one - all my books.  Love it.

author: Mhogie
title: A good Kindle, same interface as other new ones
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far, it's excellent! Seems ok with a damp environment, but I haven't yet dropped it in water, so no info on the water proofing. Same interface as my Kindle Voyage, but slightly bigger than the Voyage.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Don't like not being able to go to "Home"
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Like to select reading by mood, not unusual to read several books simultaneously - this only allows me to read one book at a time and not get back to home to choose another.

author: david
title: First kindle, the features on this model pushed me to buy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: waterproof, backlight, 300 dpi, weeks of battery, bluetooth connection, these are the features that in combination pushed me over the edge and it is great so far. very clear picture and i like the weight and size. smaller than I expected because ive never used one but the size is awesome. the bezels are the perfect size to hold it and place your thumbs there without turning the page. if this thing had buttons to turn pages i might like that more but still great!

author: Geoside
title: Get one or 3
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great stuff I recommend that you go out and buy at least one. 3 is the best because folks love to steal them. Get the 3g model if you can free internet anywhere there is 3g.

author: E Garcia
title: I should have bought this sooner.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My friend was trying to talk me in to a Kindle for a long time. I like actual books. I LOVE THIS THING!  Don’t know how I functioned without it for so long. I travel a lot and this Kimdle allows me to bring all my books with me. Fantastic!

author: KPeterson
title: Favorite new reading device.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this because I love the waterproof functionality however my favorite thing about it how lite it is. Also love how long the battery lasts! Totally would recommend for fellow readers!

author: Joann r. klein-oneil
title: Mighty reader.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: As advertised. Love it, so small but mighty. It will be my primary reader.

author: Karen
title: Disappointed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This new kindle will quit working as I am reading. The battery does NOT last as long as the information provided.  I still have my second kindle and I may go back to using that device..

author: Jrzy43
title: Great Battery Life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a paperwhite previously and had to charge the battery every couple of days.  This new paperwhite has been used a couple hours a day for over 2 weeks and still was at about 29% battery.  I am charging it for the first time.  Very impressed by this particular improvement.

author: Joyce
title: Waterproof.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like that this has the same unlit face that my old Kindle had - and yet has the backlight option.  I also like that it is waterproof because I am an unapologetic tub reader.

author: K. Gans
title: Overpriced
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Amazon sold this to me for $50 more just a week ago. I’ve always been loyal to kindle. I won’t do that again.

author: Yvonne
title: This is my third e-reader!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my paperwhite for reading my books.  I just traded in my old one for this updated version.  It did not disappoint!  It is much easier to read on the paperwhite than my fire tablet.  Just like reading a real book.  I just wish amazon would go back to the side buttons to turn the page, like on my first e-reader, many years ago.

author: Mary S. Waters
title: Yay! More storage!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use this to store and read books---Kindle e paper technology is a lot easier on my eyes than a tablet or laptop screen. Really like the flat front. Settings allow for more subtle adjustment. Battery life is good. And more storage!

author: timothy
title: easy to read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded to this kindle from the original kindle I got years ago. it is a lot easier to read, enjoy that I don't need lite on when reading. also is easier to keep track of reading progress.

author: Pam Hightower
title: Not as good as my previous Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This new kindle doesn't seem to hold a charge as long as the previous model and it closes down and reboots at random. The last time it did that I had to close it down twice before it would reload more than a blank screen. Disappointing!! I'm just hoping it will last half as long as the one I had before.

author: Luciano Arriola
title: I'm in love
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This kindle is slow when doing something else but reading. But on the subject of books it's great. As long as you dont spend much time fiddling with the other options you'll be happy. Interface is a little slow when not on a book and that's the only drawback.

author: T. C. Brayshaw
title: Handy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The smaller size of this Kindle makes it easier to take with you and easier to handle for reading.  The contrast on the screen makes reading much easier for these old eyes.

author: J. Claypool
title: A Better Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the new Kindle Paperwhite for several reasons:  It's waterproof; it's a bit smaller so it fits into my pocket better than my previous model; and it has much more storage.  Big improvement.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Reading more
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Since I purchased this I’m reading more. I take it with me in my purse and it keeps me from being on my phone. I’m also glad it has a backlight because i read at night and it helps me go to sleep

author: Deanna White
title: Love My Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle is my second one.  I am an avid reader and a retired writing professor.  I never thought that I would like to read on a mechanical device.  I love the Kindle because I can make the print larger than a regular book, especially paperbacks.  I also do not have to store or dispose of already read books.  Love the Kindle.

author: Max Kauffman
title: Amazing product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very smooth, feels like I'm reading an actual book. Nice selection in the prime reading section of the store, other books are cheaper than the hard copy. The battery life is great as well.The page refresher takes time to get used to. It doesn't refresh while reading but the positive to negative flashes can get annoying after a while.The adjustable backlight is almost perfect. (Why I bought this one over the original) I just wish I can dim it a little bit more at night.

author: Kerryn
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Received this yesterday and now can read a book without hand cramps! Should have purchased one years ago.

author: A. Gray
title: GREAT deal but...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: ...no power cable with it??? Very strange. You have to order one separately, which isn't expensive, just unexpected when you are paying $160. Would've gotten 5 stars otherwise. Can't wait to use it!

author: janet s perini
title: My second Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Am very happy with this Kindle. A little more techie than my first, but that is ok

author: Renate
title: Ease of use because I am not real technically inclined.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with my new  Kindle Paperwhite ereader. It is so easy to use. I never had a Paperwhite ereader before and got it to replace my Kindle Voyager which totally died on me. I do recommend this ereader for anyone that reads alot.

author: Gary L. Esterle
title: Hard to Get Used To
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Had a Kindle keypad for the past 4 years.  Used to using the buttons.  My hands are big and I am constantly flipping pages when I don't want to because it is hard to hold onto the small edges.  Touch the screen and you have changed the page.  Only had a week but sure miss my buttons.

author: Brenda
title: Brenda
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like my new kindle paperwhite,  first I did not think it was keeping the charge like I thought it would. But I charge it on my new charger and it is keeping the charge better. If I have any more problem will definitely get in touch with you.

author: SharonB
title: Never thought I'd budge from reading printed books
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really LOVE my Kindle Paperwhite.  I am reading a series that isn't available in print, and am on the 5th book of the series. Makes for easy reading, 'opens' to the page I left off on. Neat features are being able to tap a word and get definition and use in a sentence.  All the enjoyment of printed books, without having to store and/or get rid of actual books when done.

author: Lucky44
title: nice update on great product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: not much to say.  older version was great; the new features make it a bit better, especially the water-proofing.  kudos to Amazon for not screwing up something that works so well.

author: House of Ydell
title: So many books!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Been wanting a new kindle for awhile & was so excited to get this for my birthday. Love that it’s waterproof, love the larger size from my old one & the simple paperwhite screen. Missed out on a few books with content it can’t support, but all good.

author: Michael E. Palis
title: Good E-Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 3rd Paperwhite and it is probably the best one yet. The back lighting seems to be a little more evenly lit and the whole unit seems to be a little faster. However, I dislike the fact that on this new one when you turn it on after not using it for a while, the unit has to “wake up”, then you have to swipe to open it up.  It is annoying, but maybe I’m just impatient.

author: Dani97
title: Topmost perfomance
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Once upon a time, I bought Kindle Paperwhite - that was love from the first sight. Other brands had a hard time standing up to the Kindle family, but all of Kindle are pale shadows of Paperwhite. Book went missing with former boyfriend, and I finally got my hands on a new one.  Topmost performance is much more appealing to my tastes than anything, and PaperWhite is an idol, an absolute Ebook standard. It's like your eyes have the unlimited pleasure to explore. Thank you for this amazing device!

author: Peggy Henrikson
title: Kindle Features are Fun
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I must admit I had to find a YouTube video that explains how to access all the features of my Kindle Paperwhite, but once I did, I was impressed. Besides accessing word definitions, it can highlight passages, bookmark locations, and change font sizes and types. It also provides a place to take notes. Those are only a few of its features. Although I have a Kindle app on my computer, I enjoy being able to sit in a comfy chair and read my Kindle books. So fun!

author: L. Cooke
title: Page turn Balks every 10 pages, change setting to refresh to fix.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle overall is an improvement on my previous one. But the default page turns setting would balk every 10 pages and then turn two pages requiring a flip back. I almost returned it but by changing the page setting to “refresh on every page it doesn’t do that anymore. This is really something that should not be in the 10th generation of the device.

author: David C
title: The best way to read a book.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just what you need for simply reading books. Compact and looks great with lots of stylish covers available for it. I find that I read a lot more than I did when I used a smart phone or tablet.

author: Gary Ordway
title: Easy to get woring right out of the box
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first Paperwhite, and I really enjoy reading with it.  If I had one dislike, it would be every so often it hangs up and won't turn the page for 10 to 15 seconds.  It always does, but it happens maybe every 10 to 12 pages.

author: Suzy
title: I can read at night without lights
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the size and weight of the Paperwhite. I broke my old Kindle and was reading on my phone which was hard on the eyes.  When the Paperwhite arrived I was thrilled with the size.

author: Joanne
title: new kindle is easy to download book and books had purchased on old kindle were downloaded to new one
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Use kindle to download books to read.Specific reason wanted new Kindle Paperwhite was because it was waterproof.Love it-

author: clarissa tannlund
title: Stunning - a battery that could get me through War and Peace
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: And the "paper" look of the page.  The size is ideal for me, fits in the small purse I carry.  I am happy!

author: Allison M. Bloomquist
title: Poor battery life.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery isn’t as good as my old one. I’m charging every 4-5 days. I do like more storage and the audible feature.

author: Jeffre L. Hackman
title: Very happy with new kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Have not tried the water proof feature.  Everything about the new one is perfect.  I use the Kindle on every appointment I go too.  Never have a problem with them running late.  I tried the audio, works great.

author: Deb
title: Light easy on wrists.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the weight of the paperwhite!Very slow on downloads. Things I do easily and fast on my other kindles take much longer and have several hoops to jump through.Hoping this summer at the pool makes up for all the small inconveniences.

author: Carey Rose Bain
title: No go
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: If your looking for a true paperwhite, don’t get this one. If you want to read in the sun, don’t bother, the glare is terrible! The screen is not textured like before, and my first edition, runs 10x faster than this one. Very dissipated. My husban got it for me as a gift and it’s too late to return it now...

author: SamG
title: If you like to notate books, this is not your device.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Recently replaced my old Kindle Paperwhite with the current model. Not much new or different, Yes, it is thinner,  lighter, and waterproof, but the differences are small. I had hoped to see better Note functionality, but no luck. The keyboard is slow and cumbersome. The word checking/suggesting assistant is old school, barely effective. If you like to notate books, this is not your device. If you want a reader only, and read near water, the the Paperwhite will serve you well.

author: andre teixeira
title: Whispersync Immersion Reading not available
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: When I read the description “whispersync” and “audible” I concluded that the immersion reading feature would be finally available. For my surprise it does not. Product promptly returned. Back to my iPad/Kindle app...

author: Bruce R.
title: Greatly improved. Wish it had a headphone connection in addition to bluetooth
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The voice used for text-to-speech is SO IMPROVED over the one on my original keyboard Kindle. Almost as good as the Audible versions of the books using live human voice actors. I love it!

author: MidwestMamaof3
title: Way better than my Kindle Fire
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a 1st gen Kindle Fire that was slowing down with age and replaced it with this paperwhite. Love this model! Battery lasts for an entire vacation, plenty of storage for many many books. There is no glare in my opinon. It's lightweight and easy to setup and easy to use. Great purchase.

author: Pamela K. Humphrey
title: get a tutorial so you know what is offered and how to use this.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love to read and my home library is overflowing. Also I hate buying a book that I find I don't like. Eg. language, content or not what I expected. I can preview books with my kindle. Also it really is light to hold. I'm pleased with my purchase

author: Stephen F. Becker
title: ease of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: For changing orientations and turning pages, it should be as easy and nice as a Fire - but it's not.

author: B. Lettkeman
title: The backlight made the upgrade worth it.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A very nice upgrade from my original kindle that was 7 years old. It still lags really bad when highlighting and using a few other features. I know e-ink displays aren’t know for their responsiveness but this is pretty bad. I could be wrong but I feel like my old kindle could highlight faster. Overall it’s a great upgrade. The backlight performs exactly like I was hoping. Now I don’t have to huddle next to a lamp like an old gameboy.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Still room for improvement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I did not purchase this product to have other books' advertisements on my shutdown screen.  In the realm of literature and reading, there are many other images that would be more welcome.  Even a default Kindle "cover" screen would have been preferred.  If it's going to be audible compatible, then having built-in speakers would be great.  And although it's cheesy, I'd like an animation of a turning page when I swipe to the next page.

author: Ken N
title: Thinner & lighter
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Lighter and thinner than previous model. Battery life between charges seem less than previous model also. Over all though I am happy with it. I do almost ally reading on it.

author: JSN345
title: Love this kindle paper white!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Absolutely love this kindle paper white. So happy it’s waterproof as I used it at the beach and will use it at my pool. It’s easy to hold, easy to read on and great size!

author: Loretta L. Clever
title: A few problems
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my fourth Kindle. I love them.  This one has a tendency to turn off by itself add your reading, no matter, I wouldn’t be without  I don’t think the battery lasts as long as touted.

author: SCLB
title: GREAT!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Kindle Paperwhite is the best! I am so impressed with this device. It is easy to use, very pleasant to read and lightweight. It surpasses my highest expectations.

author: Jon
title: Page turns
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Sometimes it goes black, sometimes it doesn't.  I do not like the less clean turns.  I also am not loving the speed and the home screen.  But battery life and reading, it is as good as can be expected.

author: angela lowe
title: Love it!1
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I only use my kindle for reading! I love the paper white no glares at all.Cant wait to try it out at the beach!  My only issue was the usb charger was hard to plug in at first. Although after a few times this got better.

author: Kourtney
title: Love 💖
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My past review of this Paperwhite was negative. After replacing the defective kindle with a new one I absolutely love this Paperwhite. Zero complaints the ads are not invasive, it's easy to read, and it really is water resistant (accidental test). I give it all the stars.

author: Hammer1
title: Great e- reader for the price
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought for my wife for Christmas and she loves it, she can read in the car,in the bedroom, anywhere she can find time. If you read reviews about books for this it is from my wife, I really dont read them

author: Erielack
title: Great Kindle Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle Paperwhite works great.  The backlighting is very useful in dark or near dark rooms or reading in bed.  IT is easy to use and all my books are kept handy.

author: J. Bowman
title: Great little reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The paperwhite waterproof works great. Lightweight and easy to use. Was useing a kindle Fire before and this is a big improvement. Only complaint is magazines are not easy to read on this. Fire was much better for that

author: Ub
title: wish it was a little bit bigger
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the kindle but I always wished it was a bit bigger(may be a 8"). I feel the content it fits in with this size is kind of less compared to a paper version. Also, I used to like the mp3 support they had with previous versions.

author: Craftybear
title: I usually love my Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My new Kindle Paperwhite 10 is not holding charge like my old one. I'm disappointed

author: J
title: Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Still adjusting to downloading books and not seeing page numbers but it is so lightweight!  I am thrilled that I can carry several books without the bulky weight of paper books.The charge lasts for weeks and it really is waterproof as I accidentally tested.

author: Avidreader
title: Very hard to program
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the Kindle, but it is VERY hard to program and I can't transfer my books from Nook to kindle.So I have to loose my books or rebuy them. What a waste of time and/or money.

author: gabbygyrl
title: Paperwhite vs Touch
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I definitely miss the fact that my Touch was so much lighter, had substantial more battery life, not to mention it just felt more durable.  Despite these characteristics, I still prefer the Paperwhite for the reason I upgraded - the light.  Yes, "I have seen the light," and It makes all the difference.  Perhaps one day Amazon will improve the features mentioned above, which will then make the Paperwhite PERFECT.

author: Judi Z
title: Great for reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Have used Kindles for years.  I find them to be the best way to read.  I can increase the size of the letters, and keep all my books without using up space to store books.

author: poray
title: Reading is an important part of life...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's the greatest, this is my second Paperwhite, I try to read outside as often as possible and my first one has experienced damp weather, spills, and sprays. So I will retire it to the inside of the house, sitting next to my favorite chair.

author: Ashleigh Blandin
title: very sleek
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Deeply enjoying the bluetooth, sleek design, and waterproof functionalities of this device. The extra storage space is very nice. Upgraded from the last generation of paperwhite.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Bad for Students
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this so I could have access to textbooks on a screen that would not give me a headache with hours of reading. It turned out that all of my textbooks were not compatible with the device. When I called customer care the rep informed me that most textbooks are not available for Kindle.The features are good and I like the device as an e-reader but I will probably return it since it does not support textbooks. I can buy one later if I find a need at that time.

author: Reuel Stevens
title: Type size
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The type is smaller than the last kindle. I even enlarged the size and it’s still to small. You need to make a kindle for older people who can’t see that good. This is my 3 kindle. The battery life isn’t very good the battery lasted a little over 2 years and my warranty expired 3 months after my battery died. My 2 kindle didn’t last because I turned it off every time I used it. My 1st died from being used so much. Why does the battery life isn’t very good. I read a lot.

author: Bea
title: I Love It
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have to admit, I liked my old Kindle too but with the new one, I can listen to audio books if I want.  I like my books on my device and this new Kindle has more capacity.Love it!

author: Christopher Swift
title: Lightweight and long battery
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Received this a month ago and still have not had to charge it! I use it about 1-2 hours a day for about 5 days each week. Also great for traveling since it is so lightweight.

author: Flyer
title: Not worth the $ to change to 10th gen Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm a long time user of Kindle e-readers. I started with one of the original versions and finally "upgraded" to a Paperwhite in 2012 that I still have and love (it has a B01B serial number) and it has no offers.Jun 2018, I bought what I think is the 7th or 8th gen Paperwhite with offers (I’ll assume 8th gen for the rest of this review) . I didn’t like the ads on the 8th gen and I thought the “new interface on the front page” was annoying.  Kindle had a trade-in deal, so I sent the 8th gen back when I bought the 10th gen. I got money back (not much) for the 8th gen, and I got 25% off the 10th gen.I bought the new Paperwhite, 10th gen, no offers, upgraded to 32G storage.IS THE 10TH GEN PAPERWHITE WORTH GIVING UP AND OLDER MODEL AND PAYING MORE $$? -The new case is not as good as the old cases.  -I think Amazon cheaped out. They just don’t have as good a “feel.” They're more flimsy too.  -Sidebar: the “cobalt purple” case is actually cobalt blue. Not purple at all. -10th gen doesn’t “wake up” just by opening the case (which is annoying). You have to swipe the screen.  -The “waking up” period is also quite long  -The backlight comes up initially on “full bright” before reverting to your normal backlight. This is annoying when you try to read in bed at night, and will ruin your night vision. -I don’t see the 167ppi to 300 ppi resolution difference -I don’t care for the new font. I think it’s harder to read than previous generations. -The refresh rate is surprisingly just as slow as older Paperwhites. No "upgrade" here. -The screen is sometimes unresponsive. It just “freezes."  -I like actually being able to feel the "edge" of the screen just for holding the Paperwhite. 10th gen screen has less of an edge so it just feels a bit odd to hold it. Not a big deal, but it is a tactile thing. -10th gen has “cellular connectivity,” but it’s a joke. Every time I’ve tried to download a book on cellular, my Paperwhite says I need to "be on wifi to download this book as it is too large". Super. -Amazon advertises “weeks” for battery life. I read every day. It hasn’t lasted even a week on one charge for me. My 2012 version battery lasts longer, as did the 8th gen I sent back. -Power button is on the bottom, so if you prop it up (for instance at the gym) to read, it sometimes “goes dark"/"shuts off" -I did get larger storage capacity, but it seemed to slow down when I downloaded more content and/or collections to the device  -The new USB cable shipped with the device didn't fit in the Paperwhite. Looking at reviews, this seems common to the 10th gen. My old cable, however, worked with the 10th gen fine.  BIGGEST "PLUSES/REASONS TO BUY" THE 10TH GEN: -Seems to work better with the libraries for transferring books -10th gen is waterproof  (but I've never needed this feature and doubt I will) -If you like having a lot of content on the Kindle at one time, the 10th gen you CAN get much more capacity, BUT  -8G storage on the 8th gen was plenty big for me  -and the 10th gen slowed down considerably when I downloaded more content and/or collections  -Amazon tech support was no help in fixing this issue. I just had to remove the content I added. -I have loaded some large PDFs to the Paperwhites, and the 10th gen doesn’t freeze or crash opening them, and earlier versions did.I’m having "buyer’s remorse" sending my 8th gen back for the 10th gen. I paid a lot more $ for the 10th gen and did not get much more Kindle. Perhaps Amazon rushed to get the 10th gen out for Christmas 2018, but I don't think it's 'ready for prime time,' and it's not a great upgrade.Honestly, I like my 2012 Paperwhite (serial # starting B01B) more than the 8th gen and 10th gen. I like the case, font, screen, and the battery lasts WAY longer then 8 & 10th gen; but, full disclosure, it doesn't work as well with library check outs/returns. It works, just not as well as 10th gen.When Amazon shipped the 10th gen Paperwhite, it comes with minimal packing. Amazon cleverly shipped it in a box with a 25 pound item on top of it. The Paperwhite was undamaged, so the packing must be fine, but it seemed a poor shipping choice by Amazon to combine the 2 orders.

author: msshar
title: Wonderful replacement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This was a replacement for my old one which quit working

author: Stanmrvan
title: excellent battery! easy reading.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: battery life is very good. after 5 years & lots of reading my old kindle battery was getting less, though still okay. plus the increased definition makes for much better reading. and I read a lot.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love My Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Yes, I am a bibliophile, but I don't know why I resisted so long.  Love my Kindle. Getting going was a little challenging for such a dinosaur, but my public library was so helpful.  Best part is being able to read in bed at night with no lights of any kind and not bothering my husband.

author: nehall
title: Love My Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I haven't had my Paperwhite very long , but so far I absolutely love it.  Setup was a breeze which says a lot since I'm not that tech oriented.  I will report back after awhile but I don't think my opinion is going to change!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: works like the older papewhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: But it took me a while to figure out to change the font and the background.  More of the functions are now touch.  My old kindle had gotten very slow. I am enjoying this newer faster version.

author: S. Whittenberg
title: Good product!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It was kind of awkward figuring how to transfer borrowed books on Libby to the Kindle, but I finally was successful. I like the smaller lighter Kindle for reading instead of my iPad.

author: Brenda
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I finally upgraded from my original keyboard kindle and I love it.  It's small enough to fit in my purse and carry to have anytime I have a few minutes to read.  Love it!

author: Biker Babs
title: I can see it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the backlit aspect. I don't like the over-pricing for the backlit aspect. And the fact that it went on sale for $30 bucks less a week after I bought it. :(

author: sv
title: Screen is glitchy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is glitchy. The touchscreen often doesn’t work. Although is so light still have to hold with two hands because need to swipe to change pages. It doesn’t shut off properly. Wish I bought the new version with the buttons and ergonomic set up but hard to justify that. Wish you could switch back and forth to audible but you cannot unless you buy the book on both.

author: Gracie Rodriguez
title: I love my new Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I hadn't read for pleasure in years. After deciding I wanted the Kindle for Christmas, I haven't stopped reading books on it since! I couldn't be happier with my new Kindle. It's the first e-reader I own but I am thrilled I chose it. It is easy to use and I don't mind the ads others were complaining about at all. I actually find them useful as I end up adding some of the suggested books on the ads to my reading list. I would absolutely recommend the Kindle to others.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Battery Life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I read a lot... on line, hard copy and, of course, my kindle.  This new one is great... esp because the battery life is extended.Definitely an improvement.

author: In Arizona
title: Lasts a long time.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's nice to have my Kindle last a lot longer, but my major disappointment is that it can't be turned sideways and the cover has no stand so Kindle has to be held or propped up on something else.

author: NH

body: I really like how lightweight this reader is. The bright pages are even easy to read in bright sunshine. I like how easy it is to "turn" the pages. While recovering from a shoulder surgery I could use this easily with one hand.

author: Carolyn Waldron
title: I like the smaller size and light weight.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with the paperwhite kindle.  Nice and light weight and smaller than the older one I had.  Battery life seems about the same if not a little less than the older one.

author: Alice C Gavey
title: Love my new Kindle

body: I love the new generation of kindle paperwhites.  I can't be without it.  It makes reading a pleasure again because I have so much trouble seeing tiny print on the paper books.

author: vocman
title: Wonderful ereader!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Display is excellent. Battery lasts for several weeks, close to a month! I don't mind the ads at all. Flashcard feature is great for building vocabulary. All in all, a great reader.

author: ali5
title: A Winner Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the fact that it is thinner and lighter but has much more memory.  I also like that it is water proof.  I would prefer prettier, less expensive magnetic covers for it.  Love the back-lighting!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Light and Easy to Hold
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my paperwhite! The only thing I really miss when comparing it to using the kindle app on my iPhone or iPad is the scroll down option.

author: Sand in shoes
title: Good for reading at all times and places
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: i like reading outside and i have no problem seeing the screenIt also has a long battery life which is greatit is light weight and very easy to use.

author: John Coleman
title: Most practical Kindle yet
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Works great. I don’t have to haul books around thanks to the slim portability of the new Kindle. And I don’t have to worry about reading on the beach anymore. Battery life isn’t a worry either.

author: catsrus
title: love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my second kindle - could not be without it.....somehow I thought its battery would last longer between charges. Guess I spend more time on it than I think.

author: Shotgundan
title: Totally Sucks
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: No text to voice capability. My original Kindle was great with the text to voice function. This kindle is flimsy in comparison. Would not recommend to my worst enemy. This is ridiculous.

author: scrapbook99
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my Kindle Paperwhite.  It is light weight and easy to read.  I like that it is water-proof so I can read in the bath or at the pool.

author: Chris Eckersley
title: Its All You Need
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A tad smaller than I was imagining, but it is very light weight, battery lasts a long, long time, crisp text, easy to read, easy to use and navigate.  Its all in black & white, which is all you really need for reading.  I love it.  Product arrived quickly.  I would order a cover along with the kindle to protect it.  Amazon hit another home-run with this one in my opinion.

author: Dan L
title: Slow
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The screen has a slow response time when there are images.  Feels like it needs more processing power.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Lite weight and easy to read..
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Like the Paperwhite Kindle, lite weight and easy to told with one hand.. Easy on your eyes even after hours of reading.. only thing was it came in a large box with no padding and it would rattle around inside the box.. Amazon might package their products a little better.

author: JRmontana
title: Wish I would have purchased one sooner.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I used to read my electronic books on my android tablet, but the tablet gets heavy when reading in bed and the light was too bright.  The Kindle is perfect for my needs.  I can adjust the brightness, it is light and very easy to use.  Wish I would have gotten one sooner.

author: Nancy L Espinosa
title: Size and back light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the size of the paperwhite as it fits in my purse and not heavy so I can read in bed.  Also enjoy the backlight so I can read and not keep my husband awake.  Would recommend for others to purchase.

author: Mary K. Johnson
title: almost a 5 star
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: does not have blue shade (a sepia tone that helps with sleep). Also would like to see an inexpensive cover for travel.

author: steve
title: works great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: works great I thought  I would lose every thing I had on my old kindle but all I had on my old one showed up on my new  kindle just like magic. I am very pleased with this new kindle'

author: MARY K DILLON
title: Great Upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Have been using my new Kindle Paper White for a about 6 days now & I love it! Was super easy to set up... the kindle I traded in was so old it didn’t even have a touch screen! With my new kindle everything is so user friendly...from the touch screen to the homepage.. esp like that it goes to sleep when I close the cover!

author: Count Chocul4
title: awesome!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: good improvement over my last kindle. the added Bluetooth feature is awesome not only for a headset,but also for a speaker to listen to awesome books with my son

author: Amazon Customer
title: Surprise-Like it more than a book!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like this better than I thought I would being a true book lover. I do find it a bit unresponsive in moving into other books ir screens. It sometimes takes several attempts. I like that it’s water resistant at least, holds a lot of books, and easy to move from page to page. It’s lightweight & I can read in a dark room. There is minimal to no glare so I can also read outside. My only complaint is that it’s a bit difficult to maneuver for a reader rookie like me.

author: Atmos Sci Gal
title: Got for Christmas and I LOVE IT !
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been reading my books with the kindle app on my iPad, phone, etc. but the screens on those make my eyes tired. The Kindle Paperwhite is easy to hold and carry around, and reading from the screen is so much easier on my eyes than an iPad or phone. One bad thing - I was able to stay up later reading into the night. Uh-oh.

author: denalihorse
title: Worth it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is actually my second kindle. I bought this one for 2 reasons, 1. They offered me a $25 credit for my old kindle (7) 2. This one is waterproof. Totally worth it

author: Amazon Customer
title: It's fine
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This version doens't have page turning buttons so pages whiz forward or back everytime you accidently brush the screen. I also can't get it to download all my collections, which is a bummer because I used them to catalog books in a system that made sense to me.

author: Holl
title: Okay
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have liked it, couple things I don’t care for is when turning pages if often takes a couple times to do it, acts like it’s stuck. Don’t care for home page layout

author: JoAnn W.
title: It's easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I do most of my reading after night. I like the way it lights up. Makes it easy to read. I like the option if you forget who a person is in the story you can tap their name and a screen pops up describing who the person is.

author: Kent A. Russell
title: Got a dud.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Went kaput after about 3 months. Would not do anything but sit there with manilla screen. Contacted Amazon, and they agreed to accept it and fix or replace it. So it looks like I got a dud but they will make it right.

author: LINNIE
title: I like it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the light weight of the new kindle white. I haven’t used it near the pool yet or on the beach near the water. It appears to have a longer battery life. I just need to get use to the new format of the home page.

author: Melanie Wheeler
title: Disappointed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Sending this back. I dont like it at all. It leaves fingerprints everywhere, has a glare on the screen, and when reading it doesn't look like "book" pages like my old one does. I was really excited about getting this only to be left disappointed

author: PJ
title: Iove this new kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have 3 other kindles before and they don’t disappoint. I wanted this one since it water resistant and holds more books. It was very easy to set up as well.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I love this!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this! I just bought it about two weeks ago, and have already read five books in total on it since. I did have the first generation kindle paper white and loved that one as well, but this one just has such a better feel to it. Highly recommend!

author: kc
title: My 4th kindle. Favorite by far!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love how light the new kindle is! Is faster and still has all the qualities I love from my last one. Added bonus is the waterproof so no worries when at the pool or in the bath.

author: Jon P. Clancy
title: Do not trade in your old one
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very unsatisfied with the trade in process, and will never trade in again my kindle was prefect that I sent back and was told the screen was cracked and was given $5.00 for it I would have kept it and not bought the new one there is very little difference I read about 250 books a year and kindle has been great for me but Amazon got the best of me this time but never again will I trade in anything.

author: edgev
title: less features than lower priced older model
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I find it difficult to select and or delete books.  There's no color and no games are available.  Yes I know its a reader but the extra features on my older one helped me entertain my grandchildren

author: K Hill
title: Thumbs up!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 3rd Kindle.  I love the Paperwhite because it is so compact and light.  I have always recommended Kindles and will continue to do so.  Thumbs up!

author: Mid Mich Readaholic
title: Disappointed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It measures maybe 4x6 only a little wider than my IPhone XS MaxThe access to my library is so horrible I have to log onto my desktop to buy books then download to this kindle.

author: Barbara
title: Easy Process and Great Product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It was great getting the trade in offer for a new Kindle.  This is my fourth Kindle and I never leave home without one.  This one is even smaller and fits into my purse easily.

author: J. Crew
title: Love my Kindle reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I can’t put it down. Coupled with Kindle Unlimited, this can keep me occupied all day. It would be nice to change the screensaver without having to jailbreak it (which I refuse to do).

author: Larry True
title: Page changing too sensitive
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had an older Kindle for several years that I liked. Thought this would be better with the light. But, I have found the device is too sensitive and changes pages when I don't want it to. Also, keeps coming up with notice asking to restart or turn off screen. Very annoying. Sometimes when I want to advance a page, it will not advance. I have to back up a page before I can advance.

author: R. A. Mckay
title: Lightweight and easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This was a gift.  I really enjoy using it as it has lighting, so it's easy to read.  Also the font can be enlarged making it easier for my aging eyes to use.

author: Kelly T
title: Disappointing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I currently use the kindle app on my iPad, but thought I’d like this one for reading outside. Haven’t gotten there yet. This one randomly starts shifting the font size up and down, a lot. This happens when I’m not even touching the screen!  Super annoying. Not a big fan of how the home screen is set up either. Will see if I use it this summer, but overall, a big fail.

author: GLADYS RASCO
title: Frequent
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This kindle (third of three) changes pages frequently without any direction.After I shut down it comes back on to a different place in the reading, often. I need to contact Kindle but having a difficult doing so.

author: Richard A. Hunter
title: Good unit.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that you can read in a dim room. What I don't like is, I liked the buttons on the side of my other Kindle and it had a menu button. It has taken a lot of swipe to get the menu to come up some times.

author: trailblazer609
title: It's great but so slow to wake it up
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like this as the previous generation. It's noticeably lighter and thinner than the previous generation. However, it takes longer to start it when it's in sleep. That's pretty frustrating. Honestly I don't see it necessary to upgrade from the previous generation, unless you need a waterproof one or you lost yours, like me.

author: Matt
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The lit screen is so amazing. Easy to use-don't know why it took me so long to get on the Kindle train.

author: Dennis
title: It made HER happy...so we’re both Happy.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My wife’s older version paper white seemed to be failing to hold a charge. It was her Birthday, so...She likes the new one with the super thin, lite cover.

author: L. Minniear
title: Compact and lightweight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really like the size and weight of my new kindle. I upgraded for a backlit screen as I frequently travel and it was hard to read without disturbing my roommate.

author: VLM
title: Life Changing!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love, Love, Love the Kindle Paperwhite!  I had one of the first Kindle readers and the battery did not last long enough.  After a friend recommended I try again with the Paperwhite I purchased and have no regrets.  Use it daily.....

author: James D. Deibert
title: Smooth, sleek, thin, & paperwhite is clear & bright
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This new Kindle paperwhite (gen 10) is just perfect for reading.  Fits in your hand comfortably, feels great.  Easy to read, & does everything that is suppossed to do.  I do some beach reading, so the waterproof asset may come in handy, too.

author: second time student
title: awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very happy with my new Kindle paperwhite. I previously had a Kindle fire that was amazing, but I only used it to read books. The paperwhite, is much smaller and lighter and easier to travel with. Absolutely no complaints from me. I highly recommend it.

author: amber duran
title: Great kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this Kindle!! I can’t wait to get one for my mom!!

author: Harmon
title: Probably the best Kindle value
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I think the Kindle Oasis (both models) is the best Kindle around. So if you have the money, I'd recommend that one.But for bang for the buck, this one is easily the best.

author: Gustavo Jimeno
title: Went from binge watching TV to binge reading books!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Kindle is my new addiction. For more than a year now I bought physical books but won’t read them, I was not motivated. Once the new Kindle came out about 1 month ago I decided to take the plunge since, in my girlfriends own words “you will read there because it has a screen”. I love tech. 🙂 I’m now reading 1 book per week and love it! Now when it’s Prime Video/Netflix time, she watches and I read. Any spare time is now Kindle time. Greatly recommended.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Small and lightweight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Perfect for reading anywhere. It's comfortable enough to read in bed, fits easily in my bag for when I want to read while I'm waiting somewhere. It's lightweight, back lit, and the scree doesn't glare in sunlight. Love, love, love my new kindle!!

author: Liz V
title: Cool and compact
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my Kindle.  It is nice and compact with a great paperwhite screen.  The waterproof feature is great as well.

author: ThatHollandLady
title: Awesome sauce
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. I had been using my iPad for a kindle, however the screen died a tragic death. My husband ordered me this because it’s water proof. I totally love it!

author: David P.
title: watch for sales?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Double ouch! Just bought two of these, arrived six days ago at $ 129 each from Amazon Prime.

author: JAM
title: Perfect
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Kindle ereader works great. Since this was a replacement for a lost kindle, all previous downloads were there. All I had to do was charge the ereader and I was set to go.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Power button
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So, I just updated to this Kindle Paperwhite after having the previous one, screen shattered, so went and bought the new one. This one is just as good, however, the power button changed from the back of the kindle to the bottom. Before, I never even knew it was there, since I never turn off. Now, when I read, I am constantly hitting the power button, and its trying to turn off!! What was the point of moving? The cover doesn't cover it.

author: Kathy Wisdom
title: Lightweight and a great product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it, especially the life of the battery. With my old Kindle fire I would have to charge it after a few hours. With the Paperwhite I only have to charge it around one time a week.

author: Michael H. Morris
title: good but not a real upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A bit better than my previous kindle but it has a habit of turning itself off while I'm reading. also it came four days late after i paid extra for one day delivery

author: bjfg
title: Small but good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the paper white but I did not investigate thoroughly before buying. I did not realize it was soo small (I figured it would be tablet size). Plus I am a “used/thrift” store book buyer. I can normally get my books for less than $5.00...I thought ebooks would be cheaper....it appears not lol.

author: Robert Yingling
title: Quality
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is so easy to use and the quality of the printed matter coupled with the background is so easy on the eyes...

author: rBravo
title: reliable device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Continues Kindle line of fine devices.

author: Buffersmom
title: Not Sure About this One
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had to replace a lost Kindle. I like things simple so I chose the Paperwhite. I find it slow to wake up. I find it continually asking if I want to restart. Not pleased.

author: Billie
title: Sleek and Secure
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This version of Kindle, Gen 10, is the slimmest, slickest yet. Very happy with it, and I don't worry about spilling my martini on it (well, hold on there... spill the water instead).

author: joe natale
title: Double the storage waterproof version is really nice to take around and works with audible
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Works same as the one I upgraded from so I don’t need to learn all new instructions.  Has 2x the battery life and is waterproof with a better internal lighting system.

author: sharon hellmich
title: Great for reading outside
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this E reader, can see perfectly out in the sun.

author: Ruth
title: I wish I’d kept my old one!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It does what it’s supposed to do. However, the battery dies WAY faster than my old one and I wish there was a way to power it all the way down to conserve my battery.

author: M. Selders
title: Kindle works fine and the set up was easy.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Kindle works fine and the set up was easy. It downloaded the book that I had already purchased without input. Changing the font size is easy. The experimental browser feature needs more work.

author: Jack 1112
title: Fine
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I take my Kindle to the beach so I traded my older paper white for this waterproof model. Can’t tell the difference between them. I hope I don’t have to find out how waterproof it is.

author: Jessica Reyes-Hodge
title: Perfect
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Exactly what I was looking for. For great and works as advertised.

author: Jonathan M. Hyland
title: Excellent upgrade from previous model
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: If you're looking to turn in your old Kindle and upgrade, this is THE choice. It's comfortable to hold and light enough to do so with one hand. Page turns are quick when reading and the in-store experience is snappy. Haven't tested the waterproof features yet, but I don't read near fluids often.

author: ndunn
title: how quickly I got my new kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: When my older Kindle stopped keeping a charge, I knew I had to replace it.  I found the process very easy! Within just a few days I had my new paper white Kindle, all registered, and set up.  And I got a credit!

author: Amazon Customer
title: The best Kindle I've owned so far.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the fact that I can read on this Kindle in both daylight and dim light conditions. It is so light and compact, which makes it easy to hold, easy to travel with, and the battery lasts forever. I love it.

author: Donald Westerhaus
title: There's a problem
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm staring at the second new Kindle Paperwhite in the last month. The first one was returned to Amazon with a litany of problems, and they sent me another free. The replacement, this one, has the same problems as the first. It resets itself in the middle of my reading a book, but it resets over and over again. Something is terribly wrong with both of them -- and I think it's the software. I'm going to try to send this one back also.

author: Pj Farance-rabel
title: I am so pleased to get the new kindle.  I had over 1700 titles on the old one.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The kindle is so great.  It fits into my purse and is light weight.  The water resistant feature wasn't that important to me, but the longer lasting battery is great!  I look forward to having this kindle for many years to come.

author: J. Cochrane
title: Feeling ripped off.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This item is on sale today for $89.00.  Why do I always get screwed. This just sucks.

author: D. Workman
title: Has it PLUS points but a few Minus one too
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Hate the constant adds at each opening. Also it often blacks out and I have to close and re open mid reading. Otherwise I really like this one, it’s lighter and more readable.

author: Joyce Harmon
title: So light and bright
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The kindle meets all expectations. My only issue is that inclusion of a charging cable was not listed so I ordered a separate charger. Please clarify the description.

author: william blakley
title: Not a good buy even on sale if you still have your older one.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Every thing seems to work as advertised. I was disappointed there Is also a high cost option before you can use the audio books  This was unexpected so to read audio books I will have to use an I phone.  By upgrading to this I paid a lot of money for waterproof and extra memory.  Not a good buy on my part and somewhat shady promotion on your part.

author: MarciB
title: Light weight - easy to handle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: There is no other way to say it - I LOVE MY KINDLE. Lost my old one so did an upgrade on the new one. Having to relearn some things but, well worth it.

author: Nick
title: Really enjoy it so far
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's compact, responsive and good brightness for different situations. The ads haven't been too much of a distraction or annoyance (so far) and the battery life is excellent.

author: E.S.
title: It’s worth the price
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like how light it is, and that I can read in the dark because it is backlit! I will be reading many more books now that I have this new Kindle. It fits in my purse.

author: Christian
title: It’s a Kindle, it simply works and has rekindled  my love for reading.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: On my 3 or 4th paper white kindle, I usually end up giving them away as gifts to other book lovers. It works very well and I have absolutely no complaints or concerns. Would recommend 1000%

author: Linda
title: Difficult to transfer
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Managed to lose my highlights when I transferred books from my old kindle. Online help was not able to restore after lost on my old kindle as well. Plus the protective jacket choices are limited and thin. My old kindle had a nice wrap cover that gave better protection to the kindle.

author: kwaite
title: waterproof = so much more convenient!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love that the Kindle is now waterproof! I enjoy reading by the beach, and always worry about drops hitting it and it getting ruined. I can now relax by the pool, or anywhere and not have to worry! It's already been accidentally dropped into a hot tub...no problems at all!

author: Greg Smith
title: Easy to use and a very clear screen
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like everything about the new Kindle Paperwhite. Perhaps most important is the combination of more pixels than the old Kindle and the gentle backlit screen which makes reading so easy to do in any light.

author: Mike Rankin
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. With a passion for reading, this Kindle  Paperwhite actually makes the desire to read even more. Small and thin perfect for my pocket I take it everywhere. A must for all readers.

author: Grandma G
title: Instructions can be complicated
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the possibilities of the Kindle, but I've had to seek advice concerningsome of the basic instructions. I bought it to avoid carrying home so manylibrary books.

author: Steve cassie
title: Great so far!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it so far! I had a small Kindle far prior to this. I love how light this is...battery life is awesome. I can't wait to try it at the beach as I couldn't use my prior Kindle in the sun.

author: Mommakescakes
title: Great Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Excellent new kindle model. I had an older touch kindle that was not working well any longer ne’er. This one has been great so far and the battery lasts for has been great.

author: Foster
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: At first I didn't think I'd like how small the kindle is but I rather enjoy it. It's a perfect pocket size to be able to take anywhere. Super light weight, and great features. I didn't realize that even in the store on the kindle it's all grey, no color to the book covers but I'm good with that. This is the first new kindle that I've gotten for myself so I cant compare it to others but it's pretty fast and offers great selections.

author: jd
title: Skips pages for no reason
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm only on my first book on this paper white, and while reading in bed holding it by the edges (not the front face or the back), it will sometimes randomly skip 5, 10 or more pages for no reason. Sometimes before this it will weirdly show a highlighting attempt, followed by the page skips. Very frustrating since trying to find your place again can be quite hard. What a waste of money. I wouldn't buy this again.

author: MandyMoo
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love this new Kindle Paperwhite!  I love that it reads so well, no real glare on the screen, lightweight and especially the waterproofing for poolside, baths or beach use.

author: Orangeorion1
title: Great product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this kindle! It’s so small and lightweight and easy to hold while reading.  I love the backlight and the best part is it’s waterproof so I don’t have to worry about it getting ruined if I drop it in the bath or if something spills on it accidentally.  Highly recommend!

author: JOHN HAWKEYE
title: Great reader.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Was easy to set up and transfer books to. Lightweight and easy to use.

author: Brittany Kwong
title: Better then my phone
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
