body: I adore my kindle paperwhite. I love the home page it is so helpful and is exactly what I need when searching for a new book or a old book or just a book. The waterproof helps when I spill my tea. I love that it is just for books so my kids don’t take it for games. It is better then my phone

author: Linda Teitler
title: Take a book anywhere!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Purchased this for my husband, because I have one and love it. The touch screen and light make reading so easy and portable. And now this new one is waterproof!

author: Christine Chambers
title: Works great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Works great. Love being able to read or listen to a book wherever I go. It's nice and compact.  Fits easily in a purse or backpack. Connects easily to wifi and bluetooth headsets.

author: Darlene Keller
title: Talk to a tech person to check to see if the product has all the features you want.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am very disappointed in my paper white, I have a kindle and some of the features on the fire I do not have on the paper white, yet it cost me 3 times as much

author: mary jo bergman
title: Needed audio..my older version was having some issues
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the longer battery life, the audio part, although I haven't used it yet, and it is waterproof.....Miss the side page turner. Now need to tap the page....It is a step up...

author: Happy reader
title: Waterproofing is the real change.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Operates almost identically as my first Paperwhite. Smooth edges. Seems to work a little more slowly. Wish I could do white letters on black at night. Satisfied.

author: Jim Garland
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like my new Paperwhite very much.  I replaced a similar model that started to have issues after seven years.  My only negative is that it is very slightly smaller, making my perfectly functional Kindle cover useless.  For such an insignificant change in dimensions, I feel like they should have maintained the former footprint.

author: Donna Julseth
title: Delete isn’t delete
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My one complaint is the the books I have read are still on the device even after I deleted them. Why am I needing to scroll through covers of books I’ve read

author: Jacob Gates
title: Big improvements - big price tag
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Huge improvement over the last paper white kindle. Sharper screen. Easier navigation/ touch screen ability. Faster and better design- finally water proof! I wish it were slightly larger ( thinner border and larger screen) and had a lower price tag. Seems odd some of the color tablets are often priced lower then a kindle.

author: Gary Mays
title: Recommended if you love to read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This product was a gift for my wife. She had an older kindle and it was on the fritz. I bought this paperwhite that is waterproof and she loves it. She has been reading non-stop since Christmas. If she's happy so  I'm happy! Happy wife, happy life!!! LOL

author: Cynthia Harmon
title: Best Kindle Yet!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Most important to me is my ability to read outdoors, in sunlight.

author: Wayne Blanchard
title: time between charges
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the new Paperwhite.  Nice and light.  backlit screen looks great.  One thing that surprised me was I don't see any big difference in recharge times between this new Paperwhite and the version before.  I read alot at night so I keep the backlight on.  On the plus side it now charges very fast.

author: pc
title: with oudible
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: when I am outside or at the pool and I am reading a book I want to be able to turn on audible so that conversations around me wont distract me from my book.

author: Annette McMahon
title: Have turned in my old Kindle and it was accepted.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have ordered a new Kindle and have received it. How do I receive my discount for turning in my old kindle for a discount? I just received an email saying that my old Kindle was accepted.  Thanks

author: Ben Mulvey
title: Poor battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery lasts days, not weeks as advertised. Slow to boot up. Long time Kindle user. Traded in Three year old Voyage. Should have kept it.

author: Kela YN
title: First Paperwhite owner!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first experience with Kindle Paperwhite, so I have nothing to compare it to, but I really do like the size, backlight, ease of use, and overall function.

author: Nipho
title: Zero water damage and awesome battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Absolutely love it. This is my first Kindle and I’ve always sworn to beauty of physical books but I think I’ve been converted. Don’t get me wrong, I still love the physical book but this is just as awesome. The battery life is great. I can read while my partner is asleep next to me without distracting him or straining my eyes. Also love that I can read it in the bath or pool without worry.

author: M. Williams
title: Easy and lighter
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old one quit working.  This one came and the set up was quick and easy.  Thank you.  Then the old one started working again.  Yay!  One to carry.  One for home.

author: Amazon Customer
title: My favorite investment
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is at least my 4th . It's the only thing I buy updated versions of.  My older versions have always still worked fine, but I scratched them up.

author: Stephen J Hays
title: No trade inon for the old o
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was exchanging my old kindle for this one.I was surprised when mine was not allowedas a trade in.  It was returned and I was charged the $50.00 but my cover was notreturned.Now I must purchase another cover for myold one so I can pass it on.

author: Brandon
title: It’s the perfect travel companion.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: While I prefer a actual books, this is my go-to to save space when traveling. The battery life is incredible and adds to its utility when I’m on the go.  The screen being flush with the edge of the device is a nice touch and creates a more modern feel than the previous Kindle.

author: Michele H.
title: It's a neat thing to have. But I'm technologically challenged
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like it so far. I didn't get all the bells and whistles like the other ones have. I only want to read! I haven't figured out how to hold it yet, guess I'll have to shell out more money for that...which kinda sucks....it should be included. ( For CERTAIN members.....just sayin')

author: wendy hail
title: Can’t be charged
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Don’t bother. It comes with the wrong cord, so even with the adapter it can’t be charged😀The person on the phone told me they know it but they cannot do anything about it unless I order another cord. Another Amazon rip-off.

author: John Green
title: Best device for reading....
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Having used the Kindle App on a computer, iPhone and iPad, the Kindle Paperwhite is still the best for undistracted reading. With  other devices, there are constant interruptions with mail, text messages, etc. The Paperwhite has none of this and with the battery life is perfect for uninterrupted reading.

author: C. Gokey
title: Very glad I made this purchase.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like this kindle, the built in light is so nice, my poor old eyes are greatly thankful! The storage capacity is very nice too, as is the quite long battery life and short charging time.

author: Ashley
title: Well worth if buying!!! Big Kindle ereader fan!!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very thin and very small. I love it and can’t wait to start reading!!!

author: Andy Ramirez
title: Wow!!! Great eReader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it. I ordered the 32 GB one and have already went through my external hard drive and installed pdf's and mobibooks I had in my collection. Barely made a dent in storage. Small, lightweight and filled with tons of features. I suggest going on YouTube to learn some of the features not advertised. The only con I have is the backlight in my opinion could be a bit more brighter on max setting. Overall an impressive little gadget.

author: Amanda
title: Even more benefits
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I get the same great benefits I had with my previous Paperwhite, but now I  get more storage, waterproof capabilities and bluetooth. I love the addition of being able to connect to a Bluetooth device for my Audible books and the whisper-sync capabilities.

author: barbara g.
title: easier to read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that it is easier to read and no glare.  I have not figured out how to make the letters/writing a bit larger .  I hope it continues to be easier for me to read and no glare etc.

author: Jerry Banks
title: Perfect book on the go
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle device.

author: antje gillingham
title: The improved Kindle reads to you!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle! I wished for it mainly because it has audiobook capacity and I love it when someone reads to me (also perfect to listen to a book while obsessively knitting😃)You do need a Bluetooth speaker or head phones; there is no place to pug in your regular headphones. But that shouldn’t be an issue. If you love audio books, invest in a Bluetooth speaker and get this fabulous Kindle. ☺️

author: Kindle Customer
title: Great E - Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I don't like the position of the ON/OFF button location,  where it rests in my hands i accidentally turn it off a lot.  very frustrating.  Otherwise it is an excellent E- Reader.  I also enjoy the built in clock.and the waterproof against splashesI also like the FAST start up

author: Susan E. Strong
title: do not like paperweight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: i have 3 kindles.  this is one i just bought and it is not holding its place after i read.  i have to write down where i left off even when i go to home first.  not happy with either paperweight i bought.  sending it back

author: Deborah knight
title: Not user friendly!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: this is our 8th kindle and we purchased this one for my husband to use only for reading books - no games, etc. However it is the most disappointing of all our kindles - not user friendly at all.  Very difficult to locate other books we have in the cloud or already downloaded.  My husband is not a happy camper!

author: L.Smith
title: User Friendly!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first Kindle and I can honestly say I'm loving it. The only reason I can't give it 5 stars is I'm still learning all the features. I'm not particularly tech savvy, but I have found the instructions online to be easy to follow. Still sorting through the very extensive ebook library, but overall it's meeting my needs, an easy, convenient way to carry my reading material (loving the large font!)

author: Bailey Johnson
title: Like the smallness and brightness! Just upset sent the wrong charger!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loved the Kindle Paperwhite...it’s smallness and brightness. Very upset that the charger was the wrong one and Amazon did not have any chargers.

author: M. Deal
title: Comfortable to hold
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought the kindle oasis last year and I do like everything about it except I like to read in bed st night and I have found the kindle paper white is actually more comfortable for that.

author: GoodTennis
title: Easy Reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the smaller size than my Kindle Fire - easier to hold and read in bed. No glare screen is great.But I am not fond of the way to navigate my books. Seems cumbersome.  Much easier on the Fire.

author: KMacMu
title: Absolutely love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it! I had a 2nd gen Kindle DX that I loved. I wasn't sure if I would like the smaller size. It doesn't seem small at all. Highly recommend!

author: Jetter
title: Easy Reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My previous Kindle was large and cumbersome so the new Kindle Paperwhite was a pleasure to use because of its small size. The adjustable font size custom made my ease in reading just right. While the directions were clear and finding options easy, I was disappointed that I could not change the black on white print to white on black. After clicking on everything I could find, I gave up. I'm sure that option is available and I just can't figure out how to use it.

author: Annie
title: They keep getting better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third kindle and second paperwhite. I like the ergonomic changes in this new one. I like the new slimmer profile. Good all around reader.

author: ivy
title: things that don't work right
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The product is great with the exception of how the setting works on setting up the kindle like my old one I like the reading list and it keeps going  back to pictures of books don't care for that feature. And also I can't load all of my old books to it for some reason and I like to re-read some of the titles that I have purchased in the past and my full library of books will not load to the new kindle.

author: Jewell
title: I love the size and the weight , no glair it’s great 👍
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the weight the size overall it’s awesome . I am disappointed that I have to have WiFi to buy a book ?? With my older one I did not need to sign in ? Just find the book I wanted and boom I had it . I travel a lot and placing orders needing WiFi takes away a lot of  pleasure .. I’m hoping it’s me not knowing how to use it . Once I’m home I will have my granddaughter check it out for me . Thank you

author: Salenathomas16
title: Best one yet
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it

author: Roberto T
title: Great Product !
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like a lot the Kindle Paperwhite 2018...This is the first E-Reader I ever own, and I like it a lot..., It is very easy to read, and has nice features...Battery lasts for a very very long time... I have nothing bad to say about it... Highly Recommended...

author: Bernardo Rubinstein
title: Faboulus e-reader.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easy to ensemble and sincronize and ready to read on.

author: Elisabeth V.
title: Love it!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: LOVE LOVEmy paperwhite! Easy to use . change font or brightness in seconds. Did not use in the tub so i can't talk about the water resistance.

author: Sommer Garth
title: Lost in transit
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The product itself is great. However we had to have a replacement sent because the original was lost in transit. Voila it just showed up 3 months later.

author: Amazon Customer
title: A crafted e-reader built for legacy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Going from a first generation paper white to this one is the difference between day and night. For starters there are zero issues with any pixels, second the screen is flush with the face of the divice. The shape is more uniform, the first gen was shaped in an awkward way that made putting it in any non amazon case a pain. This one has been faster, and brighter. Lots of developmental changes and thought has gone into crafting a reader that excels at doing it.

author: kim
title: Not Happy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My fault that I am not happy. I did not realize that this one did not have 3g or 4g. Did a trade in after I bought this one feel a bit ripped off by that., because I can't use the 25% discount towards this Kindle and a few other issues.

author: Melissa Banczak
title: Love this baby!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new paperwhite. It’s so much easier to read on this than my phone. I can see a whole page at once! The only thing I wish I could do was buy books on it. So, Amazon, fix that.

author: Kaushik Srinivasan
title: Good Investment for people who like books
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like to read books a lot and I have tried reading books on my mobile and tablet devices. Nothing comes close to the kindle experience. It is lightweight and simple to use. No eye strain or pain due to holding heavier devices for a long time. Good to read at night time in the dark or with study lamp. No glare. Feels like reading a book without the smell of the book. Awesome product. Battery lasts for around a week with couple of hours of reading every day.

author: MHenry
title: As advertised.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is as advertised. I like being able to slip it in my back pocket or coat pocket. It is easy on the eyes in the dark. No glare and not tiring to read.

author: Suzi Sunshine
title: Love My New Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had all the kindle versions.  This one is my favorite.  It is smaller, thinner and brighter from the prospective of not straining the eyes.  Read on!

author: marianne woolbert
title: Faulty charging cable but otherwise fine
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The cable that came with the kindle worked one time and quit. I started a return since I thought it was the unit. I found another cable and used it and the kindle worked fine. The cable that it came with didn't seem to fit right from the start. So far so good!

author: Cario  Lam
title: Worth the upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love that it’s lighter than the previous generation.  I am looking for a set of bluetooth earphones so I can listen to audio books.  I like that it’s waterproof but I am not going to test out this feature.

author: T. Finger
title: 3 issues. 2 positives.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 1. Can someone explain to me why the power button would be on the bottom where I would rest it on a surface??? It just turns off all the time. 2. What is with the charging port? It is difficult to plug in and never seems seemless in the connection. 3. Why to I have to do a hard reset every couple weeks?On the other hand. . . 1. Reads great in the sun. 2. Seems waterproof from a 5 second shallow dip in the pool.

author: lynn sian
title: Disappointing reading device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first kindle ereader. Prior to this I owned an early generation kindle fire. The paperwhite is fine, easy to read and does what it is supposed to do. I just don't understand why it is so slow or why the page turning is so clunky, and slow.  The only thing this device does is display books.  My phone is smoother and quicker.  Even the old fire is quicker and smoother.  I hope it redeems itself on the beach.

author: aghbo
title: Another good product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first Kindle and didn't disappoint me. The screen response is a bit slow, but then again may be attributed to a lower performing GPU to safe power. Only concern I have is the synthetic rubber like surface coated case. These typically melt and become very sticky after a few months in hot and humid weather. Hoping this won't happen though.

author: Daniel Gurney
title: Feels like your holding a book!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Absolutely love my 10th gen Paperwhite! Looks identical to a book, having a adjustable backlight is just one of the very many convenient features. Hands down best purchase ever made as far as reading! I researched the nook, kindle, galaxy, etc! The Paperwhite takes the cake...

author: Bill O
title: Old guy joining the 21st Century
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have finally joined the 21st century, much to the delight of our children (adults). I am 72 and an avid reader and with much resistance I will be opening my Christmas gift from them and then, let the downloading begin.

author: Sara Beckett
title: I like that I can read at night without a light. It’s perfect for me.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that I can read at night without a light perfect for me.

author: Barbara Blake
title: controls a little small for large fingers
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like it because it is light weight but the controls are a little too small.  I am getting used to it but liked my old generation one better.

author: Holly
title: Love my kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Charger cable didn't fit, but called customer support and they fixed it immediately

author: Newbie
title: Love my new Kindle Paperwhite....
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's lighter, thinner and has a different look to the tools bar, but very easy to adapt.  It also holds a charge much longer than my Kindle Fire used to, and charges very efficiently.  Love it!

author: Chantelle DeLozier
title: Best kindle I've had
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've had 3 generations of kindles and this is the best by far. The touchscreen is very receptive, the clarity of the screen is great, the brightness adjustment is perfect for all lighting, and the different font selections are perfect for various readers. I haven't fully tested it's waterproofness, but I have read it in the bathtub where it got a little moisture on the screen and there were no problems.

author: Edgar F Paul
title: does not work.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I received this item today and it did not work. Today I called the Amazon help number 3 times and no one had a clue as to why the Kindle did not work. Very unimpressed with Amazon workers.

author: David
title: Works as advertised
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had trouble plugging in the charging cord. Later I found out that this was a problem and Amazon replaced the cord free. I haven't tried it yet but I hope I didn't damage my new Kindle plugging in the defective cord.

author: Yilin Luo
title: Not useful
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The touch-screen is not easy to use. The screen is too small for reading long texts and it flashes for a while when cutting to the next page.I wish it could be more convenient to change the brightness, and I wish the text can stay on screen when I turn the device off instead of ads.....As for the hardware, if I put the device vertically on the desk it keeps turning on and off, which is awful.

author: bill volk jr
title: Charge last longer
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my second Kindle and am completely satisfiedWorks great just like the last one, it was old and I wanted one with a little more features

author: Sam
title: Super useable
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: We love how compact and simple this device is.  It works well and is really nice paired with our library cards.  Lots of free books and good reading all on one compact tablet.

author: David
title: Plug into wall charger while it's indexing your downloaded books.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was experiencing the quick battery drain problem, but it was apparently due to the kindle indexing a large quantity of downloaded books. When I followed the advice to plug it into a wall charger until it's finished indexing (about 100 books/hour) the battery drain problem now appears resolved.

author: krusty
title: works as intended for price!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: works as intended for price!

author: m. harty
title: sleek but prefer a paper manual.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It is great for someone familiar  with a KIndle  but  I can't even find the manual on the device.I remember  it was  mentioned and is somewhere.

author: melissa
title: audio books are not available from public librarys
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Kindle books and ePub books from the public library work just great.  Easy to set up.  I think the promotion for this is misleading in that audio books can only be downloaded from Kindle Audible Books at a high cost.  You can not borrow them from the public library.  I did download one book from Kindle and I had no problem making a Bluetooth connection with my Toyota Highlander and listening to it.

author: Lisa P
title: Does not keep a charge. Known issue. Will not replace.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Does not keep a charge for more than 1 hour. Known issue. Soo disappointed. Loved v3. Spent last year ordering and returning all new versions. Got credit for v10,which cannnot use without being on charger,  but Amazon will only trying to repair and replace v7

author: Sue Kjelstrom
title: more trouble then its worth
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have spent more time with tech support and customer service then I have using the kindle. The thing doesnt auto update like it should and force updates are a pain. Then there is books and audiobooks that go missing from your library without you doing anything. For the money you spend on one it really isnt worth it.

author: Pam Nicoletti
title: Battery life not what I expected
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Battery on this only lasts a couple of days, unlike the one I traded in from 2012 that lasted weeks.  It was advertised to last weeks.

author: Malcolm Widd
title: Neat!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just what I wanted ♥

author: Chevy
title: Daughter loves this device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My daughter actually reads more with her kindle. She can move on to her next book without having me send away for it, or take a trip to the bookstore. Easy to download and access her wish list right from my amazon account.

author: Barbara A. Chapman
title: very easy  to read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use this to read, especially while traveling

author: Bdub
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: the new Kindle Paperwhite is fantastic.  Smaller and lighter, easier to use, greater storage and very responsive.  Very thankful that I traded in and purchased the new model.

author: Michael K. Wolf
title: What a difference!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a first-generation Kindle for 8 years, and finally upgraded to this PaperWhite.  Makes the whole experience much easier.  With all actions now executed on the touchpad, I no longer have to press keys to mechanically effect any operation.  Works well in all lighting conditions.  Much improved battery life, too.

author: Beth Smith
title: Different than my old one.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Taking me a little longer to figure out how it works. Books are stored differently than on my old Paper White, but it works great so far.

author: kathy arinella
title: It looses battery charge after about an hr of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: the new kindle is great love the backlight on it and some of the new features but it looses charge after about an hr of use what causes that.

author: Susan Johnson
title: A waterproof kindle!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Now I can take bubble baths or showers or go white water rafting with my kindle!  I love the fact it is water proof!  I love the new smooth screen!

author: K T
title: Good product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like my kindle!  I never received the information for 6 month of free Kindle unlimited for purchasing this new Kindle Paperwhite as advertised.  :(

author: Bryant Newcomb
title: Nice ereader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had lost my old whitepaper reader (V3) and decided to purchase a new one. I was not disappointed in getting this new version 10 reader. Still have access to my older reads and the suggested new titles based on my past choices is a nice function. I would highly recommend this to anyone who likes to read and does not want to carry around a large or heavy book.

author: NRQ
title: My 1st Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use this for travel to read books on the go. Great battery life and you can store tons of books. I have moved several PDFs on it and it works great. My only grief is with the grayscale display, sometimes when there are diagrams and pictures in the book I miss the colours.

author: Laura
title: I can read my books again!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I suffer from chronic headaches and migraines but I love reading. Normal phones and tablets hurt my eyes due to the backlight and book print strained my eyes because it's so small. This has allowed me to read again which is my favorite past time. I love that I can make the text larger and using night mode helps with my light sensitivity. It has been wonderful.

author: Karen G.
title: Love it !!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new Kindle.  It is so much smaller and lighter than my old one.

author: C. Musarra
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’ve only read a few pages so far but I love it! I was up and running and had the few books I’ve purchased loaded within five minutes. Such a smooth experience.

author: JDM
title: If you want an e-reader this is it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is a great e-reader. It was small enough to travel with and customizable so that your eyes aren’t straining to read. The kindle is very user friendly ans easy to learn.

author: Love Amazon
title: Best Kindle Ever
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle. They just keep getting better and better. So glad it is waterproof since I read around the pool a lot. It will be great on vacation in Cancun!!

author: esf
title: Easy to travel with and read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s lightwieght and has a light, which my previous kindle didn’t.  They tell me it is waterproof, although, I haven’t put it in a pool to see if that is true.  I’m going to trust them on that!

author: jac
title: Fantastic
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the kindle, but I wish the on off button were still on the back as I loved using the kindle cover that you can stand up. can't find one for this kindle. Other than that I like every thing about the new kindle especially the weight. Guess what? After I wrote this I found one. Now it is perfect. Happy Camper,

author: Amazon Customer
title: Kindle needs frequent charging
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My first kindle and I like it. Would have given it a 5 but it does not stay charged near as long as is advertised. I’m charging it every other day. I keep it in airplane mode which is supposed to help but I am disappointed it requires charging so frequently. I read some everyday. Still I like having it and it will be nice on trips

author: wanderer
title: Lightweight and easy to read even in sunlight.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is to replace my old first generation Kindle and a kindle app on a tablet.  I used to put a book on both and switch between them to read at night (backlit) and in the sunlight.  Now one smaller, lighter device serves both purposed.

author: Ron ("in Utah")
title: New USB charging cord won't fit Paperwhite.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The included USB charging cord would not, did not fit into the devise.  Damn dissapointing for a "brand new" product!  However, called Amazon Customer support, & that issue was taken care of immediately. BEST customer service outside of Nordstrom's !

author: Christina R. Green
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Got this as a back up and to take camping dude to the back light. I was disappointed with the fire and it's shinny screen. This paper white is awesome.

author: George Howell
title: No Instructions
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I don't know how to look up the meaning of a word while I am reading.I don't understand the menus.I can read text and turn pages. The rest of the operations are confusing to me because I don't do them often enough.I will eventually figure it out.I wish there were instructions somewhere, indexed by topic.

author: Kindle Customer
title: So handy and convient
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like the smaller size and the dim light for night reading. I do not bother my husband if I read at night.

author: Mary Ann Rebish
title: Compact and Light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I replaced my old Kindle that I had for 6 yrs.  This one is so compact and light and it fits easily in my handbag.  There is always a light on so you never have to worry about reading in the dark.  All of the controls are within the device - that is one thing I have to get used to but I really like it.

author: Ronald I Routson
title: Switch Location
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the new Paperwhite but didn’t give it the highest rating because of the on/off switch location. I have never liked the bottom location or the difficulty of turning it on or off. In order for it to work, I must use my thumb mail and press it directly on the switch. If it was located on top, it would be more accessible and therefore much easier to use.

author: marta
title: Great buy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. Easy to use. Good picture

author: Carmichael
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. I usually get migraines when I read on my other tablets but I haven’t gotten one since I started reading on this. The only thing I don’t like is that there’s a white “speck” of light at the bottom of my screen that is definitely not supposed to be there

author: NickyGiGi
title: Crappy battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm unimpressed by my new Kindle Paperwhite.  I ordered this new one because the battery on my old one wasn't holding a charge. This isn't better at all. Charged to 100% on Saturday and by Wednesday it's at 36%.

author: Vilma Thibodeau
title: Does not support any types of games!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this new version of the kindle and soon after receiving it, I returned it. I've had an early version for many years and love it. The main reason I kept mine is you are able to read and also play games on it. The new kindles do not support games of any kind. And that is the main reason I love my old kindle. The ability to read and play games when I want to take a break from reading!

author: angelmom1
title: So nice
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this kindle,  I carry it in my purse, it is so small and compact.  Sync it with the one Next to my bed so I can continue with the same book.

author: Big Jones 2
title: Seriously, what is there not to like?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: ...Compared to the Barnes and Noble Nook, this has much better backlighting uniformity.  Speed and display quality of text are all that a person would ever want.

author: Art Tillery
title: WOW!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love to read, and I take my Kindle with me when I believe that I may have some "down time".  It is compact and fits most of my pockets, so when ever time permits I pop out my "book" and enjoy.  It is easy to use, works in all kinds of environments, and I am impressed with the wide range of topics to choose from.  I look forward to many years of interesting and educational reading to come.

author: KC
title: Not much of an upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I decided to trade in my 4-year old Kindle Voyage for the new Paperwhite, thinking that although the Paperwhite was a lesser model when I bought the Voyage, it had likely progressed over the years and would now be a superior device.  I was wrong.  It is larger, heavier, and slower than my old Voyage.  The screen looks no different.  I will be returning it.

author: gemgirl
title: Now it’s waterproof!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have loved all of my Kindles. This one is the perfect size, and I really like the Paperwhite feature as well as the fact that it is waterproof. I use my Kindle everywhere and I love it for traveling.

author: linen
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easier to read than my previous kindle, small and very portable.

author: Jennifer
title: First time buyer
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love love love this and I'm a paper book lover battery lasts a long time can change font size fit in purse bag or big pocket, second kindle i own 10" color one too love that for games etc but this I love!

author: Amazonfan
title: Easy reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The screen is easy to read, and this is a lighter weight and smaller Kindle which makes it convenient to carry around.  I'm still learning to use all of the features.

author: Julia
title: Good on WiFi only
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great for reading on WiFi network otherwise it’s useless. if you need audio I don’t recommend because you will need a Bluetooth device to use that feature. You can’t even connect headphones so annoying.

author: John W. Zimmerman
title: Excellent product! Love having more space for books on the Kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle Paperwhite 10th Generation is an outstanding product! The additional space is much appreciated as I can now store many more books on the Kindle.

author: Bruce
title: This model works very smoothly
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like how much more smoothly this mobel transitions from one page to another than previous models. It has a nice compact size and the screen is very sharp.

author: Susan B. Workman
title: Battery failures
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery began to die in one day in less than three months.  My son was so careful with this item.  The customer service act like robots and won’t do anything but take it back...and tell you it will be a week while they see if they repair it.  This is disappointing.

author: Amazon Customer
title: a bit heavier than I expected
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really wish it came with a printed cheat sheet for usage info instead of having to slog through the more comprehensive info data.  Otherwise, I like it.  Unfortunately, the print cannot be enlarged as much as on my older version.  With the population getting older I would think this would be a consideration.

author: sherry westendorf
title: Excellent buy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far this surpasses the old ones with how much it has improved.  Hopefully it will last longer than my old ones.  I do recommend it though.

author: The Pearl
title: battery not as described
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: you advertise that new battery will last"weeks"- my experience over 2 months is days! My old Klindle (5 yeas) needs to be charged less often than my new Paperwhite

author: jz
title: Looking for a great Christmas gift?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been using Paperwhites for years and the latest update continues to be an outstanding product for reading while commuting, traveling or just in your favorite chair.

author: Y Leho
title: Great for reading!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loving the kindle. Made it a resolution to read more this year and it’s been easier not having to lug bulky books around. Really happy with it so far.

author: Lynn
title: Love it.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had a Kindle for a long time and compared to my older version this one is awesome.  Love it.  Didn't think I would like the touch screen but its great, easy to use, navigate and the lighting is incredible.  Highly recommended.

author: iphone screen protector
title: Work great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My daughter has been reading on her new Kindle since she received it.  She loves it and it will save her a few trips to the library every month.  It will be easy to travel with as well since it is so compact.

author: Dena Ali
title: Great device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this thing. It goes with me everywhere and helps me stay active with my reading.  It’s also become A preved time activity.  It actually helps me fall asleep.

author: Jil Kellen
title: The size and the ease of reading!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I just started using it, so far so good! This is my 4th Kindle and I think this will be my favorite by far! I never leave home without my Kindle!!!!

author: Nina L. Mazzo
title: Well designed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have owned each version of the Kindle and aside from the Oasis, this Paperwhite is outstanding - lightweight, easy to use, long battery life and very fair price.

author: Don
title: attua
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I had a kindle e-reader foreshadows a got my first paperwhite.  I was disappointed that I lost so much functionality with it but never reviewed it because I like the kindle overall concept so much.  Now I received the latest iteration for my early Christmas present.  This latest one disappoints even more!  It att

author: Jack V. Conway Jr.
title: Love it...Amazon made it better.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Everyone already knows Kindles are awesome.  I read in the pool of our vacation resort while floating on raft...it was great.  Love it!

author: Candace Richter
title: Easy reading E-Reader!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great Kindle - is a bit smaller than I prefer but is easy too use, strong battery life, easy to adjust settings and I can take it on my float in the pool!

author: Carolyn Carroll
title: All-New Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new paperwhite with 2x the storage, My old paperwhite would not bring up my books, it would say delete and down load again.

author: LY
title: wrong charger cable - wont fit
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: apparently im not the only one but the charger cable does not fit in the charging port. had to order a new plug. also terrible new look. logo looks terrible

author: Elaine Marcou
title: Light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I just received my new Kindle a week ago, but the light has dimmed considerably.  It is fully charged and I even performed a factory reset, but it has not helped.  I as so excited to get it, but do not know what else to do or what could be wrong.  Any ideas?

author: Charles P. Schisel
title: Love this product!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Should have gotten this long ago. It is like taking the library with me on vacation. Even introduces me to books and short stories before they are available elsewhere.

author: grandma
title: Great little reader.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have a harder time seeing with age. My original reader was too dark but the new Paperwhite gives me a brighter screen. It's perfect.

author: EEC
title: Worth the upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I upgraded from one of the original models.  This one is great. Easier to read- in any light!  Plus I like having a real keyboard.

author: D. in NH
title: Just one complaint
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loving it so far! Better than the last one she had. Just had to knock off a point since it's just slightly smaller so the case we had didn't quite fit

author: Roman D. Korchak
title: The BEST for outdoor reading!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I just love this Paperwhite Kindle. I love to go outside to read and now I can.  So slim and smaller than my other Kindle. But still very easy to use.  Took a while to get used to the the set-up of how the books were listed. Different than my older one.You can't go wrong with this one!!!

author: Carole
title: Love my new Kindle Paper White
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old kindle died right before a 2 week trip. I was so relieved that it was easy to get this, even better, replacement in time. It was fast to move my books from the dead kindle to the new one, too.

author: TexasTraveler
title: I will always stick to kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My previous one lasted 10 years. In the world of tech, 10 years is an eternity! I have no doubt this one which is sleeker and more functional in size, will last as long, if not longer.Im a fan!

author: Pen
title: Works great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 3rd Kindle and I love it! It's light, bright and easy to operate. Haven’t gotten it wet yet but I plan on having it by the pool in a month.

author: Sergey
title: Battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it!!!! The only disappointment is that cases from this kindle cost a fortune (Amazon cases). Which is stupid!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Blue Light and Shiny Surface
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the kindle and unfortunately had to replace my version 7 model after I lost it while traveling. My disappointment with this model is that the surface is more shiny than my previous model and reflects more, causing it to be harder to read in certain situations. Also, the lights seems to be less natural and more blue, which my eyes do not like as much as the previous version. Still like it, just not nearly as much as my previous model.

author: Kay Gooding
title: Excellent Product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased my new Kindle at Xmas time for myself and have enjoyed ever minute of it.  I find it easier to read than my old one and I like the idea of the water-proofing since I read in the tub or around water most of the time.  No, I have not dropped it in yet but I like the security of knowing I won't ruin it if I do.

author: Nancy Pretty
title: Leisure time expounded
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: LOVE that I can float around in the pool and not have to worry about getting it wet. My productivitylevel on a whole will be greatly reduced.

author: Christopher Stehno
title: Great!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: A small but mighty upgrade to an already great device. The screen lighting is more even and the feel of it is smooth and comfortable for reading.

author: Katherine Miller
title: Worth every penny !!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I LOVE IT! The kindle paper white is so light, doesn’t stare my eyes and it’s much more convinent to carry around. I love the feeling of having a physical book, but sometimes money and space are a problem, but with the kindle it’s all in one place. 10/10 recommend.

author: Kathy D.
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is great product. Just the right size and weight. Very easy to use and read.

author: Vic Cordova
title: Good books, PERFECT COVER!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Kindle works wonderfully; fast, clear read, plenty storage space & great battery life! I'm binging on reading since my Kindle PW arrived here!

author: SJR
title: Worth the trade in for the upgrades!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle is much more people friendly---at least for me!  I hesitated on trading it in as I had only occasionally used my original Kindle and really did not enjoy it.  It not only is easier to use, but the charge holds 10X as long.  I am using it daily!!

author: p2burner
title: Nice new kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Needed a replacement kindle that was "lost".  Like the thinner profile and hope i never have to confirm the "water-proof" claim

author: Magnus
title: Best E- Reader!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've tried a couple e readers out there, but I feel that this is the best e reader device so far. This is true in terms of quality and value for money

author: Clarice Barthel
title: You need a new case when you buy this product.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like how light it is and small.  Wish I had known my case would not fit it, as I have to wait until 11/27 for my new case.  Other than that my new Kindle works great.  Same display and buttons are all ok. Glad I decided to upgrade.

author: FRANCES MATOCHA
title: Easy to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Makes reading enjoyable & the lighting is pleasant & conforming. If you are on the fence, bite the bullet & get one. Think all the time you have lost & start enjoy reading.  Readers are leaders. Get one for your child & his those game iPadsF

author: W. Thom
title: Easy to use and always ready to be read.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Use it for reading and always have another book ready to start when finished.  Amazon makes it easy to add a new one.

author: Judy E. Featheringill
title: The lighting on this seems softer..I would recommend this product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my new lightweight Kindle paperwhite .  I have an old paperwhite that still works, but felt like I needed new waterproof.

author: Laney
title: Good Reads
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have a second edition Kindle and I knew it was time for a new one so I got the 10th Edition.  Love it.  It is with me all the time.

author: Bookdragon
title: It's worth it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought my first kindle paperwhite in December 2015. I enjoyed it enough to trade up to the new paperwhite. So far no regrets except there's still not an option for what page you're on instead of location. It's a sleeker design, lighter, and more sensitive to touch.

author: Linda Pastorik
title: I can read in low light.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old Kindle would not charge or come on.  I was lost without it since I was half way through the book I was reading.  I got it and all my books and library were there.  The added feature of being able to read in a dark room.

author: Dale
title: disappointed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I'm very disappointed that this newest version does NOT afford the user the opportunity to set the time before it goes to sleep with inactivity and that the remaining level of battery is NOT displayed as a percentage.  I'd have expected better from Amazon.  Perhaps when they offer an update to its operating system they will include these features.

author: Lisa Shappy
title: Everything it claims to be!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This Kindle paperwhite is so very light. Perfect for transporting and for holding to read. Love the waterproof aspect as it removes the anxiety of having near pool/lake/ocean. Also, with no glare it’s perfect for reading outside even on a bright, sunny day.Being one who is used to reading on IPad and Iphone, I found it a bit tricky to navigate. Not quite as intuitive to use.

author: Thomas M Lynch
title: Great Product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The process of returning the old device and receiving the new one was seamless. Received the new one in two days and the set up was a snap.THANK YOU

author: Patsy D. Renz
title: To touchy
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the ease of turning pages, but it is too touchy.  If I just happen to touch it, it jumps pages and it highlights things when I don't ask it to.  Otherwise, I like it.

author: Edward D
title: Works like a champ
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: As advertised. Battery life does not appear to reach advertised expectancy - 1 week possibly, but not really an issue for me. This is my 4th Paperwhite and I have liked them all. They just keep improving - what's not to like.

author: j.d
title: small but light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: such a clear view and so nice and light that my hand doesn't cramp.  So far I love everything about it!  I love that it has the clarity of my old kindle yet the ability to have it backlit so I don't always need lots of light.

author: David A. Harvey
title: Simply put... the Best Kindle Yet.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’ve owned pretty much every Kindle yet offered, including both the Oasis and Voyage, and find this newest Kindle Paperwhite to be the very best of the breed.

author: DCH
title: Good digital reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Everything is great so far. Lightweight and easy to hold by one hand. The adjustable brightness give me a flexibility for reading everywhere.

author: Carla J. Roberts
title: Not for me!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is a great product if you just want an e-reader. I love the fact that you can read with it in any light. But, it is not for me. I have a kindle fire that I have other apps on.If you are looking for an e-reader this is a great product. But, if you want one you can use as a tablet as well. go with the fire.

author: X
title: Can't read music on the device
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The words are more clear than previous Kindle versions.  I have added a sight singing book to my library and I am disappointed to see the measures are not clear at all and the notes, rests, etc are almost impossible to read they are so faint.  Maybe Amazon can look into this.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Easy on the eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought with case for the “book feel”. Very easy on the eyes. I love it! And I love being able to switch to a black background like I can on my phone.

author: Christopher L Fetterman
title: Kindle paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this as a replacement for my original kindle touch that had a bad run in with water.  This device does everything that my old kindle did just as well if not better with the added bonus of being waterproof.

author: Robert A Shackell
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This new generation Kindle is much lighter and compact than my old Kindle.  I'm so happy I traded up for this new one.

author: Larry
title: Nice Update
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I found the new paper white to be easy to use and functions great. It is nice to be able to listed to my audio books when I am traveling. The waterproofing and the extra storage are both a plus.

author: Laurence Cable
title: UI is very frustrating!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The 'page back' region on the left of the screen is too narrow and it's very difficult to reliably go back and page... So frustrating!!!

author: Christina J Lopez
title: Almost like holding a book!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am in love with my kindle.  I haven’t put it down since I got it.  Super light and easy to hold.  Almost the same size as a book so I feel like I’m holding the real thing!

author: Minnie
title: Wishing for my old Kinble
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What a disappointment. It won't hold a charge for longer than a day and a half, which is most annoying. I don't recommend anyone buy this model!

author: Ricardo J. Estrada
title: Better in the dark than older models
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Absolutely love it. Great that you can change it to black background with white text, and it is waterproof.It’s a kindle. It’a great

author: Amazon Customer
title: Not quite what I expected
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I guess I missed upon reading the product description that everything about this will be in black and white. I assumed it would be just the pages of the actual book that I was reading. Makes it hard to choose other books for future reading. I find it hard to manuver between items for shopping. As a former Nook user I felt there would be more to this than just reading and downloading other books.

author: Johawk
title: Small, lightweight, easy to see.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love going back to a reader only! And as it is only a reader I dont have to have expandable storage. Downloaded every book I own and barely touched the memory! Cant wait to try reading in the pool.

author: Janeofalltrades
title: Terribly short daily battery life!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am having to recharge my new 10th Generation Kindle every three days, which I think is excessive. The one I bought in 2006 I had to recharge every three weeks. What's wrong with this picture?

author: Lmeta
title: This new paperwhite is awesome!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the paper white line. I take it with me most places. It’s lighter than the previous one. I traded my old one in for the new one. I love reading.

author: Amazon Customer
title: A little lighter than the old kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like the waterproof as I read a lot in the Hot Tub! Battery does not seem to last as long as the old one with no light.

author: Jessica Adolfo
title: Loving it so far
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Still learning how to use it and all of the capabilities but I love that it’s lightweight and works effortlessly with my ARCs via Netgalley

author: Judy C. Fisher
title: Makes reading easier and convenient.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love my paperwhite.  I carry it with me everywhere.  Hope I never drop it in water, but it's nice to know that if I do I haven't totally list it.

author: Henry Fuhrmann
title: Compact New Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle is faster, has better optics, better choices in alphabet choices and easier to store somewhere since it is smaller and thinner.  I still would like a better way to turn off the device. Having to hold the button on the bottom is awkward.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I like this better than the Oasis
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I cracked to cover to my Oasis, so decided to get the new Kindle Paperwhite.  Absolutely love it.1.  Love the light weight, so easy to hold and read for long periods of time. Does not weigh my purse down.2.  Love I can change to screen to black at night so I don't bother my husband with my late reading.3.  Font is very clear and I can read without my glasses.

author: BXC
title: She loves it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It was for my wife who dropped her previous model into the bathtub water. This one can supposedly survive that. We'll see?

author: Brenda Monahan
title: I love the Paperwhite!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like light up screen so I can read at night without a light on.  I like the touch screen,  And I like pop up ads for new books All in all, it was the best purchase for me.

author: lih57
title: Don't "upgrade" unless you need the waterproofing feature!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The upgrade is slower turning on and the battery runs down SOOOOO much faster.  Don't "upgarde" unless you need the waterproof feature.

author: harry kruse loves to fish
title: I enjoy reading books.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Are you able to down load books from the Library on the Paper Weight? I would like to know. If I can not do this I will have to find something that will let me do it. Other then that I enjoy the Paper Weight very much. The other thing that I am not sure about is I was supposed to get 3 books free. I have paid for all that I got. I do not know if this is true or not since I have not received my statement yet. Thanks, Mr. Harry Kruse

author: Karen C.
title: Not turning on after just a month
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: After just a month my new Kindle paperwhite won’t turn on. I’ve tried everything and it won’t atart up.

author: Christie Dismuke
title: My New Favorite E-Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new kindle paperwhite is light and comfortable to hold for extended periods of reading. The text is easy to read in a variety of lighting conditions. I love that I can read with it in the bath without having to worry about dropping it in.

author: David Cornelius
title: Does the job.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bought this to replace my wife's Fire.  The Fire is good, but for just straight reading, the Paperwhite is much more handy.

author: Jay
title: Nice Looking
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This sleek kindle is easy to read and use. Can load numerous books at same time. Only gave it four stars because it is a bit cumbersome to set up.

author: Nick A. Kallis
title: WiFi doesn’t work after 11 days
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The device itself is fine but I’ve had it 11 days and already will no longer connect to Wi-fi. So disappointed. Traded my Oasis in for this and wish I hadn’t.

author: L R Bach
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s a little delayed every now again, but it could just be me, touch screen electronics have a tendency to disagree with my fingertips

author: Amazon Customer
title: Charging Port Problems...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have only needed to charge my kindle 2 times in the 2 months I have had it and the charging port already won’t connect! I had this problem with my last kindle but it didn’t start until about 2 years in! I am so disappointed.

author: grandma8
title: I love reading
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My granddaughter loves it and uses it VS her I pad listening to utoub.

author: jbeebs
title: Very Pleased
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with my new Kindle. Easy to see screen, back light, options, etc. Very little glare - though haven't been outside in direct sunlight yet.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Nice new Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Husband is getting used to it.  Says somethings are easier and faster.  Not a lot of changes, but good ones.  Same size and weight.

author: Dawn Rodriguez
title: Absolutely AMAZING!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I traded my older Paperwhite in for the new one and absolutely love it.  Purchased the 32gb.  Very happy with my purchase.

author: James McKinney
title: Love. It.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My first Kindle Paperwhite, and I have to say I am very impressed. Way better than lugging around my huge tablet to read or listen to books.

author: Juan Sebastian Dueñas
title: Love my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really thought a lot to buy this thing... I was affraid because there were some bad comments about the battery life, among other stuf... BUT, I am sooo happy i decided to buy this amazing product Reading experience is absolutely comfortable and battery life is amazing. I hope to keep enjoying mi Kindle for so many years :D

author: Teknesia
title: LOVE the new model
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Hard to beat my old kindle 2nd gen. But this is just better. Lighter, better screen, the fonts are SO much easier on the eyes. So happy I upgraded.

author: MONICA
title: Reading my the pool.....can’t wait!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love that’s it’s waterproof.  Can’t wait to take it to the beach!

author: Sandra S.
title: Great proctuct
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the product -but user guide could be better.  Need to buy one...seems it should come with it.

author: Sarah
title: Loving This
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have been using My Phone To Read any and all books on prior to getting the Kindle. So far this thing has not let me down. The charge actually holds longer than I thought since I'm Kind of in a reading phase right now so my Saturday's are spent Reading. The charge is actually lasting me about 4 days since I am reading longer than 30 minutes a day, but I am not complaining one bit because it still beats reading on a cell phone.

author: s k
title: Great product for use outdoors and works very well
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Product is great for use in full sun.  User interface is a bit confusing but it does work fine  after the learing curve

author: Kae52
