title: I purchased this in January, and it is completely dead at 4 months
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I enjoyed my kindle right up until the moment it quit working.  It has not been handed roughly, dropped, etc.  I had been using it, put it my purse, then later, took it out to use and it didn't work.  It hasn't worked since then.  It is fully charged, or should be and I tried several charger to be sure.  Not at all happy with this and it wasn't cheap.  Fully expected it to last a little longer than 4 months.

author: Katherine D. Penrose
title: like the ease to use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: i can't find anything I dislike so far

author: Sharon
title: Love to read
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was reading books on my tablet, but was limited where I could read, like at the beach, on my front porch, just about anywhere outside.  I really enjoy being able to put this in my purse and read it anywhere.  The batter lasts a long time too.

author: Margaret  Bentley
title: This Kindle is a real Honey!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Just love my new Paperwhite!  Had my old reader for years.  The longer life battery was a big selling point and has not disappointed!

author: Linda SC
title: Don't buy this product.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I ordered this because the battery was advertised as lasting weeks.  If 12 - 24 hours relates to weeks, they succeeded.  I am returning this product as the battery is a big disappointment.  Also the cord sent wouldn't even go into the port.

author: David R.
title: Had no clue it would be this good
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: First Kindle for me. Xmas present from daughter who knew I read in bed every night. This thing is fantastic! Easy to use. Easy to load books. Easy to read.  Easy to transport to places that have waiting rooms. Can't thing of anything negative about it.

author: cari
title: Power button placement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love reading on my Paperwhite. The screen is responsive, and there is little to no glare. The only drawbacks for me are the lack of a sepia tone and the power button being on the bottom. I often hold it from the bottom with one hand, as I would a book of the same size, and I’m always turning it off by accident. It doesn’t take much pressure to hit the power button, and that can make it hard to prop it up or hold one handed.

author: D. M.
title: Great Little Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Bright and clear little reader works great and is crystal clear. So easy to get whatever you want to read. Just Love it !!!

author: Jennifer Wiese
title: It’s Fantastic!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It really holds a charge. 8 days without a charge and 2 books later, still had about 30% juice left! Best part though is I didn’t have to worry about the occasional sudden downpour of rain.

author: Jack Junior King
title: USB Doesn't Fit
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The USB cable doesn't fit the Paperwhite. Poor engineering and attention to quality normally expected in the Kindle. Battery doesn't last as long as my older model Paperwhite. This is my fourth Kindle and I'm disappointed.

author: Robert G.
title: The paper white is easier for me to read for long periods of time.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am only on  my third book on this unit, but I like it so far. The books are definitely less expensive in this format.

author: DH
title: Faulty cord came with it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I probably would enjoy this product if the plug worked that came with it, but it won't even plug into the Kindle Paperwhite. I'm not even sure how to contact them because that is not an option to just send them an email to let them know about this problem. They either want me to return the whole product or call support which I don't need support either.

author: Mary
title: love the light feature
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My old Kindle was still working very well, but with the specials and the paper white being on sale, I could not pass up the upgrade.

author: Theresa Gorham
title: Same unintuitive software
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What I don't like is that you still can't access your collections easily, but I do like that it's backlit and waterproof.  But the software hasn't improved so I can get to the collections to add more books as I purchase them.

author: Stephen Holcomb
title: Super long battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the new Kindle Paperwhite. This is my third Paperwhite, (I lost one, ordered another, damaged the screen). I like the flush front and light weight of the new one. I guess my favorite thing about all the Paperwhites is the ability to instantaneously look up a word just by touching it but then there are so many things to love about the Paperwhite.

author: Regina Lynn Barnhill
title: Longer lasting Charge!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My new Kindle Paperwhite is excellent! Light weight, easy to read. Longer lasting charge!  Easy to get started. Meets all my expectations! A great buy!

author: Eagle Mom
title: Easy to use.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the size of it.  Very easy to set up and use.  I love the fact that is waterproof, although I hope to never need that

author: Colleen Clauss
title: Internet
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love it just wish I did not have to be connected to the internet to down load books

author: Roy P.
title: You can get every book you have for a buck or two if you don;tmind waiting a month or two
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It's probably fine for younger people who text all of the time, I'm an old guy who reads mostly in bed and can't hold it and feel comfortable. I also misunderstood the program. I bought it mostly thinking i could rent books "like a library" for ten bucks a month-wrong! My book cases are full and I don't reread. It would cost me fifty or sixty bucks a month, when I can buy them used for buck or two! <Makes no sense to me.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love the updated features, but hate the slower reaction times
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my eighth kindle. I ordered the newer version primarily because of the waterproof feature. I love it as much as my other paperwhite devices except that it reacts so much slower than my other paperwhite. But, I would buy it again.

author: Pitney Fan
title: My 3rd Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’m enjoying it very much.  Easy to set up, easy to use.Just disappointed that I needed to purchase my third Kindle as well as another case.

author: Marc Dannau
title: Am I the only one unhappy with the battery life?
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this latest version of the paperwhite Kindle reader to replace my 5 year old Kindle PW version. The old one has better battery life than the new one!! Don't know if it's bad luck and just a fault on the one I received or if it's just this new model that is much more demanding on the battery life.

author: Rivergirl
title: Fabulous
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Wasn’t sure if this was going to be much different than my original paperwhite....but this is fabulous.  Easier to read.  Love it

author: xLimited.Editionx
title: Could be better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I purchased this to use to read before going to sleep.  It is so bright, that it just glares.  It would be better with a backlit option.

author: W. Andrews
title: I'm Really Going to Enjoy this Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: 8G should be plenty of memory.  Looks good, fun to use.  Wish it was compatible with my local library's audio book format.

author: Linda Haskell
title: So easy to setup
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This All-New Kindle Paperwhite is pretty much the same as the version I upgraded from.  The only issue I have is I can't seem to get the books I've already read, off the first page of the Kindle.  On my other model, once I put them in a collection, that was the only place I would see the read books.  I can foresee in the future an issue with not knowing which books have already been read, unless I find a solution for this.

author: Lizpatch99
title: Light weight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love the over all feel of it. It’s kind of delayed so it pauses and can be a little slow.  But other than that I have no complaints.

author: Eva Dadlez
title: Had a hard time getting it to work
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Part of the problem was my router. Would not recognize password. Could finally use when tried WPS mode. But charger is wrong size.

author: P Buchanan
title: Love the new Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: However, I had a terrible time ordering this item and received very little help with instructions for downloading the books from my old Kindle to the new one.  I had 80+ books downloaded on the old Kindle and had to download each book separately onto the new one.  There must be a better way!

author: Erin White
title: Awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love this kindle! I love being able to read outside in the sun. Battery lasts FOREVER and it’s super easy to learn and use.

author: Daniel A. Ray
title: Always opt for the paper white version!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Always opt for paper white I’ve the non backlit ones. Waterresistant only makes it better. My wife is very excited for poolside reading this summer!

author: White in Florida
title: Nope, don’t do it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Biggest waste of money I have ever spent on Amazon. Book jackets aren’t even in color. Soo glad I found my old one.

author: ian
title: Great product.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Loving this. Purchased as a replacement for my last kindle, and the backlight alone is a great improvement. Battery lasts forever, too.

author: Leah
title: Love it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with my new kindle. I love the lighting. It doesn’t hurt my eyes and I like being able to control the brightness.

author: Craig
title: Better than expected, A lot better
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I decided to replace my older kindle with new model.  I could not be any happier. It has surpassed all expectations that I had.  The ease of use, storage and the awesome back lighting.  I have read more and more since I received it.  the battery life is tremendous.  I was skeptical when I unboxed it but it appears to be very durable.

author: Allan Beers
title: Ease of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The kindle is very limited on the interface.It is hard to navigate once you have started reading a book.Cannot go back yo home page

author: Dennis D. Mcdonald
title: A terrific product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Really pleased with the screen light. I find myself using this almost as much as the Kindle software on my iPhone.

author: Devin P von Stade
title: Button too sensitive
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: While the water resistance is nice, it's a step down from the older versions.A) The battery seems to be shorter lived, which may be due to factor BB) The button is too sensitive, and can be pressed by the kindle's own weight when propped up or can be pressed incidentally all the time in a bag or pocket. This is the biggest problem with this change from the older versions.

author: Steve Lipson
title: Nice improvements
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use my Kindle almost every day. I like the Paperwhite because I can read it in bed at night before turning over to go  to sleep

author: "D"
title: Read all night
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new Kindle Paperwhite is just a little smaller than my other Kindle which I like.  I like it because you have a longer lasting charge and I can keep reading.  The waterproof feature is a plus, too.

author: DCH
title: not much new from the last model
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: works fine, I hoped the touchscreen is more sensitive in the new model. Have not tested the waterproofing - that's a great new feature

author: Damhán Alla Pendaran
title: Meh
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Does only some of what I wanted. And I asked customer support for advice. If you like books, good deal. Bad deal? Having good reads on it. Wanted it for books and comics was told it really only supports books AFTER it was received and set up.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Fantastic
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easy to use, better than previous unit used, and probably best of all, it alleviates the fear of dropping it while I am in the tub, soaking.

author: Kayla
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like that it’s waterproof, but I’ve bever put that to the test. What I like most is the extra storage. A nice upgrade from my Paperwhite.

author: John
title: Very nice
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Our grandkids lost my wife's original Kindle so I bought this one for her. She really likes it, but misses the games that were on the original.

author: Frank Mancini
title: Great for readers of all ages
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: As a growing family of readers, there is no substitute for the Kindle Paperwhite. So easy to use and very dependable. Shared libraries, easy access to new books.... it's like it actually promotes reading.

author: Jeffrey P. Keryk
title: What a great reader. These things are the future.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I gave this to my wife after I got mine. I have the previous version, which is great also.Get busy reading!

author: Tiffeni Russo
title: Amazing e reader— bibliophiles must get.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It’s beautiful and I can’t wait to use it. I absolutely love the improvements that have been made by Amazon to the Kindle interface!

author: Nina Howd
title: New and improved indeed
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it.  So glad I traded up.  It does weigh less and is even easier to read.  I'm sure I will take advantage of the increased storage in time.

author: ddmj
title: Not 8gb
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Why does it say 8gb when you look on system it only has 6gb.. 2gb for operating system seems alot. False advertising.  Will be calling to complain!

author: RaptorNXT
title: Worth it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Upgraded from a previous generation Paperwhite, and pleased with it.  Have increased the number of books I read a month.

author: Bethany L
title: Great so far! No complaints.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Definite improvement from my 4th gen kindle. Not sure why some people complained about battery. I have had for a month now, read a few hours per day and have not had to charge it since it’s first charge. A little harder to hold compared to my last but probably just more of an adjustment from what I’m used to as there is more screen and less frame.

author: Linda
title: I'd buy it again
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I haven't gotten it yet so far but I'm sure I'll be glad it's waterproof if I ever do. It's nice and light and small.

author: Kat E.
title: Love it.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very happy with my new ereader.  Better reaction time, lighter and enjoy the bluetooth audible function. Pleased with trade in deal.

author: Liz Shearer
title: Air Pods Will Not Work With This Paperwhite - Support Emailed Me Instructions And The Now Connect
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Apple Air Pod Ear Buds Will Not Work With This Paperwhite.  Amazon support contacted me aftermy review and emailed me how to connect. Originally I was told over the phone by Amazon support that they would not connect.  I love my new Kindle!!!

author: cd listener
title: All new kindle paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easy to use and read. The ads are a nuisance and appear when opening the kindle. I don’t know how to view my audible library.

author: tanus
title: I like that it is backlit.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Believe it or not, I brought this to my uncle who lives in South Africa. It works perfectly for him over there. He loves it.

author: Elizabeth
title: Product lasted only 4 months
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Purchased the new kindle in November 2018 and it stop working February 2019. The kindle screen now shows only an empty an battery.  The power light, both the green and yellow, still respond but the screen does not wake-up.  I have been a prime member since 2002.  I have always kept up w/the new and updated products and have always been pleased with each one. That why I am so disappointed in product.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I have great kids!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was heartbroken after losing my original kindle. My children bought me this for Christmas to replace it. I LOVE it. It’s so lightweight and compact. I can carry it in my purse if I want to. Got a beautiful purple sparkly case to go with it and it’s even better than my old one. Very clear and easy to read. Had to get used to new library format but was user friendly and didn’t take long. So happy to receive this gift!

author: Carrie Collier
title: Don’t let battery die.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Got this for my birthday. Used it once and then the battery ran completely out. Apparently don’t do that because it won’t recharge. Unable to use it much. Not happy after wanting one for so long.

author: M. L. H.
title: didn't work properly, had to return it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Clicking on a book brought up another book.  When buying a new book, it would only load on my phone or computer not on the Kindle.  I still have not got my refund!!!

author: LynnO
title: I am hooked on Kindle.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: What can I say? I love my kindle! I read every night and I don't disturb my husband with a light. It is so nice to read out in the sunshine without any glare or shadow. Now I can read in the pool without worry. This is my third kindle. I hand my older kindles down to family members. Thank you Amazon.

author: karen s
title: Much lighter weight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: It seems slower to respond when turning the pages.  I haven't had the issue of it turning off while reading because the bottom is less protected by the cover.  Hope to not test the waterproof protection.

author: AboTurky
title: e reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great device for reading

author: Kesh
title: Good but USB charging cable does not work
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: USB cable does not fit into the charging port. Device is slightly laggy. Other than that, it works well.

author: H. Bulut
title: Zooming in images or tables on the Kindle Paperwhite e-reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am disappointed to learn that zooming in images or tables is not available on the Kindle Paperwhite e-reader. I purchased this device not to read books via Kindle app on my iPhone, but now I need to go back to my iPhone or iPad separately to enlarge the images/tables in the book I have been reading on the Kindle e-reader. Again, disappointing.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Delivery
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My Kindle was delivered by the USPO on Sunday to my mailbox. It was discovered on Monday when we put out mail to be delivered. The package had been opened and there was no packing. The kindle appeared to be undamaged, and worked OK when setup. There was no AC adapter or stylis. I don't know if they are included, but at that price they should be.

author: Chill
title: My Choice for E-Reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Continues the product line, but with more memory and a bit lighter. Performance is about the same as previous models.

author: Ashess91
title: LOVE
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: this was my first Kindle purchase but I love it!! its lightweight and easy to use... also the battery life is amazing!

author: Wendy H
title: Love my Kindle Paperwhite!!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've been wanting to get the Paperwhite version of the Kindle for a while now. It does not disappoint. It is easier to read and I love that it is waterproof. I also appreciate the trade-in program to  trade in my old Kindle and get a discount on this new Paperwhite Kindle.

author: Kim Clayton
title: Love my Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. I swore I would never own a kindle because I love books. But my busy life doesn't afford me much time to find books to read. With the kindle, I can simply pick my genre and find books I know I will love.

author: A. M.
title: Better than ever.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The fact that it’s waterproof make this reader just about perfect! It’s lighter and has longer charge life too.

author: Sharon Ernst
title: That screen!  Bright!  AND you can read in the dark!  ♥️
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the brightness of the screen.  MUCH easier to read than the regular kindle.  And I think it’s more lightweight!

author: T Rosati
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really enjoy my Kindle.  I can get the books I want to read any time.  I use it while on my treadmill or whenever I'm at the doctor's office awaiting an appointment.  Very easy to read, and I can take it everywhere.  Tons of storage and it really holds a charge!  I also got the AC adapter for quicker charges and a nice cover also.

author: AJ
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 6th Kindle device & I love my Paperwhite.  Perfect for reading in bed since it's lightweight and easy to read.  Quick delivery as promised.

author: Tom Whiffen
title: Battery lasts forever.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easy to adjust settings and I like the way it turns on. I rarely plug in the charger because it lasts so long.

author: nancy s
title: ease of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I loved my old kindle but I really love my new one. I am very happy with it. It is greatI switch from reading to audible easily.

author: Sarvajit
title: Awesome product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is a great product from Amazon. You can hold so many books, adjust font sizing to your like and hold in a single hand and read. :D

author: Newsletter writer girl
title: Special offers are annoying,
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Used for general reading.  Did not like special offers feature.  Did not like that at random times, sometimes only 5 minutes apart, the cover page of a completely unknown to me book, would suddenly take over the entire screen.  I returned the Kindle for these reasons.  Although the new paper white has some neat features, my 8 year old Kindle is more user friendly for pure reading.

author: Ed
title: Used Kindle for years and love it.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my primary way to read books: Have several books on hand is small space, instant downloads anywhere WiFi  available, text size and font adjustable to your likes/needs.  The only time I don't use it is for magazines with color pictures - use tablet kindle reader.  Schools, at least higher levels, should should use Kindle/E-readers for most text books to reduce cost and 40+ pound backpacks.

author: Yeipi pablo agudelo
title: Buena compra para leer sin inconvenientes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Me gusta el lector electrónico. Además, es resistente al agua, pero no lo he probado. Sin embargo, lo único malo fue el envio, el embalaje no fue de mi satisfacción ya que no le colocaron suficiente seguridad y se movía por toda la caja podía golpearse. En cuanto a la tableta y funcionales me gustan. Una de las mejores es que evita el cansancio visual. También ajusta el tamaño de la tipografía al gusto de cada uno.

author: Randall J. Soma
title: New Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my new kindle. I had a 5th Gen kindle in excellent condition but couldn’t resist the opportunity to trade in and upgrade to the newest Paperwhite. It arrived in only 2 days after shipping, and I’m in Hawaii.. Thank you !

author: Tom Applegate
title: Even greater then ever.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Kindle Paperwhite is even better than it ever was. I read it in bright light and even outdoors and have no problems.

author: Lisa
title: Storage
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I loved my orginal paperwhite but with the new sleek design and lightweight of the new paperwhite its become my favorite.

author: Harry's dad
title: Compact and lightweight, long battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Replaced my previous version of the Paperwhite and it is excellent with no obvious differences from my previous version other than the Bluetooth and audio book capabilities which I have not tried yet.

author: C. Mai Art
title: Nice Upgrade
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The new paperwhite is a great upgrade from the older version. I love that it is still the same size as the older models and the waterproof makes for a nice addition. It's also cool that you can listen to audiobooks as well.

author: Beverly Cox
title: New Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I like my new Kindle.  I read everyday and I love the large print.  This Kindle replaced my old one I had for almost 8 years.

author: Kathryn L. Thomas
title: Does not fit the next most previous version case
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Otherwise I like it better, lighter, thinner, heavy plastic surround on face replaced with all smooth glass, no edges to catch crumbs.  Like that it's water resistant.  Still sluggish to touch though.

author: Susan S.
title: Battery power
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Don't believe what they tell you.  I think maybe it would last a week if you never used it.  As it is, I charge it every 4-5 days or so.

author: Shannon M. Collins
title: Waste of money
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I never leave reviews. Do not buy this. I thought I had to have one, and it’s super glitchy and not user friendly at all. I got this as a Christmas present and I’m so disappointed. I don’t understand what I’d be missing with the people that gave this 5 stars.

author: cjvn
title: Love the back lighting
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I no longer have to have a night light on my Kindle, love that feature.Haven't figured out how to download games though

author: DJD
title: it's great
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: it's what I've to expect from amazon a good quality product that has long battery life and is easy to read from.

author: Daisyart
title: Design flaw.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Useful product however they put the on/off button on the bottom! Every time I hold it and lean it against myself it turns off. Or if I’m sitting at a table or desk and reading and rest it on the table it turns off. So I have to get used to holding it precariously in the air to avoid hitting the power button. I’m guessing the person who designed hiabsisnt actually read with it.

author: Marco Marge
title: Great new Kindke
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Fabulous new Kindle. I had a really old one and this is much improved.  I read a lot of the beach and at the pool so I love the waterproof feature.

author: jmnsnow
title: Almost What It Should Be
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The script is still not dark enough and at times the screen too bright. The contrast is still not as easy on the eye as a book.

author: Iowa Reader
title: USB charger cord does not fit
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The USB charger cord that came with the Kindle does not fit the USB port in the device itself. I have resorted to using another USB cord that I already had at home. If you do not have a spare cord, beware you may need to purchase an extra or go through the process of trying to return it. If Amazon shipped a bunch of bad cords with their devices, they need to follow up with a recall and send proper cords to users.

author: Michael R Stephens
title: Easy reading and great battery life
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I've only had my Kindle Paperwhite for a week but I love it.  My eyes aren't great and when I used to read on my tablet more than a hours reading would lead to a headache.  With my Paperwhite I have read several hours at a time and not had any problem with eye strain.  I have finished my first book nearly 600 pages in print and I've still got more than 50% of my battery left.

author: Veroniloca
title: Love My All-new Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I was skeptical at first to get a Kindle. Now I am very pleased and I enjoy that it is not a heavy item to handle. I have arthritis and this is like holding a book. I love the design and easy to take along with me. Enjoy your Kindle if you buy one. This one I highly recommend.

author: Nora
title: Kindles are a great alternative to lugging books around.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I finally took the leap to try a Kindle and I love it. I found it easy to order books and download them. It is a good size, easy to hold, and fits in my pocketbook nicely. You can choose the font size and the brightness to be easier on the eyes. There is nothing like holding a real book, but the Kindle is the next best thing.

author: S. K. Brown
title: Many more personal settings!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I really like the new Paperwhite. My old one has been pretty much used to death. I'm still learning all the different settings available, but I'm enjoying exploring them.

author: Izzy Baxter
title: Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the kindle but thought it was ridiculous that the only option I had for a cover cost 30 more dollars and had to wait another 2 weeks

author: E. York
title: So much better than a Kindle Fire
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this Paperwhite to replace a Kindle fire, and it changed my life! For the first time ever, I prefer reading on an electronic devices over an actual book. It is super light, amazingly clear to read and it fits in my pocket. I take it everywhere I go - kids soccer practice, basketball practice, carpool line. Stop reading reviews and get one of these!

author: D. Johnston
title: Good, but my older model Kindle was better.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is a fine reader most of time.  I have had it freeze up on waking a few times, and had to do a hard re-start.

author: steve
title: Terrific for reading in any light
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Great easy on eyes, adjustable font. Lots of battery life, and memory.  Get a case for it, otherwise you could easily drop it

author: Serious consumer
title: Easier to operate
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love it. It seems as though there is more contrast, the on off button takes much less pressure to get it to work. I only wish it gave one the title of the book and author on the top of alternating pages.

author: suds
title: paper white
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: this is easier to read in low light conditions

author: jeff hamilton
title: Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Moved up from an older Kindle to this model.  Well worth the money. Easy to read with features the old one did not have. Biggest bang for the buck on this one is the weight along with the ease in reading.

author: Theda Torgerson
title: Wonderfuly light weight and compact
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So nice to have backlight for bedtime reading. Battery lasts about one week where my old Kindle lasted about twice as long. Worth the sacrifice to have light. Very compact. Still familiarizing myself with the added functions.

author: Marilyn
title: Wonderful!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I received the Paperwhite Kindle for Christmas and I am truly enjoying the audible books that I can now order.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Lightweight And Awesome
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love that it’s so lightweight. The battery is probably the best part. I received it the week of Christmas and charged it after opening and as of 1-9 still has 79% battery. I read on it every day.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great for someone with vision problems
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my Kindle got it on November 13. I have been reading with it ever since. I have a visual problem I can make the print large as II want to  So easy to work and light wait to hold especially when your reading in bed at night  not heavy like a tablet  5 stars

author: Bennita L. Barnett
title: Like the Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Easy to read and small size makes it very portable. Great battery life.  Saves space on my phone and tablet

author: Kimberly
title: Kindle is ok. Charging cable doesn’t fit.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Haven’t tried it near water yet so I can’t say anything about it being splashproof. I say splashproof because waterproof is not very accurate. So far it’s working good for me. The only negative thing is that the charging cable that came with it doesn’t fit the Kindle. I don’t understand why. I just bought a separate charging cable instead.

author: Jessica Kanuch
title: Great product! Excellent service!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Purchased for my daughter for Christmas... she is going to he so excited!  Turned on to ensure everything was working... everything is great!  Amazon delivery was excellent as usual.

author: Amazon Customer
title: No sleep timer
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love the new paperwhite.  Its very light, a nice size and love the fact i dont have to worry about dropping in the tub. The only downside is there is no sleep timer in audible. I like to listen before bed but canot use this device because i will lose my spot.

author: RG
title: This is my first Kindle... and I love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: So far I love my Paperwhite.  I love how light it is and how easy it is to read the screen in bright sunlight or total darkness. So much better than reading on an iPad.

author: LWP
title: At this price point touch screen is too slow!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use it for pleasure reading.  I  am disappointed in it's slow response time to any touches or swipes.  I find myself repeatedly touching or swiping a second time because I think maybe it hasn't registered and then I end up skipping through multiple pages or down through multiple screens.  So basically I'm not impressed but I do like the amount of storage and the fact that it's waterproof.

author: Debra C Hall
title: Kindle paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

author: Sue K. Neyhard
title: love it

body: I don't like the waking up.  My 7th gen did not have it and I could read immediately.  Does charge a little faster.

author: Randel L. Averett
title: Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The battery life of this is really great.  If I could do it over I would probably buy the bigger screen.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Great model. Fits in purse

body: Had an older kindle. Decided to up grade. Smaller than expected because edging around. Otherwise love it.

author: Aline
title: wonderful
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: First kindle didn't hold a charge...got it replaced...works great now. Love it. So easy to carry with me

author: DTC
title: Defective
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I am having nothing but difficulties with this Kindle.  I does not turn on normally - I have to do a hard re-set if I want to use it.  Turns off ok --- but will mysteriously turn itself back on hours later. Dissappointing.

author: Terri
title: Great e-reader
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my first e-reader.  I am thoroughly enjoying it.  It was very to set up.  It is very easy to use.  Wish I could change the background to black.  Probably didn't need the waterproof feature.  It's amazing to have such a variety of books at your finger tips.

author: Gonzalo Gomez
title: Excellent kindle (Almost perfect)
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my 4th kindle and it is almost perfect, lightweight, water resistant, capable of audible etc. But I’m not giving 5 stars due to a small detail that I find annoying which is the unlock screen that when you slide to unlock it displays a message saying “activating” that takes a couple of secondsMore to unlock.

author: Hannah Mckasson
title: Amazing!! 10/10 recommend
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I’ve always been someone who loves real paper books and never understood how people enjoyed reading books on a screen, but after receiving the paperwhite for Christmas I’m obsessed. It’s so convenient and the perfect size to take anywhere. There is no book pile up and clutter. The screen looks as if you’re reading from a real book, and it doesn’t make your eyes hurt. I’m seriously in love with this product!

author: j. george
title: Lightweight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Love my kindle paper white. So light and easy to carry. This is my 6th kindle purchased. Guess you could say I’m addicted.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Battery lasts a little less than expected and also doesn't have connection for earplugs for audiobooks. But overall good product

author: Maria S. PhD
title: Very satisfied with the quality
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My previous Paperwhite began to malfunction after 4 years; not to mention the fact that I had well over 350 books on it!  I love the bright backlight and the various features of the new Paperwhite.  There was no question in my mind about ordering another one when the time came.

author: Tal Gross
title: So far, love reading with it
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Can’t compare to previous kindles but the simplicity of it is amazing, so fun to read with it without distractions

author: DIANA M.

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

author: Zalba
title: Ease of use
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Having never used an e-reader, the paperwhite more than meets my expectations.  The only problem I've noticed is that the page settings (font size, margins) change sometimes without me setting the change.  Other than that inconvenience at times, I'm very satisfied with the ease of reading, lack of glare, ease of purchases, adjustment of light settings.

title: New Kindle
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Very difficult to insert charger. Almost impossible to delete books from the new kindle. Everything else is very good.

author: BJ

body: I was skeptical about the move to a kindle.I am old school and like the feel of  a book in my hand, but i am happy i made the change and love how convenient and easy it is to use.

author: James Murphy
title: Very light

title: It’s the perfect size smaller than an iPad but comfortable enough to hold and carry it anywhere!

title: Love my new kindle paperwhite

author: Boyd Olsen
title: Easy to use

author: Jo McKay
title: Great reader

body: Very happy with purchase. I was a bit concerned from the few bad reviews. However, I found the Kindle is a solid performer.

author: Mike G.

author: Carolyn Markland

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

Thanks, B

title: Before you buy...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: If you have the Paperwhite 3 (as I did) and you plan on purchasing the "All New" Paperwhite because of the Bluetooth and Audible compatibility (as I did) be aware that you can not read and listen at the same time from the same device. Sadly, I gifted my old Paperwhite as soon as I got this one in 🤦🏿‍♂️. Hopefully there is an update in the works for that feature.

author: Erik Sharp
title: Love it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Amazing! So lightweight and the battery lasts forever. I was very surprised how quickly I got used to reading a book on a screen, because I was hesitant about that at first. It looks just like a book page! Buy this!!!

author: Kindle Customer
title: The charger cord that came with the kindle did not fit
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Have not used it yetIt is a little smaller than my last paperwhite which I had to replace do to the charging port broke

author: LN
title: Lots of bugs, deleted all my collections and downloads and usb cord doesn't fit
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I customized my new Kindle 10th gen to hold 32 gb.  I spent hours downloading my large collection of books (2,200+) to it, and then it froze up, and when it unfroze, it had deleted all my collections and the books in them.  Called Tech Support, almost immediately I found out they are not trained on this new version because the tech didn't even know how to synch it (I had to tell them how).  Also as others have stated, the usb cord sent with it did not fit.  I also noticed significant battery drain when I downloaded books via wifi so I had to keep it connected directly to a power source to keep it charged while downloading the books in my collections.I have returned my Kindle Paperwhite 10th generation and I don't plan on replacing it until all the kinks are worked out and even then I don't know, this is the 2nd Kindle in a year I've received that has been defective.  One good thing is I had no problem returning it.

author: Jean A. Auld
title: Love My Kindle Paperwhite
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The Paperwhite Kindle is s fantastic device.  The charge lasts much longer, and to be able to read books without a light on is great!

author: BJK/Warrior
title: Everything I hoped for...
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have enjoyed my new paper white kindle immensely.  I'm retired and I read voraciously. Anywhere from 2 to 4 books a week.  I am able to use my paper white wherever I go and always have several books with me at any given time.  I recommend this kindle without hesitation.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Waterproof need to get used to controls different than previous kindle

body: Easy to use. Light  contrast not as sharp as my previous kindle

author: Michele
title: Love that it is waterproof
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

body: I owned an older version a few years ago but got rid of because of the frequent screen flash. I was just thinking if they improved that a bit and gave it a try to buy this one. It turns out to be okay. When turning pages, the flash is almost gone. So I guess I'll keep this one and develop some real reading habits.

author: KCJoan
title: Love it.

body: Great size to hold.. Easy to read.  Backlight on kindle so you can read while your partner sleeps.

It is also waterproof, which will be helpful around the pool or at the beach.  But the best feature for me is that you can read it in all lights, from pitch darkness to full bright sunlight.

I don't LOVE ebooks but I travel a lot for long periods of time so its nice to be able to carry a lot of content, and I like that it has audible options too so 1 device for "reading" is very nice.I wish it could filter finished content like on the apps.

author: John Conforti

author: Anna Dobritt

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

author: John Bingham
title: Nice product

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good for travel since it is very lightweight.

author: P85

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

author: Zufelt

The edges are flush all the way to the very sides, no border to grip, but that's literally the only thing and it's so minor I almost didn't mention it.

author: Larisa Bogardus

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Charge doesn't last as long as the Kindle I traded in for this one. I typically read less than an hour a day, and I  have to charge it about once a week. Also has a very bright wake up screen that's jarring when I wake up during the night and want to read myself back to sleep.

author: Elsasser

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Why can Apple provide an adapter for headphone jacks but Amazon can't?  The Amazon Audio Adapter does not work with the newest paperwhite.  I use a Bose noise cancelling headset on flights.  It would be nice to just plug it in via direct 3.5mm connection or with a simple adapter through the micro usb port.  It seems only a bluetooth adapter or a bluetooth headset will do.

Underhanded marketing tactic.

There is no glare off the screen, it is well lit and there are no pin holes. The new flat screen is so much easier to clean and the font looks amazing. Buy it.

author: Amazon Customer

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

title: Good Product - Poor Customer Service
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Product was good. Customer service? Terrible. I ordered the 32GB, received the 8GB. No big deal. Called customer service in order to sort out getting a refund for the difference in cost. Took over 30 minutes on the phone and five separate representatives to try and get it sorted out. Still waiting.

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: Without Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I can now read in the middle of the night without turning on the lights. I can then go out during the day and not have to adjust the brightness.

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I don’t love this kindle as much as my first one (fireXD). I don’t like the home page formatting and miss the color screen that my XD had.  Actually, there is really nothing I like about this kindle - including the smaller size.

author: JD
title: Couldn't be without it!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: This is my third Kindle and I am so happy.  Getting used to a few modifications but very satisfied.

author: Electraglide
title: Very lightweight
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I use it to download books.  If you like Kindles, you will like this one.

author: Matthew Allen
title: Good, but not amazing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Decided to trade in my 5th generation Kindle for this new one, and was disappointed to only receive $5 for the trade in, especially as this new version wasn't a huge step up. Having a touch screen is nice, but that's about the only significant advancement as far as I can tell so far. Does the job, but not the most exciting gadget.

author: Liz Berger
title: Need to get replacement
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I have had six kindles. I always upgrade. This one has been shutting down and rebooting at least twice a day. One day when I opened it the letters were all funky like bad reception.  Then one time I opened it and it said Waking up and it stayed frozen till I shut down and restarted it. I am going to send it back for a replacement.

author: Willamsburger
title: Great for tired eyes
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The screen is beautiful. The letters are clear and crisp.

author: Bid

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: Purchased as a gift and giftee liked an is using it daily!

author: Juanita
title: Horrible battery life

body: While it looks nice and sleek, the battery life is ridiculously terrible. It barely lasts a day and can go from 90% to 15% overnight, closed and no WiFi on. Definitely not worth the money I paid for. Ill just go back to my old kindle that might not be as sleek but certainly lasts longer than a day

author: Fred G

I don't even know how to turn the silly thing off. Never assume that "we" know how to operate a device because we ordered. Please give us some basic directions. Thank you! kl

body: This is still a great reader, but; the power button is no longer recessed and causes inadvertent power offs.

body: Very light, comfortable to use in bright sun or shade.

types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: My only complaints are with the settings.  I'd love to have more options: 1) be able to have my library show only unread books, 2) delete the dictionaries or User's Guides, 3) set the store to show only books in English, 4) edit recommended books so I can delete books I'm not interested in.

author: R. Flint
title: Screen friendly
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I love everything except how the books are listed with the front of the book. It’s often hard to see the title/ author of the book as it’s done presently vs how it was previously done (typed out)

author: Diana Kilbourne
title: Lightweight & compact making it easy to take anywhere.
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: The kindle is really nice and has adjustable font size, making it easier to read.  I thought I would like the touch screen, however I find I accidentally touch the screen and turn the page before I’m done reading it.  I  probably prefer the old page turn buttons on the side.

author: Mark Fiers
title: Bad timing
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 32Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited
body: I bought this item last Friday, and by the time it arrived, the price dropped!  I paid $159, now on sale for $119!  Ugh.  Can’t figure out how to contact Amazon to see if I can get a partial refund.Otherwise.... I really like it!  Just what I was hoping for!  :-)

author: BRIDGET C. BOWLDS
title: An awesome new product!
types: Digital Storage Capacity: 8Offer Type: With Special OffersColor: BlackOption: Without Kindle Unlimited

title: The audible hype is misleading and scam-like

To do what you advertise one must buy ONE Kindle book and buy ONE Audiobook.  That's two purchases for one book. SCAM. Shame on you Bezos.
